Suddenly, fun images of dollies and teddies appear, and they are all dancing on the screen. Then Emma pops up!
"Well hi there Anna!" Shouted Emma. "It seems like somebody has forgotten a little bit about their history, so lets take you all the way back to the beginning!" The scene cuts to a factory, with a lot of dolls who look just like you were on a conveyor belt.
"You started right here! This is where you cute little baby body was assembled!" The movie then shifts to you in an Anna dress in a doll box in a toy store. It then shows Emma walking up to your box in the store, and picking it up.
"This is where I bought you! You were so pretty in your box, I just knew I had to have you and make you mine!" You start to remember that fateful day. You were filled with so much excitement when she bought you!
Belle turns to you and says "That's when we all got our little baby sister!" The TV then shows you videos of Emma taking you out of your box, dressing you up, feeding you baby bottles. Then it shows the rest of the dolls taking turns watching over you, cuddling you, tucking you in at night and kissing you on your forehead.
"Awww I remember that, you were so adorable all cozy in your crib." Aurora chimes in.
You get it now. You're a baby! And your name is Anna! It all makes sense now!
"So I yous baby den?" You say. Babies can't use real words, you remember.
"Thats right Anna! Gosh you are such a good girl! I love you!" She picks you up and gives you a really big hug. You feel really warm and safe with your mommy holding you. Suddenly, you get really thirsty and start to cry.

11111211122.content:
"1600!"

Your mouth fell open. Your eyes widened. Your skin crawled. Your stomach turned. That number was wrong. That number was surely wrong. That number had to be wrong. No-one, but no-one ever reached a body weight like that, let alone living to tell everyone about it. You felt your massive, pillowy body, your thick, sausage-like fingers sinking into deep, warm folds of fat, the sensations of touching being your only indication that this was your body you were feeling.

You could barely look around; the strange new world seemed to pass you before you could register it, noting the populace of giant, animated teddy bears waddling past, some of them waving and chatting cheerily to your new owners. At last, you saw their abode, or what you would assume to be their abode - a large, finely crafted cave, carved into the side of a great mountain. Images and dioramas - depicting epic events of the bears' history, perhaps? - lined the walls to the cave, and the doors swung open at the commands of the massive teddy.

Within, you saw a large living room, cluttered with furniture but not uncomfortably so. Your eyes were drawn to a charming tapestry that ran the length of the adjacent wall, when suddenly, at last, your cart came to a stop.

Humming to themselves, the teddies unfastened you from the cart, the massive one lifting you up and bearing you away from the front door, into a smaller room decorated with plush animals of various sizes and species. You blinked in amazement; this must be the teddy girl's room! And none of the plush toys were anywhere near as big and rotund as you had become.

You caught sight of yourself at last in a large, wall-length mirror and gasped at what you saw; held within the arms of a giant teddy bear was a sphere of flesh, puckered with a deep navel hole in the centre, the lower hemisphere clad in a nappy, atop two great, conical pillars of blubber. Two great, soft, doughy pectorals rested lazily atop the great sphere, along with two conical arms and a cartoonishly small head. To your astonishment, you saw that you were now larger than the teddy girl herself!

As the massive bear gently set you down, the girl leapt onto your planetoid belly, giggling in delight as she wrapped her fluffy arms as far as she could around her. You could see her feet kicking the air, unable to reach the ground from where she was. You were so huge!

For a long time, there was silence, the girl hugging and squeezing your spherical waist, you unable to speak for fear, the large bear having left the room. Your eyes darted about, taking in your new surroundings when suddenly, you could hear muffled sounds from your belly. You turned down and could barely see the girl shake, causing your body to wobble and ripple.

The teddy bear girl was... crying?

"Are you... are you alright?" You finally worked up the courage to ask.

The girl raised her face to look into your eyes, her own glistening with tears like cling film and said...

You wake up suddenly, your hand instantly start to feel your waist. You feel strange, your hand feel the silhouette of the wet diaper. It’s wet and soggy, and drooping around your waist, you jump to your feet; letting the wet diaper leak on the floor beneath you, making a small puddle around your feet.

You sit there for a moment, your butt tightly closed in this wet diaper, your mind is racing and you’re confused. You don’t know what to do as you continue to loose further control of your bladder and bowels, so you cry….

You start to cry loud and shameless, your eyes grow puffy and red, you start to snivel and your breathes get shorter. You continue to shamelessly urinate in your already leaking diaper, sitting there in long and loud sobs you wait, wait for nothing in particular. You don’t know what to do or who to call, so you sit on the wet floor, crying your eyes out.

You don’t realize it at the time but that box changed you, your mind and body. All you can think of is food. Nothing more, your dirty diaper doesn’t seem to faze you. Nor does your inability to walk, but the aching fact that you don’t have a donut in your mouth makes you cry. Its making you cry harder than you ever had before in your life. You want to eat something, you don’t care what or how much, all your brain can say is that it wants to eat; and that’s all it can think of.

You don’t even know how to eat, or how to feed your self. But you know what that you’re very hungry, unbearably hungry. You want food, and you’re not going stop crying until your fed till you belly is full.

111131212.title: A Breakfast Feast

choices: Your School has Become a Daycare for Teenagers

1111312121.content:
You grab a fork, and seat yourself at the table. At that moment the soft cushiness of the thick diaper you are wearing makes itself known as you sit down, a muted crinkle further declaring the nature of your current underwear. The crinkle makes you set the fork down and frown as you remember what it is that you're wearing under your pants. You realize that from the moment you saw the food, you had completely forgotten you were wearing a diaper.

As you realized this you started to think to yourself, "What did happen to my underwear? Why did I even put a diaper on, I could have gone commando. Maybe I should go upstairs and take it (my diaper) off...", but just as you decide to do just that, a loud growl echoes from your stomach and you realize, smelling the delectable dishes in front of you, that you are not merely hungry, You are FAMISHED, STARVING. And as your gurgling stomach finishes its noisy protest, you find that your hunger has swept the worry and uneasiness you had begun to feel to the back of your mind.

Reflecting on it, you think to yourself "It can wait, I'll have time to take it off before I go to school"

         Your stomach once again growling in anticipation, you grab your fork and begin to dig in. The food is ecstasy in your mouth. The flavor of every bite of food is so sharp and powerful, you moan in satisfaction as bite after bite hits your lips and slips down your gullet. The waffles are warm and crisp, despite the sticky syrup that drenches every inch. The taste of the fruit is clean and fresh, with just a hint of an earthy tone. The eggs are light and fluffy, perfectly scrambled the way you like them, the sausages fat and juicy, the bacon crunchy. The Hash-browns are cooked to perfection, with a beautiful golden color. Almost as quickly as you had begun you had cleaned your plate of every morsel of edible matter, but somehow, amazingly, you were still hungry. Your stomach punctuated that sentiment with an even louder growl, as if the massive pile of food you had eaten had only made you more hungry. Rapt as you were now, all worries about the diaper taped snuggly around your waist were long forgotten. You quickly pile your plate full of the seemingly never ending eggs and continue to gorge yourself like a piglet, growing messier and messier with every bite. You gobble up the eggs in mere moments, and seconds later, seven or eight more of the oversized sausages go the way of the eggs.

         Intent as you were upon the food you did not notice how little your parents ate, or the fact that your belly had grown slightly swollen from all the delicious food. You turn your attention next to the scrumptious waffles and pile six of the massive treats onto your plate. Your fork lies forgotten as your newfound gluttony consumes you. And in the fashion of a giant toddler you pick up one of the waffles with your bare hands you begin taking massive sticky bites from it, syrup oozing down your chin, waffle crumbs getting stuck in the sticky mess. Your mother, having finished her own normal-sized meal comes over with something in her hands which she wraps around your neck. It turns out to be a large bib, and with the way you're eating now, you need it very badly. Your mother, timely as ever, had managed to get it around your neck before the syrup had ruined your clothes, and now only the oversized bib was taking punishment. You don't know how long you continued in this way, for the time seemed to flow together in your trance-like state.

         Eventually you lick the last crumb of food from your mouth and belch impressively, "Excuse me," you manage to say covering your mouth and blushing slightly. Despite having just eaten enough food to fill a small all-you-can-eat buffet, your stomach doesn't twinge or ache, merely feeling, finally, comfortably full. Your belly no longer looks swollen either, but rather softer. Instead of the flat stomach and lightly outlined abdominal muscles that had been there before, there was now a small, but undeniably present paunch, your stomach now covered in a light layer of fat. As if, in just this one breakfast, you had put on ten pounds at least. And indeed, to the casual observer, all your features were now softer, and rounder, your new gut strained lightly against your shirt, which showed its outline plainly. No one would call you fat per se, but you were no longer thin, and that was a fact. Strangely, neither your pants, nor the diaper underneath them seemed to feel any tighter, though the diaper felt almost thicker and softer than it had been before, enough so that it parted your legs slightly, and caused you to almost toddle like a baby, not that you noticed.

         In your full-stomach contentedness, the diaper you were still wearing did not even cross your mind. It was as if, in just those few minutes you spent pigging out, you had grown accustomed to its soft bulk and quite rustle, and it felt quite natural to be wearing it. Still in a food-daze you walk over to your backpack, a little sluggishly, and check to make sure you have everything. You note, not with any particular recognition, or alarm, that there is a change of three diapers already packed away snuggly in your bag, along with a can of powder. You didn't notice, but at some point while you were eating, your pants had lost their button and zipper, the waist having become completely elastic, like a toddler's clothes, and hugging your now slightly wider hips. Your shirt hung just low enough to cover the wings of your diaper. You zip up the bag and go to the bus stop, still in a daze. You only begin to wake from your reverie as the bus pulls up to the school. You realize that...

It wasn't just a desire for a return to infancy that bothered you lately. Lately you had become convinced that what you wanted lay somewhere in the old Victorian mansion. You had sworn to yourself to never return, but the months between now and your last visit had dulled the terror you had felt that day, and a strong curiosity had taken its place. Not only was there an inexplicable feeling that you somehow belonged there, that the house could somehow grant your wish, you suspected there might be answers as to why it was these feelings had appeared. There was no escaping it, as much as the rational part of your mind rebelled against it, you simply had to return. So as the hail stopped you muttered a quick explanation to your parents about taking a bike ride now that the weather had let up. You pulled your bike out of the garage. You looked up at the sky and it seemed the clouds had simply opened up around your neighborhood, at almost the exact same time that you had decide to return to the house.

         As you neared the house you began to get excited, your trepidation fading as you neared the crumbling ruin... except it wasn't nearly as crumbled as you remembered. The paint was still peeling, a shutter on the third floor still hung on single hinge, hope and a prayer, but the door seemed straight now, and the living room window, which you could have sworn was dusty and broken, was whole and almost clean, though a thin layer of dirt still served to obscure the interior from outside sight. Looking about the yard, it seemed that the rain had brought back the dying grass, yet the crab grass and other weeds one would expect to spring up all over, had receded to the edges of the yard. As you chained up your bike by the fence you opened the gate and found that it did not squeak as it had on your first visit. "That's strange..." you think to yourself. You know that the ownership of the house has long since been in question, ever since the original owners vanished. Yet the house couldn't be torn down for some obscure legal reason that no one was quite clear on. The house had always "possessed" a certain air about it, as if time did not exist for the house, though it has remained a wreck since before you were born. But now, it seems to show the signs of only a few years of disrepair, rather than the two decades you know have past since anyone last lived in it.

         You brace yourself and walk around to the unlocked back door and step inside. You stand there a little shocked, and take in your surroundings. The inside of the house does not look just like new. But it is in far better repair than the outside. Rotting creaking floorboards, appear now sound and stable, the wallpaper, and paint seems fully intact, and the light in the hallway wall sconce now hangs straight instead of crooked. Yet, the house still feels empty, a layer of dust coating everything, save the foot prints from your last visit, which you know will lead you back to the playroom with the broken record, but your not quite ready to go there just yet. You attempt to flick on the light, but it remains obstinately unlit. Although the repairs to the house cause you minor alarm, as sense of calmness begins to permeate your limbs, and the feeling that you are supposed to be here intensifies. Suddenly sure of yourself you are about to walk forward when a breathe of wind blows in ahead of you, and the thin layer of dust seems to drain away as suddenly the light flickers to life. Though startled, your certainty remains unshaken, and you continue forward. You decide to explore the first floor, and familiarize yourself with the layout of the house, saving the playroom for last. You carefully trace your way around the first floor locating the kitchen, access to a overgrown garden, a massive library filled with dusty volumes, that you want to look at, but continue on instead. And every where you went the dust seemed to almost evaporate, the wood floor and walls are still scuffed and marked, but no longer look as if the house had been abandoned long ago, but only recently. Half excited for, and half afraid of, what you might find you finally open the door to the playroom. It is easily the cleanest room in the house, aside from all the toys scattered around. A sudden urge to play with them comes over you, and you bend down, picking up the stuffed rabbit you tripped on before and hug it closely before you realize what you are doing.

         It is then that you notice the record player, only something is very different, the record you saw before is now fully intact, and an instinctive part of you takes control, and you reach out one hand, the other still clutching the rabbit, and put the arm of the player in the track of the record, and flips the on switch. Already knowing what you'll hear, you are still surprised to hear the soothing lullaby from before. A knot of certainty forms deep inside you, and you find that you know the room where everything you want could be found. You quietly walk back out into the foyer, and tread lightly up the staircase. you walk only a short way into the hallway before realizing that you somehow know what lies behind each door as you pass it, For passing the the study, and a second door to the library the stairway up to the attic, the master bedroom, and finally, standing in front of the last door you murmur under your breathe "The Nursery". Your hand which is shaking slightly closes around the door knob and turns it opening the door.
111221211.title: The Return to the Haunted Mansion

choices: Hungry, go look in the Kitchen for some food
Tired, Take a nap in the crib
1112212111.content:
The room is unlike every other room in the house. the window on the far wall, looks upon the back yard and bathes the room in warm sunlight. This room seems completely untouched by the ravages of time, unlike the rest of the house, almost as if it had been waiting for you. The nursery is painted a bright baby blue all around, with a mural of clouds artfully rendered on the ceiling, so skillfully done, that the room seems to open to the sky. The carpet is a soft warm and thick shag, that makes you want to curl your toes into it, and you find that your toes involuntarily curl inside your shoes at the thought. There is a Changing table pushed up against one wall, and brightly colored chest labelled "Toy Box" in bright red letters next to the closet, and set against the far wall underneath the large window is a crib. Yet each piece, obviously designed with an infant in mind, all seemed sized to fit an adult. This room also feels much too modern for the rest of the old house. It seems much more instep with your generation, almost as if it had appeared in such a way to please you and your desires. A floor length mirror is set into the door of what you assume is the closet. You walk towards the center of the room, and turn around slowly in a circle taking it all in. The fear of the house is gone, except for the strange desires, strengthening and further defining themselves more sharply then before. You look at yourself in the mirror, and look at yourself unhappily, and driven yet again by the strange presence that has been guiding you since you entered the house, you disrobe completely and look at your naked body. You are not tall or muscular, a little short for your age, and very thin. You run your hands over you stomach, and wonder, unsure were the strange thought comes from, how you would look if you were (fatter) bigger. Suddenly aware that it is a little cold in here, you walk towards the changing table, guided by your strange sixth sense and open the cupboards in the bottom.

         There you see the key upon which your fantasies have turned these past few months. Diapers, covered with similar designs to those you've seen on pampers diapers. Teddy bears and playing along the back and waist of the diaper. Unfolding it you see that it is most certainly your size, next to the glorious diapers you find a can of baby powder and and bottle of baby lotion as well. The knowledge of what you must do blooms in your mind as you hop onto the changing table, which is very spacious and provides plenty of room for you and the diapering supplies. First, setting the diaper aside so as to prevent messing up its tapes with oil, You pour a generous amount into your palms and begin rubbing it into your skin all over your diaper area. You stop as you feel a strange tingling sensation. You look at yourself to see your pubic hair appears to be rapidly receding, closely followed by the hair on your arms, legs and chest, leaving them baby smooth. A tingling in your armpits and on your face suggests the same is happening there as well. Despite the fact that this is not only strange, but should be upsetting, you find that you are having trouble remembering why it should trouble you, and you continue your process of diapering yourself. You proceed to dump a medium sized pile of baby powder into your hand and gently rub it into your skin, the baby oil helping it to stick to your skin. As you finish powdering your self you begin to almost quiver with excitement as you pick up the babyish diaper. You unfold it marveling at the crinkle, and inexplicably overjoyed at the the soft padding you now hold between your fingers. You gently lift your bottom off the changing table, curling your legs up and pulling your knees towards your chest, you carefully slide the unfolded diaper underneath your raised bottom, and set yourself down, adjusting slightly. You pull the front of the diaper up over your crotch, and carefully tape the sides shut.

         Feeling the thick, soft, padded between your legs you lay on the table a in a moment of glowing ecstasy, the depression of the past months falling completely away, finding yourself completely at peace for the first time in weeks. As the moment fades, though the peace and joy you feel does not, you swing your legs off of the changing table and walk over to the closet and admire your reflection. Aside from your thinness you look every inch the overgrown toddler and love your reflection as you run your hands over the plastic of your new diaper. Suddenly curious as to what lies inside of the closet you open it and stare with wonder. Inside there are an assortment of toddler style clothing, much of it in your size. You pull out a teddy bear print onesie that matches your diaper and a pair of short denim overalls that would end at your knee, both garments have snap buttons in the crotch, for diaper changes you assume. Although you are loathe to cover up your diaper you can't wait to try on the clothes and you quickly slide into the onesie and shortalls. Closing the closet door you blink taking in your reflection, you look even more a baby now than before. The clothes are warm and soft and provide you a sense of security you have long since missed. over come with emotion you hug the plush rabbit you are still holding and bury your face int its soft faux fur.

Only now do you realize that your feeling quite....

Grabbing one of the oversized, plastic bottles and examining its contents, you find it’s just like the nursery and the kitchen, strangely modern in this decrepit house.

You close the fridge door and scan the large kitchen. It’s covered in warm stone and has a cozy atmosphere to it. All the appliances are modern, but it has the feel of a country kitchen with a large wood fired stove next to the modern oven and cabinets full of plates and kitchen utensils.

Finally seeing what you need propped up in the corner, you are drawn to a high chair that looks like it’s made of sturdy wood. You drag it out and flip the top up. Crawling in, careful to not tip the heavy chair over, you bring the tray back down and put the bottle to your lips. You feel excitement and strange disbelief at once as all your senses come together and you realize your thick diaper is spreading your legs apart and your about to drink from a baby bottle.

Your stomach goes hollow with excitement as you put the bottle to your lips and start to suck. It’s good! It’s a wonderful, rich, creamy mixture that you can’t put down.

You guzzle and guzzle it all until the bottle is bone dry, however, you seem to feel the effects. Hopping down, you notice your overalls seem a bit more snug all over. Placing a hand to your belly, you feel the rich formula sloshing around inside your stomach. Your butt seems more pronounced in the shortalls and the arms of your shirt seem more tight.

Maybe it’s already working! You though.

With no need to stop in sight, you reach for another bottle and hop back into the chair. This time, you voraciously slurp it all up, almost causing a coughing fit in the process. You place a hand on your stomach as your halfway through and feel it expanding further. When you finish, your new tummy is now gently pressed against the tray and you have a satisfied smile on your face as you belch.

Suddenly, your body decides to relieve yourself in the thick diaper. Just like your stomach, the material swells forward and the crotch of the shortalls swells and tightens.

You sit up and examine the damage at a nearby mirror. Your plump stomach smiles back at you in the mirror as you see a well-fed teenage boy in a huge diaper. The shortalls are stretched to accommodate your bulbous belly and the legs are stringing around your expanded lower half. Your new butt is forcing the seat to its limits and the much more swollen diaper isn’t helping either.

What should you do next?

In short it looked much more like it had when you were ten, just before your parents did it over to match your budding pre-teen interests of the time. It wasn't dramatic. First, your clothes changed into fleece Scooby-Doo pajamas, identical to those you had worn when you were ten. These, however were larger than those you had once worn, though they were still small on your 17 year old frame, looking like they would fit someone closer to 14 or 15. 11411111.content:
You're leaning back against a giant teddy bear in the nursery, wearing your diaper and a baby blue t-shirt. The shirt rides up a little on your bulging belly, but you don't care; it's soft and comfortable. A jar of the Big Baby Food lies open on the floor in front of you, Mashed Nachos, and you smile and giggle as you stuff your face, the nachos smearing your face as you eat. Babies are messy eaters, so you don't feel any desire to be neat.

When you finish the jar, you sink back further into the teddy bear, patting your tummy; it shakes and wobbles as your hand slaps it. You burp loudly, and smile, without a care in the world; your eyes drift shut, and you doze off, snoring.

When you wake up, you're not sure how much time has passed. You feel intense pressure in your bladder: you've got to pee! Grunting, you sit up-

"YAA!!" you yell.

"Oh, good, you're awake!" Someone was standing in the middle of the nursery looking at you!

Getting over your shock, you give the person a good look.... oh, wow...

It's a woman. She smiles down at you. "My name is May; what's your name?"

You're dumbfounded- this woman is a giant! She towers over you; she must be at least six feet tall, probably taller. She's got golden blond hair that falls in waves down her back, and glistening blue eyes. Her body is an hourglass shape- a classic figure- but the proportions are extreme. Your chubby fingers start to carefully scroll through the options, there seems to be all kinds of tasty treats to chose from, but you felt a hankering for something sweet, so you tap the baked goods option, opening a new sub-menu, you follow that up by selecting cupcakes, chocolate cupcakes, with lots of frosting and sprinkles.

The screen, then shows a run down of your selections followed by a begin option. You select yes, the suddenly the teddy bear chef springs to life, walks out of the closet and immediately gets to work baking your snack.

11412221221211.content:
Not long after leaving to make you food, the plush chef returns with a plate piled high with delicious cupcakes, and gives you the platter, to your drooling delight. You grin, licking your lips hungrily as you begin stuffing your face with yummy chocolate. You happily chow down, putting cupcake after cupcake into your mouth, blissfully oblivious to your waistline expanding even further, far too hungry to care. Your clothes and diaper get even tighter, and your body swells with more fat. Pretty soon, the plate, once overflowing with cupcakes, has been cleaned, with you licking the platter of crumbs in a daze.

You sit there for a few moments, content in your fullness as you pat your big blobby belly, having trouble processing how you could eat so much, yet not caring. You grin, giving your gut a playful smack, before feeling something bubble up. Before you know it, you open your mouth, releasing a huge belch that leaves you even more satisfied, and lie back, giggling and content. Your eyelids droop. All that food in your belly is making you sleepy. You belch again, sitting up, and turn to Kitty. “Kitty, I’m-URP-getting’ kinda tired…” You slur out, feeling more and more exhausted.

Kitty nods, and begins waking down the hall, with you lazily following behind it. It leads you to an open doorway, leading to a large, babyish nursery it seemed. For some reason though, the crib in the center looked big enough for an adult to sleep in. You rub your eyes, looking around. From the adorable baby blue wallpaper, to all the toys scattered around, it was somehow comforting, even relaxing…

You headed to the crib, with Kitty undoing the latch on the door of the crib and allowing you to crawl inside. Resting your head on a fluffy pillow, staring up at a mobile dangling above your head, you feel even more at ease. The icing on top was when Kitty crawled inside with you, carrying a few other plushies which you cuddled in your arms, Kitty happily laying beside you and allowing you to embrace it, along with an assortment of other plushies that snuggled up to you as well. You felt so happy, so calm. The room lights dimmed, a nightlight projecting colorful images of stars, moons, and planets across the darkened wallpaper, spinning slowly, as a music box softly sounded a soothing lullaby.

You smiled, impulsively popping your thumb in your mouth, as Kitty pulled a blanket across you, as you drifted off to sleep….

You groggily opened your eyes, refreshed from your nap, and still sucking on your thumb like a baby. Rays of light peek through the windows of the nursery, although you aren’t sure what time it is. You cutely yawned and stretched, cuddling your plushies as you did, giggling happily. That was the best sleep you’ve ever had! It was just amazing.

As you slept, you dreamt of candy, and toys, and baby food; and water, lots of water. You were plying with Kitty in a warm kiddie pool full of milk, which was strangely soothing to you. The pleasant warmth of the fluid washed over you as you splashed in it, giggling as it spilled out into a dreamy sea. Making bubbles with your rear end as you cooed, slurping it up, growing fatter and fatter…

You still smile thinking about it, and turn to Kitty to tell him about the dream, when you notice something strange. Your crotch still feels warm, and damp. In fact, the whole bedding feels soaked. Quickly, you pull off the covers to reveal a large, dark stain across the bed, focusing in on your lap, and see your diaper is massively swollen, the crotch tinted a light shade of yellow. Even in your groggy mindset, it doesn’t take much for you to realize that you’ve just wet the bed as you slept.

Your face turns bright red in embarrassment. You couldn’t even remember the last time you wet the bed, yet the stained sheets, leaking diaper, and ammonia smell in the air spell it out clearly that you just did now. “Oops…” You quietly mutter to yourself. “Kitty, I had an accident…” You confess, a bit ashamed. Kitty, sits up, nodding as it undoes the locks on your cage. The other plushies help your fat butt get out – your diaper is so full of urine it’s kinda hard to move in, before they begin stripping the crib’s sheets to wash them. “Thanks guys.” You smile. Although a part in the back of your mind feels a tad concerned over this. What had gotten into you? And then there was your diaper; still drippy and tight, but oddly, yet pleasantly, still warm. You should probably change at the very least.

It nods and begins to walk away, as you begin following it. Soon, you’re in a bathroom, with an ENORMOUS tub at the end, more than big enough for you. Kitty goes over and turns on the faucet, filling the tub with warm water. He squeezes some bubble bath soap into it, making it as bubbly as you like, as you remove your bib and diaper and crawl in, reclining in the warm, frothy water, feeling completely relaxed.

To further amuse you, Kitty brings over some squeaky bath toys, and places them in the water with you. Quickly you find yourself excitedly playing with them, squeaking the rubber ducky and buzzing your lips as you swim it around, bumping a toy boat into it with your other hand. You imagine your belly as a monster of some sort, giggling as it ‘attacks’ the toys, drifting in the water and bouncing against it. Your fat hands eagerly splash the water, playing with bubbles and toys, giggling almost nonstop. It was surprisingly fun. You hadn’t had this much fun taking a bath in ages.

As you continue giggling, you begin to feel extra pressure in your tummy, and grunt, adding more ‘bubbles’ to the bath as you fart, sighing contentedly. You giggle at the crude action, “Look Kitty, hot tub!” You excitedly say, leaning to one side as you release more bubbles from your rear. Despite the fruity scent of the bubble bath, your ‘bubbles’ nearly overwhelm it, which makes you curiously proud. Letting out more gas, you sigh and chuckle, “Hot tub…” Suddenly you have an idea, an even cruder one, and lean back, focus, and sign. You hadn’t used a bathroom in a while, so this would be okay, wouldn’t it? Warmth flows from your crotch, as you empty your bladder, making the warm water even warmer, and releasing more bubbles from your behind while you were at it. It all felt so strangely relaxing, despite how juvenile it was, you somehow didn’t seem to care. You purr contentedly at the feeling.

As you’re sitting there, peeing, farting, and playing with your toys in the bathtub, there is a knock at the bathroom door, startling you a bit, and somewhat snapping you out of that peaceful feeling. What had you been doing? You frown, a bit disgusted by yourself, and surprised at what you had been up to, and yet…. Not really caring somehow. “Uh, come in?” You nervously say, as the door opens.

1142121.content:
You waddle down the streets of your town, not really caring one way or the other if anyone sees you. It's not like you could do anything to hide yourself anyway. You probably look really silly, you think giddily. A great big fat boy walking... well, waddling in nothing but a diaper like babies would wear. You happily laugh at it all.

You finally get home and knock on the door (your keys disappeared when your pants did). Your mother opens the door and gasps.

"Oh my..."

"Hi mom!" you say with a blush. You walk into your home and see your dad sitting on the couch while watching T.V. He looks at you with wide eyes. "Uh... son? Is that you?"

"Of course it's me," you say as you set the bottles you were carrying on a coffee table. "I may have put on a little weight, but it's still me."

"A little?" You mother asks, staring intently at your dinosaur print diaper. She laughs at the silly statement. "You look like you've put on about two hundred pounds!"

You blush even harder. In your embarrassment, you grab a bottle of the Big Baby milk to sooth your nerves. Again you begin to grow with each swallow you take, adding more pounds to your frame and stretching your diaper across your rump and expanding hips.

Your father rubs his chin. "That's not something you see everyday."

Your mother picks up and bottle and reads the label. "Big Baby Milk? The things they make these days. Where did you get this and that huge diaper?"

You explain your trip to the house and how you got trapped in the nursery. You don't bother leaving out any details, since you're living proof that something really weird happened.

"And you like this?" Your dad asked when you were finished.

You vaguely wonder why your parents aren't more phased by their son turning into a big fat baby but shrug it off. "Well... I feel really nice." You pat your full tummy. After about the two bottles you had sipped on while you spoke, along with the extra hundred or so pounds, you were finally full and content. You figured you had to be about four hundred pounds at this point, with thick thighs, a large butt, and a monster stomach. You smile, noting the difficulty in moving your cheeks. "I guess, I don't know, I just feel really comfy." You yawn loudly and smack your lips.

"Would you look at the time," your mother said coyly. "I think that the baby has been up a little too long."

The baby? you think.

"I think you're right honey," your dad said as he stood up and moved towards you. Your parents bend down and, working together, heave your huge form up.

"Woah! What are you doing?" You yell in surprise. Your parents carry you to your bedroom and place you on the bed. Tenderly your father pulls your blanket over you and your mother rubs your belly while giving you a loving kiss on your forehead. "Would the baby like if if mommy read him a bedtime story?"

You blink at that, and then nod with a smile. "Thanks, mommy. Thanks daddy."

1143221122.content:
Try as you might, your blubber stops you from moving at all. Your titanic rear and massive belly keep you pinned to the ground, not that you thick legs would have done you any good anyway. With a heave, you lift an arm to pat your belly.

"I might have taken this a little far," you said as your cheeks grow warm from blushing. You feel your new tummy rumble, making you whole body jiggle. You laugh at the ripples like that big baby you now are. "This feels awesome but... boy am I hungry now. Aww, I guess I need to get smaller."

"Well, I wouldn't say that."

Your eyes widen and you crane your neck to the door. It's quite a feat considering you barely have a neck anymore and your many chins are pushing against the rest of you. "Mom!?"

Sure enough, your mom is standing in the doorway. You immediately begin to sweat from embarrassment. Here you are, a massive blob of a boy that had to be about a ton, sitting in a stretched out diaper and completely helpless, just sitting in front of your mother. You have to look ridiculous.

Your mother smiles coyly and walks up to you, patting your belly. You then notice that she's wearing a french maid's outfit. "I thought you knew better than to sneak into other people's houses, young man."

You blink at that, stunned for a brief moment. You vaguely realize that you are eye level with your mom, where as about five minutes ago you would have stood half a head taller than you. "I was... there was a crash... and a ray gun..."

Your mom looks at the gun in your hand and takes it from you, sarcastically tsking. "Well, that was my fault. Knocked over a pot, clumsy me. Well, I'm glad I raised a boy willing to rush to someone's aid."

You blink again. "Aren't you surprised that, you know, your son is a diapered whale?"

"Not exactly," your mother says. "I guess you never realized that this is the house I take care of. Can't really blame you, though, it's not like I ever told you. And the house does look like it's falling part outside. I swear, that repairman needs to be fired. Whoops, off topic." You mother leaps up and sits on your belly. You both laugh as you jiggle from the impact. "Basically, the people that rarely live here pay me to take care of the place. It's their secret hide away where they pretend they're babies for a while. I clean and stock the food when it gets old. As you just found out," she massaged your swollen face for emphasis, "they have some interesting toys lying around."

You swallow in anticipation. You find yourself really excited by this for some reason. "And do you baby them."

She nods with a smile. "Oh, I just love taking care of helpless babies. I don't regret you growing up, but sometimes I wish it hadn't been so fast. I miss my wittle baby boy sometimes." She gently pinches your cheek and you blush even harder than you had been. "Wooks wike I got my wish, wittle one." She tickles you and you giggle like a baby. "We can have some quality mommy-baby time while you're here." She blushes this time. "If you don't mind, that is."

You smile and jiggle from your happiness. "I'd love that. Its feels so good to be a big, fat, helpless baby. I need my mommy to take care of me."

However, knowing Janice, she was willing to help you in anyway she possibly could in an effort to make you comfortable. "I'm so sorry to hear that, sweetie. Is...Is there anything I can help you with?" She asked, willing to help you in any shape or form.

But suddenly, just as you were about to say something in response, you felt something completely unexpected: You were wetting your diaper, causing your diaper's crotch to turn a light shade of yellow while expanding and bloating somewhat, forcefully spreading your hind hooves apart by and inch or two. In response, your facial cheeks took in a crimson red hue, taking on an embarrassed blush in the process.

"I'm guessing you want your, um..... diaper changed, huh?" Janice asked, where you responded with a simple humiliated nod. After all, you just wet yourself like a baby would, as you then stood up on all four hooves and awkwardly waddled toward the changing room, where this whole mess got started. Of course, upon seeing the room herself, Janice could see the truth in your words as she remarked, "Wow. Now I definitely know you weren't lying, (Name)."

"C-Can we please get this over with?" You said, obviously becoming a little more embarrassed by the minute due to your current situation. Of course, Janice acknowledged your behavior and began to grab a new diaper from the stack, along with some baby powder as well. First, she got you to lay on your back, as she stripped the wet diaper from your body. From there, she tossed the diaper into a nearby trash bin, and then proceeded to wipe you down, powder your crotch and flank, and finally taping the diaper around your waist.

"There, all better." Janice answered, speaking with a caring tone in her voice. Of course, getting you back onto your hooves was another matter entirely, as Janice struggled to pull your near 300 pound pony frame upright. Luckily with some effort, she was able to get you back on your hooves, panting some in the process. After all, even though she was an athletic brunette, Janice wasn't an Olympic athlete, as she spoke to you and said, "Well, *pant pant* one thing's for sure, sweetie: you don't just look fat, you kinda feel that way as well....Not to hurt your feelings, of course."

"Can we leave this place now? I don't like being here." You asked, obviously not wanting to stay in this weird house any longer. Of course, Janice did agree with you somewhat and replied, "Agreed, but.....what about your Mom and sister? They're going to get really worried about you. I mean, how are we going to explain....well, you?" Obviously, you knew she was referring to your current equine physique, since this was going to be a real bitch to explain to your family.

"I....I don't know how, Janice, but.....but right now, we can't let them know about what I've become. Not yet." You answered, thinking that it might best to keep your situation under wraps for the time being. Then again, you now had to find a place to stay. Fortunately, you know who to ask, as you looked up at Janice and said, "Janice, is there, um..... is there any chance that I can....that I can, um...."

However, before you could say anymore, Janice pressed her index finger against the front of your equine snout, displaying a tender compassionate smile and answered, "Of course you can stay with me, (Name). You know my doors are always open to you." In response, you showed a thankful smirk on your slightly chubby snout, dimpling your chubby cheeks in the process. But first.....
1213111212222212211.title: A Long Story....

choices: Decided to grab some supplies for your stay with her..
Suddenly heard a strange noise outside of the room...
12131112122222122112.content:
Upon looking at yourself, you felt.....somewhat embarrassed in just nothing but your diaper. "Well, I guess.....we should find something for me to wear then, huh?" You said, in which Janice nodded in agreement and replied, "Well, there should be something here for somepony like you, hehe." Obviously, you knew that Janice was going to say that infamous word as an ironic yet fitting pun. You rolled your eyes in response, where the two of you then began to search across the room for some clothing that could easily fit your fat pony form.

However, that was easier said than done. After all, most or all of the clothes looked very babyish and infantile, whether they took the form of pink frilly babydoll dresses or fluffy onesies. Minutes later into the search, you heard Janice's voice rang out, grabbing your attention in a sing-song tone as she said, "Oh (Name)! Guess what I found?" In response, you turned around to face her, waddling in the process due to your big bulky diaper. "Did you find something, Janice?" You asked, as you noticing her holding something behind her, her arms folded behind her as well.

"Now, don't get mad at me or anything like that, sweetie, but I think I found something that should fit you easily." Janice explained, wanting to keep you as calm as possible. "Ta-da!" She said, revealing to you what she held behind her this whole time: A large purple fleece onesie. Judging from it's overall appearance, you could see that it easily is fit for someone of your size, physique, and bulk, with a small but circular hole in the back, perfect for someone with a fully functional tail, like you.

However, what really ruffled your fur, was on the onesie's rump, there was a large multi-colored symbol that was an exact copy of Twilight Sparkle's cutie mark from the show, a mauve and magenta 8 pointed star. Once again, it was as if fate itself was trying to convert you into being a female Brony, which was offensive given your current situation. ".....No, No, No! There's no way in He- Hay I'm wearing that!" You yelled, noticing how it felt like you're unable to swear, almost as if your instincts were censoring you, since My Little Pony was a kids' cartoon.

"Aw come in, (Name). I know this looks like something made for a baby, but....this is the only thing that will even fit you! So, will you please wear this? For me?" Janice pleaded, wanting you to wear the MLP-themed onesie for her sake. Although you simply wanted to outright scream no at the top of your lungs. But that wasn't the case however, as your girlfriend use her classic "Puppy Dog Stare" tactic in you, making her look absurdly cute and adorable. After all, she knew that you couldn't resist her Puppy Dog Stare so easily.

And just like she expected, your resolve melted like ice cream in a hot summer day, as you then let out a somewhat frustrated sigh and answered, "Alright, fine! I'll wear the stupid onesie." And with your reluctant approval, Janice eagerly got you into the onesie, clipping the buttons together at the onesie's crotch area, sealing you inside the large infantile clothing, along with making sure everything was fitting right as rain.

And yet, to your surprise.....the onesie actually felt really cozy against your pastel pink fur, almost as if it was made intentionally for you, as you stared back at your purple and green pony tail sticking out of the onesie's tailhole in the back. From there, after that little piece of business was done, you and Janice then....
12131112122222122112.title: Fit For A Filly

choices: Fortunately, the plan worked, as you made it unseen.
Actually, something else happened in the process.....
121311121222221221121.content:
After all, you we're completely unsure if there was any sort of cure to your current physical affliction, so it would make sense to gather some supplies to endure your stay with Janice. Of course, Janice was tempted to grab more than just the large packages of those bulky diapers. Apparently, your girlfriend decided to grab a cluster of large infantile clothes and accessories, making you blush from embarrassment in the process, because she'll eventually make you wear them days from now.

"Okay, so....how are we going to get to your house without getting caught?" You asked, pondering about how to traverse your suburban neighborhood without being detected by your neighbors. After all, a fat Unicorn mare wearing a purple onesie and diaper was going to attract quite a lot of attention upon first sight. Obviously, as she laid the infantile clothes in a nearby rocking chair, then turned around to look at you and answered, "......You make a good point, (Name). Let me see if I can figure something out."

From there, Janice walked out of the room, where you then heard these loud clanging sounds minutes later, prompting you to poke your chubby equine head and snout out the door to seek the source of the ruckus. Fortunately, it was just Janice, who've just found a large metal wagon cart, perfect for transporting the supplies, as your girlfriend then pulled out what appeared to be a large quilt, perfect for hiding the diapers and babyish clothes undetected from prying eyes.

"Let's just hope this works." Janice said, as she pulled the wagon along with her toward the previous room. From there, the two of you then laid the supplies in the wagon, while Janice used the quilt to cover up the diapers, babyish clothes, and a large empty baby bottle or two, despite your protests with her about the bottles. After all, she did see the remains of your uncontrollable binge from before, hunting toward your newfound appetite and tastes.

Finally, after that was done, you and Janice now had one more problem to contend with: You. After all, you're not human anymore, and you stuck out like a blistering sore thumb given the current situation. "Alright, so.... how are we going to hide me from the locals?" You asked, hoping that Janice had the answer for such a predicament. Fortunately for you, she did, which came in the form of hiding in one side of the wagon, since it seemed large enough to hide your entire, despite you're too heavy to hide alongside the supplies underneath the quilt.
121311121222221221121.title: Grabbing Supplies

choices: "I was thinking of telling them the truth concerning you."
"We'll cross that bridge when they get back home."
Actually, something else happened in the process.
1213111212222212211211.content:
Upon exiting the old house that transformed you into a fat diapered unicorn mare in the first place, you and Janice noticed how vacant the neighborhood yards were, indicating that the coast was all-clear to proceed to your girlfriend's home. However, you somewhat struggled a little to keep up the pace with Janice, due to the bulkiness of your diaper, forcing you to waddle with your equine hooves. Fortunately, Janice noticed this predicament and slowed down her walking pace some, giving you some compassionate relief in the process.

Finally, after 3 minutes of waddling your fat diapered flank, the two of you reached Janice's house. From there, Janice's opened up the doors for you, as you waddled inside with Janice and the wagon full of supplies following not too far behind. Upon entering the large family estate, Janice closed the doors behind you, just in case someone was still outside. "*Phew* Okay, that was a little too close for comfort." Janice said, wiping a few drops of nervous sweat from her brow, as you turned around to face her and replied, "Maybe. But.....where is everyone? Shouldn't there be at least one person out there?"

From there, as she pulled the quilt off of the infantile supplies, Janice then answered, "I think most of the neighborhood might be at the County Fair today." "Well, I guess that explains why. But....what about your family, Janice? Wouldn't they be asking a lot of questions if they see me?" You asked, concerned over what should happen if you're discovered by your girlfriend's parents or her younger twin sisters, Katie and Elizabeth. After all, they wouldn't exactly be calm if they saw you talking or waddling around their home.

Of course, Janice already had such a contingency all planned out already, as she knelt down in one knee, gently stroking your purple and green mane out of reassurance and answered, "....Don't worry, sweetie. I'm waaaay ahead of you in that. And besides, my Dad's serving in the Navy overseas, so you shouldn't worry about him so much. Now, as for my Mom and the twins, well....."
1213111212222212211211.title: Like Thieves In The Night

choices: But then, you both heard a car being parked outside.....
But then, you heard someone knocking on the door....
12131112122222122112111.content:
Your first reaction was one of shock and surprise, as you looked back at Janice and exclaimed, "WHAT?! Janice, have you completely lost your Godda-dang mind?! There's no way they'll believe you!" Of course, your own mouth censored itself once more, altering the intended word you were about to say. However, you did raise a very valid point: It was going to be impossible for Janice's mother and twin sisters to actually believe what has happened to you unless you had proof.

"Of course they will, sweetie! Besides, all we have to do is have you show yourself and talk to them. I mean, they might ask a lot of questions considering your......current condition, but I think it'll work out." Janice explained, already having a plan in place for such a contingency. In response, you began to pace back and forth a little, waddling in the process due to your bulky diaper and plump equine physique.

Eventually, you made up your decision, as you let out a deep stressful sigh and answered, "......Alright, fine. We'll.....we'll do this your way, honey." From there, Janice knelt down on both knees, putting her hands on your plump face, directing it upwards to face her, where she delivered a gentle tenderly kiss upon your slightly chubby snout. Then, she wrapped her arms around your plump body, where you wrapped your chubby forehooves around her in response, as your girlfriend then spoke up and replied, "(Name), You know I wouldn't let anything happen to you."

"I know, Janice. It's just that.....*heavy gulp* I feel so fu- fu- bucking embarrassed about all of this. I mean, look at me! I'm fat, I look like something out of a show made for little girls, and I'm wearing a big stupid diaper underneath a big baby onesie. To me, this is......this is ridiculous." You said, confessing both your doubts and concerns to your beloved Janice. Of course, she was very understanding of your feelings, as she then gently stroked your purple and green mane out of reassurance and answered, "Maybe....but you'll always be that cute girl I madly fell in love with, even if you've been turned into a big fat filly. *giggle*"

Obviously, you couldn't help but blush a little, turning your pink plump cheeks a crimson hue, cracking a tiny smirk in the process from Janice's kind loving words and playful teasing. After all, she did know how to cheer up your spirit when you were down in the dumps.
12131112122222122112111.title: Confessing The Truth

choices: Confusion and disbelief, unsure of what's going on exactly.
Shock and awe, causing her to faint before you.
Actually, her reaction was somewhat different than anticipated....
121311121222221221121111.content:
Unfortunately, the tender loving moment between you and Janice was briefly interrupted, as the two of you then heard the sounds of a car pulling into the driveway. Figuring out who it could be, Janice peeked through the small door window, hoping to discover who was approaching her home. Of course, she instantly recognized her mother's crimson 4-door van, which could only indicate that Janice's mother and twin sisters had just returned home.

From there, with only a few moments to spare, Janice then turned to face you and said, "Well, speaking of my Mom and the twins, they're here. Are you sure you can go along with my plan?" "....I'll.....I-I'll try, sweetie." You answered, that feeling of butterflies in your stomach returning once more. After all, you had faith in your girlfriend and her iffy strategy. However, the only problem with it was how Janice's mother and twin sisters would react upon seeing you in your current condition. Sure, the twins Katie and Elizabeth would simply run over to you and begin to pet you like a brand new puppy due to their age.

But the mother on the other hand.....the best case scenario: she would simply be in shock and disbelief. The worst case scenario: she would faint upon hearing you speak in your current form. Overall, there was only one way to find out for certain, as you waddled toward the nearby couch, hiding behind the armrest, waiting until your cue to reveal yourself to them. "....T-This is it: The point of no return. *hard gulp* There's....t-there is no turning back now, (Name)." You thought to yourself, your heart increasing in pace with each passing second, as you then heard the doorknob click and turn, causing the door to open, where you then heard several footsteps approaching in the process.

However, shortly after greeting her mother and twin sisters, Janice's mother then noticed the wagon full of infantile supplies and asked, "Janice, what's with these diapers? Are you babysitting for someone?" "Actually, Mom....I think you need to see this for yourself." Janice replied, as she then called out to you and said, "You can come out now, (Name)." And on cue, you slowly waddled out from behind the couch, revealing yourself to your girlfriend's mother and twin siblings. From there, you then spoke toward Janice's mother and said, "....Hi, Mrs. Connelly. I'm not sure if you recognize me but....i-it's me, (Name), Janice's girlfriend."

Despite your best efforts, you were completely unsure of the reaction upon Mrs. Connelly's face, which soon turned into.....
121311121222221221121111.title: And Speaking of Janice's Family......

choices: Your stomach growling, demanding to be fed.
You wetting your diaper, making you feel very embarrassed.
Actually, it was something else instead.....
1213111212222212211211111.content:
Although there was this sense of confusion and great disbelief within her, Mrs. Connelly eventually began to calm down some, as she drank a cup of De Café Latte, grasping it with a shaky hand, while she looked at you playing around a bit with Katie and Elizabeth in the Living Room. From there, she spoke toward Janice and asked, "So, um..... H-How exactly did this happen to her?"

"Well, (Name) did say that she became this way when she was inside that old house, Mom." Janice replied, helping to ease her mother's nerves some. However, it was there that Mrs. Connelly then turned head to gaze at her eldest daughter and said, "Old house? What old house?" "That same old house across the street from us, Mom." Janice answered, pointing at the old abandoned decrepit house across the street from their home.

Of course, your girlfriend noticed this unnerved look on her mother's face, as Janice displayed a concerned tone in her voice and asked, "Mom? Mom!? Are you....alright? You look like you've seen a ghost." However, her mother continued to stay silent for a moment or two, which made Janice a bit more concerned about her mother when she mentioned the old house. "....You saw something happen in that house, didn't you?" She asked, realizing why her mother was reacting like this just now.

Eventually though, Mrs. Connelly regained her composure some, letting out a deep repressed sigh, as if letting out a skeleton or two in her closet. Then, she gazed back at Janice and said, "Janice, do you......remember my sister, your Aunt Josephine?" "....Yeah. I mean, sure she was a tad....immature for someone her age, but she was pretty much a fun person when I was a girl. But.....why are you asking me this, Mom?" Janice asked, becoming confused herself as to why her mother was talking about her Aunt Josephine just now.

Of course, her mother eventually gave her those answers, as Mrs. Connelly spoke to her as calm as she possibly could and answered, "Aunt Josephine....was a victim of a curse from that dreaded house across the street, just like how your girlfriend became afflicted as well." "*scoff* Mom, you know there are no such things as curses, right?" Janice scoffed, thinking the caffeine-free Latte her mother was drinking might be making her delusional. However, that was far from the truth, as Mrs. Connelly looked at her daughter with a set of serious-looking eyes, letting Janice know that she wasn't bullshitting around, where she then calmed down and spoke again as she explained, "That's what I thought, too. Or at least, back when I was around your age, Janice. Back when Josephine and I were your age, we decided to enter the old house on Halloween Night with my friends Emily, Alyssa, and Claudia. We heard of the old legends of Mrs. Fatsworth, of how she would take in kids who happen to come onto her doorstep, fatten them up like something out of Hansel and Gretel,and then dress them up like big babies, making them wear diapers and other baby clothes. At first, we thought our folks were trying to scare us. *sigh* Oh, how awfully wrong we were."

Although she was still unsure if this had anything to do with your transformation into a fat diapered Unicorn from her favorite TV show, Janice couldn't help but have her attention becoming invested in her mother's story, just as Mrs. Connelly continued speaking and explained, "By the time we all entered inside the house, something felt very....off, about the place. On the outside, the house looked old and completely abandoned. But on the inside, everything looked brand new, as if the house was built recently. But over time, we began to experience these....changes, as we further explored the house. First, we became really hungry, wanting to devour an entire Thanksgiving dinner. Then, we lost control of our bladders and bowels, forcing us to wear those thick diapers. Finally, as we ate more of the food and drank from those oversized baby bottles, we began to fatten up like pigs, ripping and tearing through our costumes. It....it changed us forever, as the ghost of Mrs. Fatsworth began to dress us up in these large baby clothes, attempting to make us her new babies."

The more Janice continued to hear her mother's story, the more it made sense to her, which would explain why her Mom had this fat physique, along with still looking like she was in her late 20s. And yet, Janice couldn't help but ask her Mom a question as she asked, "Does that mean....you're still wearing...diapers?" Inevitably, Mrs. Connelly gave her eldest daughter a small glimpse at her undergarments underneath her sweatpants, revealing a thick bulky diaper before her, confirming what Janice had speculated, as well as making her butt appear even larger. Although this came as a surprise to her daughter, Mrs. Connelly continued her explanation and said, "What happened at that house affected us on different levels, some a bit worse than others. I mean, Josephine still continued to dress up as a big fat baby, even out in public. Claudia was fattened up to almost immobility and has to wear these custom-made diapers and clothes. Even Emily and Alyssa continue as they are now, making a name for themselves on those, um...... Adult Baby websites."

"And yet, I'm afraid we weren't the last people to have entered that damned house and been changed into big babies. I'm sure you might've noticed a few people you know at school who've been affected as well'" She said, looking at Janice with a concerned look in her eyes. However, Janice couldn't help but feel like her Mom was actually right about what's happened to you. After all, she remembered a school friend and fellow Brony, Angela Scott, was once skinny as a rail and a popular girl. Unfortunately, all of that changed in last year's Halloween , asAngela was nowadays 450 pounds fatter and now wears thick bulky diapers underneath her skirts, being made fun of by her former friends due to her new appearance, calling Angela names like "Big Baby Angela" or "Fatty Angie".

"Yeah. Angela Scott, I remember her being skinny as a rail before she was dared to enter that old house last Halloween. When I met up with her again, she was 450 pounds fatter and now wears diapers underneath her clothes. At first, I thought it was simply a phase she was going through. But now, after what you told me....I think she was forced to be like that when she went inside that house." Janice answered, realizing that what her mother, Aunt, their friends, and Angela had to endure weren't at all isolated incidents whatsoever, but they were all connected to the old house of Mrs. Fatsworth.

Almost as if she was expecting something like this, Mrs. Connelly spoke toward Janice once more and replied, "Then you now know that the Fatsworth House is haunted, and what that damned place is capable of. You're very lucky that you weren't affected like me and you Aunt Josephine were. Otherwise, you would've ended up being stuck in diapers for the rear of your life." "But still...why does this have to do with what happened to (Name)?" Janice asked, still trying to wrap her brain around how the haunted Fatsworth House was connected to your transformation into a fat diapered Unicorn from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.

Of course, in response to her daughter's unanswered question, Mrs. Connelly gazed upon you while you're playing with Katie and Elizabeth, then returned her gaze back onto Janice and explained, "....To be honest, even I'm not sure how this occurred with your girlfriend. However, I do believe it has something to do with what exactly they have preoccupied in their mind. Maybe you forced enough My Little Pony-related stuff into (Name)'s mind, that the house manifested such a transformation being possible." Although she was able to receive the necessary answers to what was going on, both Janice and Mrs. Connelly were suddenly interrupted, which came in the form of....
1213111212222212211211111.title: Diapered Revelations

choices: From there, you both went downstairs for dinner.

Unfortunately, due to your current pastel-colored equine state and from your earlier binge at the old house of Mrs. Fatsworth, you began to subconsciously wet the front of your bulky diaper, causing the padded infantile undergarment to sag downward some due to the extra weight from your urine. In turn, this made your somewhat chubby cheeks blush a deep crimson red hue, showing your embarrassed expression on full display.

Of course, being the children that they were, Katie and Elizabeth inadvertently informed their mother and older sister of your "accident", as Katie spoke up and exclaimed, "Mommy!! (Name) wet her diaper!" Obviously, this made you blush even further than normal, causing most of your plump equine head and snout to turn a crimson hue from a mix of humiliation and utter embarrassment. After all, you didn't intentionally wet yourself on purpose, it just happened, which made your current situation all the more embarrassing.

Fortunately for you, Janice's mother seemed to be very reassuring and understanding of your predicament, as Mrs. Connelly then calmly approached you whilst speaking to the twins and replied, "Now now, Katie. I'm sure (Name) here didn't wet herself in purpose. Now, why don't you and Elizabeth watch some TV with Janice while I change (Name)'s diaper?" In response to her mother's words, Katie nodded once or twice in agreement and answered, "Okay, Mommy!"

From there, Katie and Elizabeth joined Janice in the couch, just as your girlfriend pressed the power button in the TV remote to turn in the television, while you waddled alongside Mrs. Connelly, heading upstairs and into her bedroom, all while she carried a package of diapers from the wagon that you and Janice had to roll inside her home. You had to admit, it was quite a luxurious bedroom, complete with a Queen-sized master bed and flatscreen TV for personal use. "Now then, would you please lay in your back, dear?" Mrs. Connelly asked, asking you to lay down in your back so she can change your diaper more easily.

First, she unclipped the buttons in the crotch of your purple onesie, obtaining easier access to your diaper. Of course, you couldn't help but blush out of sheer embarrassment regarding your current physical ordeal, especially since you were having your diaper changed by your girlfriend's mother of all the people who've now seen you in your current form. Inevitably, as she untaped the wet diaper from your fat pony flank, Mrs. Connelly couldn't help but emit a light giggle out of finding you looking quite adorable, both with you in your current equine state and in an adorable purple onesie.

"*giggle* I'm so sorry, my dear. It's just that you look quite adorable, given your current physique and clothing." Mrs. Connelly said, apologizing for her behavior, which didn't help matters, as you displayed a crimson blush upon your chubby cheeks out of embarassment. Shortly after wiping your pink furry equine crotch clean with baby wipes, Mrs. Connelly then began to lightly powder both your crotch and flank with baby powder, preventing you from having a diaper rash once she re-inserts a clean diaper upon your plump Unicorn flank.

Finally, as she opened the package of diapers and pulled out another thick bulky diaper for you to wear, Mrs. Connelly opened the diaper, pulled your purple and green equine tail through the diaper's tail-hole, then wrapped the diaper around your waist, and finally taped the infantile undergarment, securing it in place. Although the whole ordeal was quite an embarrassing predicament, you couldn't help but admit it felt quite...relaxing, to be pampered a bit, despite your current predicament, just as Janice's mother buttoned up the front of the purple onesie, then helped pull you up onto your hooves.
12131112122222122112111112.title: Wetting Oneself

choices: Then, you all heard Mrs. Connelly announcing that it's dinner time.
Then, you all heard someone knocking in the door from outside.
121311121222221221121111122.content:
Then, after you got back onto your pastel-colored hooves, you looked up at Mrs. Connelly, blushing somewhat out of timid but grateful embarrassment and said, "Um....Th-Thank you, Mrs. Connelly." "You're welcome, (Name). And please, call me Rosanne." Mrs. Connelly replied, willingly giving you permission to call her by her first name, where she then grabbed the wet soggy diaper you previously wore moments ago, bundled it up into a ball, and finally tossed it into the nearby trash bin for disposal.

From there, Janice's mother politely opened the door for you, allowing you to exit the bedroom with ease, despite your bulging equine bulk. However, it wasn't exactly a cakewalk when it came to traversing up and down stairs in your current physical state, but it was something you had to quickly adjust to, especially since there was a high chance that you're going to be stuck in this form for quite a while, as the constant clopping noises when your hooves connected with the hardwood flooring of the stairs avidly reminded you of your pastel equine predicament.

Along the way down, you took notice of what exactly Janice, Katie, and Elizabeth were currently watching in the large television screen, an episode of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. In turn, this made your pony ears flatten off to the sides of your Unicorn head in what felt like a mix between frustration and humiliating irony, causing you to let out an almost defeated sigh and thought, "*sigh* Out of all the animals to be turned into, why did it have to be from a cartoon my girlfriend is obsessed with?"

"I'll be preparing dinner for all of us. Why don't you spend the time with Janice and the twins, (Name)?" Mrs. Connelly asked, wanting to have you temporarily preoccupied until she finishes making dinner for you and the rear of her family. Left with little to no choice on the matter as Janice's mother walked into the kitchen, you waddled over toward Janice and her younger twin sisters over on the couch, who were having a bit of a chuckle over what was being transpired on the TV screen, where Twilight Sparkle and her dragon assistant Spike were running away from an excited mob of ponies over a pair of tickets to the Grand Galloping Gala, which you found out from Janice that it was a big fancy party in the show's capital city of Canterlot. Though you would never publicly admit it, the show had become far more intriguing than expected, especially this was a reboot of a show from the 1980s originally created simply because the toys were a success, kinda like how Transformers and G.I. Joe started out in their heyday.

Of course, as you were about to lay down on the carpet floor belly first, Janice and the twins became aware of you, where your girlfriend looked at you and said, "Hey, sweetie! Why don't you sit up here with us? It's more comfortable than laying on the carpet."For some weird reason, you simply couldn't say no to Janice, as you slowly made your way up onto the L-Shaped couch with some difficulty, due to your newfound equine anatomy, your extra body fat, and of course, the thick bulky diaper strapped around your waist and flank.

Eventually, you successfully made it up onto the couch with some effort, where you then laid down on you plump Unicorn abdomen against the comfy couch seat, having yourself facing the TV, much to your dismay. After all, you knew better than to get in the way between your girlfriend and her favorite TV show, giving you no choice but to endure the pastel pony insanity that was My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.

However, just as another episode of My Little Pony was about to come on, you then heard Elizabeth speak to directly with a question in mind and asked, "Hey (Name), Janice told us you don't like My Little Pony. Is that true?" Upon hearing such a question coming from the mouth of a girl as old as Elizabeth and Katie, you couldn't help but feel conflicted with your answer. On one hand, if you told her that you didn't like the show, it would be like telling a little girl that Santa Claus or the Easter Bunny aren't real. But on the other hand, if you flat-out lied that you like My Little Pony like Janice does, then she would probably ask you a question that you don't know the answer to, like what's your favorite moment from the show and why.

Eventually, as you unleashed a defeated sigh, you turned your slightly plump Unicorn head to the left, looking at Elizabeth and Katie, where you then spoke up and explained, "...To be honest, Elizabeth, I um....I'm not exactly a huge fan of My Little Pony like you, Katie, and Janice are, but....I can't help but admit that I am curious by how...different, Friendship is Magic actually is from the original show from the 80s. I mean, given the fact their I no longer have a human body, I should at least try to, erm...."adjust", to this new body of mine as best as I possibly can."

Obviously, you couldn't help but blush throughout the whole explanation, where you girlfriend had this smug smirk of satisfaction in her face as she gazed upon you and said, "I'm sorry, what did you just say, (Name)?" In response, you let out a somewhat frustrated sigh, putting a right forehoof to your equine forehead and bluntly answered, "Yes, I admit it! I like My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic! Geez, you don't need to rub it in, Janice." "*giggle* What can I say? I tease because I love, sweetie." Janice replied, where she then wrapped her arms around you round plump equine frame, delivering a tender kiss upon you left cheek, causing you to blush out of romantic feelings toward your girlfriend.
121311121222221221121111122.title: Prepping For Dinner

choices: Retired to her bedroom, for a good night sleep.
Stayed up a little longer to watch TV.
Actually, the two of you did something else instead....
1213111212222212211211111221.content:
However, the loving moment of embrace was abruptly interrupted, which originated in the form of Mrs. Connelly announcing dinner as she exclaimed, "Girls, it's dinner time!" From there, Janice unwrapped her arms from your equine body, where she then joined her mother and sisters, rushing toward the Dining Room table with gusto. Of course, you soon followed suit, but not at such an accelerated pace as your beloved girlfriend due to not just your equine physique, but also from your added bulk and thickly padded diaper wrapped comfortably around your rounded waist and plump flank.

Eventually, you waddled your way into the Dining Room, complete with lavish decorations, sturdy mahogany widen chairs, and a lengthy spruce table. You decided to take a seat next to Janice, with Katie and Elizabeth sitting opposite of you and your girlfriend at the table, where you sat onto the chair with some difficulty. Once you finally sat you flank upon the chair's seat, your diaper unleashed a loud crinkling noise, causing you to blush some out of embarrassment due to the infantile undergarment. And speaking of the Connelly matriarch, Janice's mother eventually approached the table, dinner plates in both hands, as she handed out the somewhat varied meals amongst her 3 daughters and herself.

Though, as for if you were given a hearty meal yourself, Mrs. Connelly hand you a plate full of a lettuce dressed with red salad dressing glazed over bits of the lettuce leaves for extra flavor. Although you weren't exactly the type who would prefer salad over a finely grilled steak or shake-and-baked pork chops, you heard Mrs. Connelly speak to you as she sat down in her own chair, facing you, Janice, and the twins then said, "I apologize for only giving you a plate of salad, (Name). But I have a feeling that your new body won't be able to digest meat."

From hearing her opinion, you had a feeling that Mrs. Connelly might be right on the money. After all, Ponies were simply miniature horses, and since horses happen to be herbivores, they can't consume meat without getting sick from devouring said meat. Once more, you had little to no choice on the matter at hand (or hoof, in your case), as your equine ears flattened out to the sides in disappointment from such information. But still, it was better than nothing, as you began to eat the salad laid out on the plate before you, using your slightly plump pony snout to grab and devour the lettuce leaves.

However, due to your inexperience with eating in such a manner, you inadvertently made a bit of a mess, slightly messing the front of your onesie with a few minor stains. In turn, this prompted Janice to quickly grab a clean washrag, and tuck a piece of it under the onesie's collar, thus creating a makeshift bib for you, which made you feel even more embarrassed as your girlfriend spoke to you and said, "There you go, (Name). That should keep you from making anymore messes."

Shortly after returning to her respective seat, Mrs. Connelly began to speak to both you and her daughters, then explained, "Now, I'm sure you're already aware of (Name)'s....predicament, of becoming a Unicorn from the show My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. But! That still doesn't mean she isn't the same girl that Janice fell in love with.
