However, since her parents aren't fully aware as to what's happened to her as of yet, (Name) will be staying here with us from this day forward."

In response to such news, Katie and Elizabeth shouted with glee and excitement in their voices, ecstatic over the realization that you're going to be staying with them. Then again, you felt more comfortable alongside Janice, so your new home basically had some positive aspects to it. Eventually, after finishing your supper, you and Janice...
1213111212222212211211111221.title: Of Dinner And Announcements

choices: You eventually accepted Luna's offer, joining her at the table for tea.
You politely refused Luna's offer, maybe considering it for another time.
12131112122222122112111112211.content:
Once you both proceeded inside your girlfriend's bedroom upstairs, Janice closed the door behind you and her, then approached the drawer where her clothes were currently stored in, opened one of the drawer slots, and grabbed a matching pair of pink pajamas. In appearance, the pajama top had long sleeves while the pajama bottoms were the physical equivalent to short-shorts. However, both of these garments of clothing were adorned with numerous images of Pinkie Pie, another main character from the show, displayed in various different poses littered across the fleece clothing.

Once she donned the pajama bottoms and buttoned up the pajama top, Janice then turned around to face you and said, "Here, let me roll out the futon, (Name)." From there, Janice approached the couch laid out in her room, and began to pull out the seat of the furniture, converting the futon into it's bed form. Shortly after that, she gathered a pillow or two and a large blanket for you to use, with comfort in mind.

But as the sun finally sets over the horizon and day transitioned into night, you carefully climbed up onto your new bed, hearing these light creaking sounds emanating from the futon, due to your newly acquired girth upon your equine frame, where Janice then pulled the blanket over your body to cover you up for warmth as you laid your head in the pillows. "Again, I'm sorry about what's happened to you, (Name). I wish there was someway I can help you." Janice said, feeling sympathetic toward your current plight, as she slowly made her way into her own respective bed, laying down and covering herself up with the blankets.

However, feeling sorry yourself for seeing your beloved girlfriend in such a mood, you spoke toward Janice and answered, "That's not true, Janice. I mean, sure I'm still stuck like this, but....you helped me when no one else could. You believed me, you gave me a roof over my head, and your family even allowed me to stay here. So, don't best yourself up because I'm still a fat Unicorn in diapers...okay?"

Upon hearing what you said to her, Janice couldn't help but display a tender loving smirk on her face, feeling reassured from your words, as she then spoke to you and replied, "Aww! Thank you, (Name). Well, goodnight, sweetie." "You too, Janice. You too." You said, as Janice then turned off the lamp in her bedroom, immersing the room in darkness. You then slowly closed your eyes and dozed off to sleep, where only dreams awaited you.

------

Once you finally drifted to slumber, you began to dream. However, the dreamy landscape took on the form of a place that was familiar, yet...foreign, at the same time. In appearance, the area looked to be a hybrid blend between Janice's home, and the interior of Twilight Sparkle's home, as the organic tree-like walls and stacks of numerous books meshed with the contemporary furniture and carpeting floor of Janice's home.

And yet, you couldn't help but have this gnawing feeling that someone...or something, was watching you closely from the shadows. In an attempt to discover these answers, you yelled out into the empty dreamy atmosphere and exclaimed, "Alright, I know you're out there watching me, whoever you are! Come out and show yourself!" Of course, as if your pleas have been answered, you were about to discover the identity of your stalker, as a piece of the environment began to warp and distort akin to something out of the movie Inception, almost as if someone or something was about to enter your dreamscape.

However, once the distortion began to clear up, you were now face-to-face with your stalker. And boy, you honestly did not expect to see what, or rather who, stood before you: The famed Princess Luna, co-ruler of Equestria and younger sister of Princess Celestia, from the show My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. Once more, you felt as if fate itself was conspiring to convert you into becoming a Brony like Janice. And yet, as you stood there in disbelief and a hint of frustration on your equine head and snout, you suddenly felt a quick slap against your left cheek, which felt quite real from your perspective.

But upon looking upward, you noticed that Luna was now only a foot in front of you, which made you jump back out of shock, despite your weight and girth. From there, the Alicorn princess began to speak toward you, bearing a calm and patient tone in her voice and said, "Fret not, my little pony. Thy have not come to bring harm upon you." "No, no, no! You got it all wrong! I'm not a pony, I'm a human! ...or at least, that's what I used to be." You answered, attempting to correct the individual who was supposed to be a fictional character before you.

In response to your words, Luna looked back at you and replied, "And yet, thou stand as a Unicorn before us. However..." Before she continued speaking, Luna became fully aware of your current articles of clothing, raising a groomed eyebrow in the process, where she then slowly circled around you, closely examining your appearance and such, then continued speaking as she politely asked, "...Why are thou wearing such....infantile garments?" Of course, Luna's question caused you to blush greatly, as your slightly plump cheeks turned a crimson hue, while you timidly looked away from gazing upon the Alicorn princess.

Fortunately, Luna easily understood that the choice of clothing wasn't of your own volition, as she gently laid a right forehoof on your shoulder in reassurance and said, "...I see. Thou are plagued with a unique curse. Quite...unusual, indeed." Somewhat surprised by Luna having such a revelation, you looked back toward the princess and asked, "W-What? How did you know that I was cursed?"

From there, in response to your question, Luna's horn began to glow with a cobalt blue aura, which revealed an elegant full-body mirror before you, as it displayed a number of vividly detailed memories, right up to when you were transformed into a fat diapered Unicorn straight out of a show made for girls. Then, Luna spoke to you once more and explained, "Through this mirror, thy can glimpse into your memories, understand what thou have endured. My sincerest apologies for thou being afflicted with a curse, (Name)." After a brief moment of silence, you eventually spoke up toward the Alicorn princess and said, "Um...thank you, I guess. But...are you real, or...just a figment of my imagination?"

Upon hearing such an odd question, Luna couldn't help but unleash an amused giggle from your words, stifling said giggle with a forehoof against her equine snout. Shortly after that form of personal amusement, the Alicorn princess made the mirror disappear, the proceeded to conjure up a fancy table with two chairs standing opposite of one another, complete with a tea set made for two testing on the table surface. From there, Luna politely gestured you to accompany her at the table and asked, "Well, why don't we discuss such a topic over some tea?"
12131112122222122112111112211.title: Dreaming of Luna

choices: Nothing interrupted you and Luna, please continue.
However, an outside force interrupted you and Luna, what could it be?
121311121222221221121111122111.content:
Although you felt as if it was weird when it came to spending quality time with a supposedly fictional character from a girls' cartoon inside your dreams, you couldn't help but feel...mighty curious and tempted about this dreamy conundrum, feeling that maybe, just maybe...you'll possibly get some decent answers regarding your predicament. Eventually though, you made your final decision, and decided to accompany Luna by spending some time with her over some tea, despite the fact that this was all inside your dreams.

Of course, you still had to waddle your way over to the table, due to both you plump equine frame and the thick padded diaper around your waist and flank. Upon seeing your forced method of locomotion as she sat down in a chair, Luna had to forcefully stifle her giggles for obvious reasons, as you then climbed up onto the chair and sat down in the seat, with your diaper making these loud crinkle noises once more when you sat your padded flank down, causing your cheeks to turn as red as ripe tomatoes. "*giggle* My apologies once again, dear (Name). Its just that thy find thou quite adorable with such a profound form of walking." Luna said, apologizing as she used her magic to levitate the tea kettle, surrounding the ceramic kettle with the exact same cobalt blue aura.

From there, she began to pour some tea into her cup, and then into your respective cup as well. However, taking a sip from a cup of tea was obviously easier said than done, as you began to fiddle a bit with the teacup in your forehooves, struggling to maintain a completely stable grip on the ceramic cup with major difficulty due to the lack of human digits. Fortunately for you, Luna was able to aid you in maintaining your grip on the teacup, surrounding the ceramic cup with a cobalt aura, using her magic to levitate it in front of you, where you were then able to drink a good enough sip from the teacup before she began to speak toward you and explained, "...Now, to answer your previous question, yes...thy am quite as real as thou are capable of speech."

"But....B-But how? Last time I checked, you're a fictional character from a cartoon made for little girls." You asked, becoming quite confused as to how it was possible for Luna to physically exist in reality, just as the Alicorn princess fired back verbally and remarked, "And yet, here thy am, developing a nice friendly conversation with thou while we are drinking tea." Then, after drinking another sip from her own teacup, Luna spoke to you once more, continuing her previous conversation and said, "However, what surprises thee is that thou are unable to use magic, especially since thou happen to be a Unicorn."

Of course, hearing what she had previously mentioned, you were reminded that you're now a Unicorn, albeit a fat Unicorn wearing diapers, but still a Unicorn nonetheless, as your eyes gazed upward and noticed the Unicorn horn protruding from your upper forehead. "Oh.....right. But still, even if I'm now a Unicorn, I don't even know how to use magic like you do!" You exclaimed, still unsure how you would be able to wield magic like Luna does, despite now being a Unicorn.

However, in an attempt to unlock your untapped magic potential, Luna calmly dismounted from the chair, walked over toward the kitchen counter, and then used her magic to levitate a salt shaker in front of her. From there, Luna tossed the salt shaker directly at you, where you yelped a loud "Eep!" in response to such action, closing your eyes tightly and throwing your forehooves up to protect yourself from physical harm.

But then, just as you were expecting some form of physical impact, you felt...nothing. At first, you thought it was because you were dreaming. However, once you slowly opened your eyes, it was revealed that the salt shaker was stopped dead in it's tracks, as a green and pink aura surrounded the appliance whilst it floated there in mid-air. But once your eyes gazed upward toward your forehead, you quickly noticed that your Unicorn horn was glowing with the same pink and green aura, which made you inevitably realize something: You're the one who stopped the salt shaker, you could use magic now!
121311121222221221121111122111.title: Tea For Two

choices: Janice decided to change your diaper herself.
Janice decided to ask her mother for help in changing your diaper.
Actually, something else entirely happened instead.....
1213111212222212211211111221112.content:
Unfortunately, your brief moment of surprising revelation was abruptly cut short, as you and Luna both heard a voice echoing in your dreams as the voice said, "(Name), wake up! Come on, wake up (Name)!" However, you instantly recognized such a voice belonging to none other than your beloved girlfriend Janice. And judging from the concerned tone in her voice, something was happening back in the physical world. "That's Janice! She must be trying to wake me up." You said, realizing that you had to wake up, just as you notice the dreamy environment was becoming blurry and distorted at the same time, slowly unraveling before your eyes, along with indicating that you're slowly but surely regaining consciousness.

"Then thy am afraid that our time together has come to an end for now." Luna replied, knowing that she must now leave you for the time being, as the Alicorn princess began to slowly dissipate from your dream. But then, knowing that you still need more answers, you quickly turned around to confront Luna and asked, "Wait a minute! I-I still have questions! How will I be able to contact you?!"

"Although our time together is brief, thy shall keep a close eye on thou, (Name). Once thou have fallen into slumber once more, shout thy name, and thou shall summon thee." Luna thoroughly explained, reassuring you that you'll eventually meet her again in the near future, which gave you some fortunate relief on the subject. In response, for the very first time in your life, you bowed before the Alicorn princess with gratitude in your heart, as you spoke to her and replied, "Thank you, princess. Thank you!" "No need to praise thee, dear (Name). And please...call thee Luna. Thy might be of royalty, but thy want thou to view thee as an equal, nothing more." Luna answered, showing humility before you, wanting you to treat her simply as your equal.

But as the dreamscape began to progressively deconstruct itself, Luna delivered her goodbyes before leaving your dream, as she spoke toward you once more and said, "Farewell, my little pony. Pray that our paths shall cross again soon." And with that, Luna eventually disappeared from your sight, just as the dreamy landscape became nothing but a blank white canvas within your subconscious.

------

Shortly after that, you felt your eyelids slowly open, gazing with blurry vision at first. But soon, your vision cleared up, only to reveal Janice sitting right next to you, where she stopped shaking your round equine frame, relieved to see you awake once more, prompting her to wrap you in a compassionate embrace, concerned over your well-being as she said, "Oh thank God you're awake."

"...Janice? *long yawn* What...w-what happened? Why...why were you shaking me just now?" You asked, still feeling a bit drowsy from sleeping, as you gazed upon you girlfriend with a sleepy yet confused look on your face and snout. However, you noticed that it was early in the morning, as the sun began to peek over the horizon. From there, Janice severed her embrace on you and explained, "Well, you see... When I woke up, your horn was glowing pink and green, and you began to lift up some of my stuff with that same aura while you were still asleep. I'm not sure what you did moments ago, but...I think you were using magic."

Then, there was this brief moment of silence from you, feeling as if you were a little kid who stole from the cookie jar when nobody was looking. However, your girlfriend could obviously see right through your thoughts, as she calmly spoke toward you and slowly asked, "That...that was magic, wasn't it?" Obviously, Janice hot the nail on the coffin with that simple question, which caused you to let out a defeated sigh, as your eyes slowly looked around the room and noticed how some of Janice's belongings were scattered around you in a broken circular shape, like someone had moved them just recently.

Inevitably, you gazed back upon your girlfriend and confessed, "*sigh*...Yeah, Janice. That...that was magic. I just used magic." Although this would have come to her as a shock, Janice remained mostly calm throughout your short confession. After all, she was known to be somewhat optimistic on such matters, since she was able to cope with the truth that you've been transformed into a fat diaper-wearing Unicorn.

"But still, how are you able to use magic now, (Name)? I mean, the last time I checked, you had trouble trying to grab and hold a cup with your hooves." Janice asked, attempting to receive the necessary answers from you, where you pressed the tips of your forehooves together in hesitation, then spoke toward your girlfriend and answered, "I, um....I-I had some help, Janice." Of course, Janice inevitably made a witty remark as her question and said, "Let me guess: Princess Luna visited you in your dreams and taught you how to use magic? *giggle*"

However, what Janice thought was a bit of sarcasm on her part, she coincidentally guessed it precisely unbeknownst to her knowledge, where you then solidly nodded in confirmation toward your beloved girlfriend. In turn, this left Janice in minor disbelief over your answer. After all, she was one of those Bronies who firmly wanted to believe that Equestria, Princess Celestia, Luna, the Mane Six, and everything else from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic is very much as real as requiring oxygen to breathe. And yet, here you are, a human girl who was transformed into a fat diapered Unicorn before your own girlfriend to gaze upon.

Despite hearing such a revelation, Janice couldn't help but sit there in shock and awe, now aware that the possibility of Equestria really existing outside of mere fiction left her mind "blown", so to speak. However, in an attempt to snap her out of her surprised stupor, you lightly kicked Janice with a hindhoof against her knee, making sure you haven't dislocated her kneecap in the process as you said, "Janice? Janice, snap out of it!"

Fortunately, your kick proved to be most effective, as Janice snapped out of her stupor, then looked at you and answered, "Erm, sorry about that." "Look, I'll explain it to you later, Janice. But right now, I um..." You replied, blushing a great deal over the sudden realization that your pink furry crotch now felt quite damp and moist, which only meant one thing: You've wet your diaper...again. As your slightly chubby cheeks blushed a crimson hue once more, you spoke toward your girlfriend with hesitation and said, "...I-I think I've wet my diaper."

After hearing your words, Janice unfurled the blanket from your equine body, easily noticing how thicker your diaper had become now than it was last night, fitting tightly against the purple onesie you're currently wearing. From there, she then pressed her hand against crotch of the diaper, feeling how bulky, wet, and warm it had become, then unbuttoned the front of the onesie to get a better assessment of the damage, only to see a big yellow stain in full display on the diaper's crotch.
1213111212222212211211111221112.title: Wake-Up Call & A Wet Diaper

choices: Simply telling her mother & sisters about this, without ample evidence.
Withholding such information from them....at least for now.
Actually, you were both interrupted before coming to a decision......
12131112122222122112111112211121.content:
Eventually though, Janice decided that she could change your diaper by herself, as she then spoke toward you and said, "Wait right here, (Name). I'll be right back." From there, she quickly darted out of the bedroom, down the stairs toward the wagon full of supplies, grabbed the previously opened package of diapers and a few other supplies, then ran back upstairs, and returned to her bedroom, ready to change your diaper. In her hands, she grabbed the opened package of diapers, a box of baby wipes, a bottle of baby powder, and a brand new onesie. In appearance, the onesie was made of fleece like the onesie you're currently wearing, but it was colored a pale yellow hue, complete with a tail-hole in the rump of the onesie for your equine tail.

However, on the rear of the onesie, it bore the enlarged Cutie Mark of Fluttershy, which were these 3 butterflies with magenta wings and purple bodies with antennae. Overall, it was basically a Fluttershy-themed onesie, large enough for someone of your fat equine physique. Once more, you couldn't help but become frustrated at the fact that you would have to wear that style of infantile clothing, as you spoke toward Janice and muttered, "I'm NOT wearing that."

"Would you rather waddle around in nothing but your diaper?" Janice quipped, causing you to turn your slightly plump Unicorn head toward your left, huffing out another defeated sigh. After all, your girlfriend made an embarrassing but valid point, since you weren't accustomed to prancing around the house nude, and you certainly don't plan on doing so now. So, leaving you with little to no choice, you reluctantly agreed with Janice to wear the Fluttershy onesie, simply for the sake of not waddling around her house in nothing but your diaper, despite being covered from head to hoof in pastel pink fur.

"*frustrated sigh* Fine, let's just...get this over with already...please." You answered, looking back at Janice while unlatched the diaper tapes and stripped you of the soggy infantile undergarment, where she then balled it up and tossed it into an empty trash bin nearby for the time being. From there, your girlfriend took out a few baby wipes and began to wipe your equine crotch and flank clean of any potential messes. However, upon closer examination, Janice couldn't help but notice that you looked a tiny bit...fatter, than you were previously last night, as she gently poked and prodded your plump belly a little and asked, "Is it just me, or are you getting a little um...."

"A little what?" You asked, wondering what exactly she was going to say this time. Of course, you were about to get your answer soon, as your girlfriend spoke up once more and replied, "No offense, (Name), but...I think you might be looking a little, um... fatter." Normally, you would feel slightly offended by such a remark. But then again, you couldn't help but have this gnawing feeling that Janice was right about your slight increase in weight, as you poked a bit of your tubby belly with the tip of your forehoof, feeling how soft and plush you were becoming, making you blush even redder than before out of the humiliating possibility of eventually becoming too fat to move under your own power, a fate you would desperately had to avoid like the bubonic plague.

"*sigh*...Yeah, I wouldn't be surprised if some of the stuff I ate or drank in that house had something in it that was slowly making me a little fatter, Janice. Even if I was simply eating a bucking salad." You explained, just as you felt your girlfriend administering baby powder across your crotch and flank to prevent a diaper rash. "Now, could you please lift your butt up for me?" Janice asked, so she could insert you into a clean diaper more easily, much to your utter embarrassment in this situation. After all, having your diaper changed by Mrs. Connelly: Somewhat embarrassing. Having your diaper changed by your own girlfriend: MUCH more embarrassing.

But as she pulled your equine tail through the diaper's tail-hole, Janice reverted back to the topic at hand, while she pulled the front of the diaper over your crotch, then taped the thickly padded undergarment together, securing the bulky diaper comfortably around your waist and plump flank as she answered, "Maybe you're right. After all, from what my Mom had told me yesterday, that house belonged to some woman named Mrs. Fatsworth. Apparently, she liked to fatten up kids who approach her house and make them into big fat babies, making them wear diapers and adult-sized baby clothes. Anyway, let's get you into that Fluttershy onesie, sweetie."

After sealing you in a brand new diaper, Janice began to carefully strip you of the Twilight Sparkle onesie, tossing the large infantile garment into her personal hamper to be washed with her laundry at a later time. From there, she unbuttoned the front flap of the Fluttershy onesie, allowing her to equip it onto you with greater ease, especially since the yellow onesie had long sleeves for warmth during times when the climate becomes colder, now that winter was fast approaching. Then, she buttoned up the flaps of the onesie, securing you in the themed infantile article of clothing. Once you were now fully dressed for the day, Janice helped you onto your hooves by rolling you off towards one side of the futon bed, where you then landed all four hooves upon the carpet rug and hardwood floor.

"And yet, as much as I am super excited to hear that everything from MLP could exist, you still explain to me how and why Princess Luna would contact you in your dreams, (Name)." Janice remarked, gazing back at you while she put a hand on her hip, as you slowly turned around to confront her, waddling due to wearing a thick diaper around your waist and flank. From there, you gazed up at your girlfriend and answered, "When we first met in my dreams, Luna thought that I was born this way, even though I flat-out told her the truth that I was once human. However, she somehow....looked, through my memories, using some sort of magical mirror. I'm not sure how she's able to do all of this, but you're the only person I know of who happens to be an expert on My Little Pony, since I don't know jack on the "how" part. So, can you help explain it to me...please?"

"....Well, since you asked nicely. From what I remember in my extensive knowledge of My Little Pony, Princess Luna's duties and magical powers as Princess of the Night aren't limited to simply raising and lowering the moon. She also oversees the dreams of ponies, whether they're a Unicorn, a Pegasus, an Earth Pony, or even an Alicorn. Not to mention, she is also capable of traversing from dream to dream as well." Although you had essentially become confused from the explanation, Janice eventually simplified the explanation and said, "In layman's terms, she's basically the My Little Pony equivalent to Morpheus, the God of dreams and sleep from Greek Mythology. See, even I've been paying attention in Mr. Johnson's World History Class."

"...I see." You bluntly replied, wrapping your brain around such information, as you then spoke back toward your girlfriend and said, "But still, how are we going to exposing what I saw in my dreams to your mother and sisters? I mean, its not like they're going to believe us right off the bat." Upon hearing what you said, Janice knew you made a very valid argument. After all, her mother and sisters weren't going to believe both you and her on quite a tale without substantial evidence to back such a claim. In the end though, she eventually decided on...
12131112122222122112111112211121.title: Explanations & Diaper Changes

choices: She was going out shopping for some necessities for your stay.
She was heading off to work, temporarily filling in for a colleague of hers.
Actually, it was a completely different answer than expected....
121311121222221221121111122111212.content:
Although she would have preferred the alternative, Janice was aware that you were possibly right about simply telling her mother and twin sisters without ample evidence of such an encounter. So in the end, your girlfriend inevitably decided to stick with your plan on withholding the information regarding Princess Luna...at least, for the time being. "*sigh*...Yeah, I guess you're right. We'll stick with not telling my Mom, Katie, and Elizabeth...at least, until we get concrete proof of Luna's actual existence. But still, how are we going to explain to them that you can use magic now?" Janice asked, trying to figure out how to explain such a conundrum to her own family.

But suddenly, you both heard the voice of Mrs. Connelly, who was currently downstairs, as she aimed upward toward the bedroom and exclaimed, "Janice, (Name), are you up yet? Breakfast is ready!" Shortly after hearing her mother's voice, you then looked down at Janice's Rarity plushie, and began to use your newfound magical abilities to levitate the stuffed animal in front of your girlfriend as practice, causing your Unicorn horn to glow with a pink and green aura while the Rarity plushie was surrounded with a much similar aura.

"Its simple, honey: We show your mother and sisters what I can do, and then explain how I somehow unlocked such power when you saw me using magic while I was asleep." You answered, as you then gently laid the Rarity plushie back down onto the bed's surface, where you then spoke toward Janice once more and said, "Anyway, let's head downstairs for breakfast. I'm starving!"

From there, you followed your girlfriend out of her bedroom and down the stairs. Fortunately, you were slowly but progressively becoming accustomed to waddling around in your current equine physique, as you trailed closely behind Janice as the two of you rendezvous with Mrs. Connelly, Katie, and Elizabeth. Plus, it was already a Saturday, so you shouldn't have to be concerned over staying in this house alone for a while. Once you both reached the Dining Room table, both Janice's mother and the twins most definitely noticed your Fluttershy onesie, which made Katie and Elizabeth giggle some over how adorable you appeared in the infantile garment, causing you to blush a crimson hue on your slightly plump cheeks in embarrassment, despite your best attempts to disguise such an emotion.

"Good morning, girls. *giggle* And I must admit, (Name), you do look quite adorable in that onesie." Mrs. Connelly said, complimenting you infantile attire as Janice stuffed a washrag around the onesie's collar to create a makeshift bib. In response, you gazed toward the Connelly matriarch, still blushing from earlier, while you climbed up onto the chair and sat down, where you then looked at Mrs. Connelly and replied, "Um, thank you...I guess."

"You're welcome. Anyway, did you have a good night sleep?" She asked, wondering how you fared last night. "We did, Mom. But...something happened, when I woke up alongside (Name) here."Janice replied, which made her mother and twin sisters quite curious as to what exactly happened, as Mrs. Connelly spoke toward her eldest daughter and asked, "Oh? And what exactly DID happen when you woke up this morning, Janice?"

"Well, it would be best...if I showed you, Mrs. Connelly." You answered, where you then began to concentrate your magic, surrounding your horn in a pink and green aura. From there, you used your magic to move and levitate a fork, waving it around the table in mid-air, which rendered Janice's mother and sisters in complete disbelief upon seeing such a supernatural feat. Then, you stabbed the fork into the short stack of pancakes before you, tearing a decent chunk off the pancake stack, then guided the forkful of flapjack pieces into your waiting equine maw, as you tasted the delicious syrup-coated meal-piece within your mouth, chewing the delicacy before swallowing the remains down your gullet.

Shortly after witnessing what could only be described as magic, Mrs. Connelly regained her composure, gazed upon you and asked, "...That was magic, wasn't it?" In response, you firmly nodded in confirmation toward the Connelly matriarch, causing Katie and Elizabeth to become amazed from witnessing such a spectacle of magic, where Elizabeth looked at you excitedly and exclaimed, "That's. So. Awesome!" "Yeah, but how did you do that? I don't remember seeing you using magic before, (Name)." Katie asked, wanting to know exactly how you're able to use magic like Unicorns and Alicorns do in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, desiring an explanation or two from you both.

After scratching the back of her head a bit for a moment or two, Janice then finally spoke toward her family and explained, "*giggle* Funny you should ask, Katie. You see, when I woke this morning, floating around mid-air in my room, covered with this pink and green aura. However, I then noticed that (Name)'s horn was also glowing with the same colored aura as well, all while she was still asleep. So, I've put two and two together and realized that (Name) was unintentionally causing this, using magic to levitate the stuff in my room." "Yeah, I wasn't even aware that I was doing this at the time. That was when Janice started shaking me, trying to wake me up. Fortunately, it worked, and she then explained what happened while I was asleep. In other words, I can now use magic." You answered, as you then levitate the fork once more and tore off another piece of the pancake stack and consumed the maple syrup-coated treat.

From there, you attempted to lift up the cup of orange juice in front of you with your magic, but to no avail unfortunately, leaving you somewhat disappointed in the process. However, deciding to reassure you, Mrs. Connelly approached you and aided you with drinking the cup of orange juice, slowly ripping the glass cup full of OJ to prevent any future spills or messes upon your Fluttershy onesie.

Of course, after setting the glass cup back onto the tabletop, Janice's mother calmly spoke toward you and said, "I see that you need some practice with your magical powers. Don't worry,(Name), I'm sure you'll get it right eventually." Feeling thankful for her positive support, you light wrapped your forehooves around Mrs. Connelly as best as your current physique would allow, where you spoke to the motherly woman and replied, "Thank you, Mrs. Connelly. It means a lot coming from you." "The pleasure's all mine, (Name). Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to get going." She answered, where Mrs. Connelly began to grab her purse, coat, and car keys, as if she was ready to head off somewhere.

"Say, where are you going anyway, Mom?" Janice asked, curious to know as to what exactly her mother was planning for the day. Of course, in response to her eldest daughter's curiosity, Mrs. Connelly gazed back at your girlfriend and said that...
121311121222221221121111122111212.title: Breakfast at the Connelly House

choices: Actually, you're not even sure yet...
1213111212222212211211111221112121.content:
"Well, since (Name) will be staying with us for quite some time, we will need the required necessities. You know, a large trash bin for disposing any dirty diapers, a changing station that can easily support her weight, and a few other important items. Janice, you'll be tending to your sisters and (Name) here until I return home from shopping. Think you can do that for me?" Mrs. Connelly explained, laying down her plans for the day in front of you and her daughters, along with leaving your girlfriend in charge of the house while her mother is away. Of course, Janice agreed with her mother on her plan, nodding in agreement while she looked at her mother and answered, "Of course, Mom. You can count on me!"

In response to such a confirmation, Mrs. Connelly gazed upon Janice with a reassured smile, where she then approached your girlfriend, hugged her in a thankful embrace, then severed said embrace and replied, "Thank you, Janice. Anyway, I better get going. Have a nice day!" From there, she waved goodbye to you and her 3 daughters as she opened the door, walked outside, then closed the door behind her, and approached her car, starting up it's engine and pulled out of the driveway as she rode off toward the Rossi Shopping Mall for said necessities, leaving you alone with your girlfriend, and her twin sisters.

Then, as you continued tearing off decent chunks of syrup-coated pancakes with the fork that was manipulated by your magic, where you then consumed the crude flapjack slices with relative ease, you slowly moved your eyes toward Katie and Elizabeth, who were displaying these mischievous grins on their faces, as if they were concocting a plan of mischief upon yo-ou. Shortly after swallowing another crude slice of pancakes down your throat, you stared back at the twins and asked, "Um...What are you two planning? Last time I checked, people don't smile like that unless they're going to do some mischief." "*giggle* Oh, we were just...thinking, of doing a few things with you, (Name). *giggle*" Elizabeth said, trying her best to stifle her fits of giggles alongside her twin sibling Katie.

However, feeling a tad paranoid from hearing such a response, you raised an eyebrow in suspicion over the possible intentions of your girlfriend's youthful siblings, as you then spoke toward them once more and asked, "Like what, exactly?" But then, after rushing up the stairs and into their bedroom, Katie and Elizabeth ran downstairs and brought with them what appeared to be a decorative box, filled to the brim with lipstick, eyeliner, eyeshadow, and other assorted makeup accessories, where the twins then spoke toward you in unison and excitedly exclaimed, "A My Little Pony Makeover!!" Upon hearing those from the youthful identical duo, you lost your concentration on your magic, causing the fork to drop onto the plate with a loud sharp clang, for you simply wouldn't have none of it.

After all, Katie and Elizabeth were using your current predicament as a mere excuse to dress you up and apply makeup onto you like some equine baby doll. In turn, this made you somewhat furious, rapidly waving your forehooves from side-to-side in a declined response while you yelled, "Nononono NO!! There's no way in He- Hay, that you two are getting me dolled up! I'm not some stupid you to played around with!" "Aww! Come on, (Name). Aren't you being just a little harsh on them? I mean, they only want to play with you." Janice answered, attempting to calm you down some, especially since her twin sisters were only taking advantage of your equine affliction so they can have you play with them.

Of course, after hearing your girlfriend's explanation, you then looked back toward Katie and Elizabeth, who simply stared at you with sets of puppy dog eyes, physically pleading for to have them give you a makeover. Then, knowing that they were going to possibly annoy you on end until you have them give you a makeover, you let out a frustrated sigh, pressing a forehoof against your forehead just below your Unicorn horn in a facepalmed gesture, then spoke back toward the twin sisters and muttered, "Alright alright, fine! I'll...I'll let you do your stupid makeover."

In response to your reluctantly coerced acceptance, Katie and Elizabeth couldn't help but shout with glee, lightly bouncing up and down in excitement and eager anticipation, where they then forcefully dragged you away from the Dining Room table, up the stairs, and into their bedroom, prepping you for the inevitable makeover. Eventually, by the time they were finished and you were able to leave the room return downstairs, the overall experience was...
1213111212222212211211111221112121.title: While Mom's Out Shopping, The Bronies Will Play

choices: Heard your stomach growling, demanding to be fed.
Began to mess your diaper, this time pooping in it.
Actually, something else completely different happened instead...
12131112122222122112111112211121211.content:
Though all things considering from what you've experienced almost an hour ago, the makeover Katie and Elizabeth have applied upon you was actually...a little better than what you were expecting, where you slowly waddled out of the twins' bedroom, with the back of your purple and green mane now adorned in a braided ponytail, as the braided ponytail comfortably laid out along your right side on full display, while the purple and green bangs on you mane were brushed and groomed to near perfection. You couldn't help but be somewhat impressed by their handiwork, despite not ever attending Beauty School due to their youthful age.

Upon gazing downstairs toward the Living Room, you noticed that Janice had already gotten dressed out of her pajamas and into a pair of pink sweatpants and a real t-shirt with Rainbow Dash displayed on the front of the shirt, all while your girlfriend wore a clean pair of ankle-high white socks on her feet. Currently, she was sitting on the couch while you waddled down the stairs with relative ease now that you're more adjusted to traversing on 4 legs and hooves.

Once you finally reached the bottom of the stairs, you waddled around the L-Shaped couch to approach your beloved Janice, only to see her playing on her PlayStation 4. Although you knew her to be a Brony, you also were aware that Janice was an avid gamer, always preferring video games that grasped her attention from an artistic perspective, and one of those games you fondly remember her talking about and playing was Dishonored, a stealth game developed by Arkane Studios and published by Bethesda. From what you remember from Janice's words, Dishonored wasn't just a stealth game, it was firmly set within the Steampunk genre, which you remembered from your girlfriend to be a subgenre of science fiction or science fantasy that incorporated technology and aesthetic designs inspired by 19th century industrial steam-powered machinery that could easily be found in the Victorian Era.

However, upon taking notice of your presence, Janice pressed the Start button on the controller to pause the game, where she then looked at you with a smirk on her face and said, "Wow, you look pretty cute with a braided ponytail, (Name)." "Hehe! Thanks, Janice. To be honest, I thought they were going to make my hair all messy when they took me in, but I'm glad that I was wrong." You replied, blushing a crimson hue from receiving such a flirtatious compliment, as you slowly but surely climbed up onto the L-Shaped couch and laid there alongside your girlfriend.

From there, Janice picked up the controller from her lap and pressed the Start button, resuming the game from where she was previously at. Although, even though you were certain that she was replaying Dishonored, you couldn't help but notice that the game appeared somewhat different from what you vividly remembered, as the game's location had a tropical feel to it's atmosphere and environment. So, out of sheer curiosity, you turned your equine head and snout to confront Janice, where you then spoke toward her and asked, "Say Janice, did Dishonored have some new DLC available?"

"Actually, (Name), this isn't some brand new DLC for Dishonored. In fact, this is actually a sequel to Dishonored." Janice answered, confirming that the game she was playing was, in fact, a sequel to one of her favorite games, giving you a bit of a surprised reaction on your slightly plump equine head and snout. From there, you spoke back toward your girlfriend and asked, "Wait, this is a sequel?" In a definitive response, Janice firmly nodded her head yes, while she continued to focus on the screen, where she moved the character she was controlling stealthily past a few guards on patrol, rendering a few of them unconscious via chokeholds and firing some sleep darts with small crossbow from a distance, then moving the unconscious guards out of sight to avoid detection.

"Yep. It's called Dishonored 2. Apparently, it was developed and published neither same people who created the first Dishonored: Arkane Studios and Bethesda. It was announced at E3 2016. And from what I remember, you can choose between either playing as Corvo Attano, the main protagonist from Dishonored 1, or you can play as Emily Kaldwin, who has a similar set of powers like Corvo, but they're different enough to change up a bit of the gameplay." Janice explained, which piqued your interest some. And yet, you felt a little confused when she said you could play as Emily Kaldwin, who was introduced in the first Dishonored as the young daughter of Empress Jessamine Kaldwin, who was assassinated in the beginning of the game by a group of conspirators, who then framed Corvo for her murder, hence the game's name of Dishonored.

So, in an attempt to gather some answers, you gazed back at Janice and said, "Wait a minute, isn't Emily Kaldwin about the same age as Katie and Elizabeth? Last time I checked, Janice, she was a little girl when she's first introduced in Dishonored." "Well, you're right, (Name). However, Dishonored 2 takes place 15 years after the events of Dishonored 1, so Emily is basically all grown up and leading Dunwall in her mother's footsteps as Empress. So yeah, the character I'm currently playing as is none other than Emily Kaldwin herself." Janice explained again, clearing things up for you while you displayed an "Ahh, I see" expression on your equine face and snout toward your girlfriend.

However, you couldn't help but become a bit more curious and asked, "Alright, so...what exactly happened? Why isn't Emily, you know, ruling over Dunwall as Empress?" "...Well, it's a bit of a long story, (Name). You sure you want to hear it?" Janice asked, wanting to know if you were willing to endure a long explanation on a piece of Dishonored 2's storyline. Obviously, you spoke toward her and answered, "I've got time, Janice. I mean, I'm not going anywhere given my...equine condition. So, tell me: What exactly did happen to make Emily wander the streets of...wherever she's currently at right now?"

"Well first off, she's currently in Karnaca, a city within the southern country of Serkonos. And second, well...you see, during a ceremony in remembrance of Jessamine Kaldwin's assassination, Duke Luca Abele of Serkonos arrives with the witch Delilah Copperspoon, whom you might remember from Dishonored 1's two -part story DLC, The Knife of Dunwall & The Brigmore Witches. Apparently, Delilah claims herself to be Jessamine's older half-sister and the true heir to the throne. Then, she accuses both Emily and Corvo of the "Crown Killer" murders that have been killing off Emily's political enemies, where the Duke's men then attack and kill off Emily's loyal guards, where Delilah then manages to subdue Corvo and steal his powers. When I chose to play as Emily, Corvo was turned into a statue by Delilah and then was knocked out, dragged, and locked in her personal quarters. From there, she escapes Dunwall and travels to Serkonos to take down the Duke and the other conspirators that helped Delilah in usurping the throne. And that's basically the main synopsis of what happened to Emily Kaldwin and why she's in Karnaca." Janice thoroughly explained, giving you much better insight into the events that transpired in Dishonored 2.

"Okay, that makes a bit more sense. So, what you're saying is that Delilah usurped the throne from Emily, turned Corvo into a statue, where she was then forced to escape from Dunwall and hunt down the Duke and Delilah's other supporters in Karnaca. Right?" You said, seeing if you got everything right from what your girlfriend explained to you, where Janice then firmly nodded yes in confirmation and replied, "Yep. That's basically the gist of it, (Name)." However, just after such a confirmation, you then...
12131112122222122112111112211121211.title: Ponytails & Dishonored 2

choices: The doorbell ringing. Who could it be then?
The sound of a car pulling into the driveway. Mom's home from shopping!
Actually, you both heard something else instead....
121311121222221221121111122111212111.content:
Despite eating a stack of syrup-coated pancakes 60 minutes ago, both you and Janice simultaneously heard the sudden and loud noises emanating from your stomach, as if the delicious flapjacks were merely not enough to sate it's hunger. In turn, this caused you to blush a deep crimson hue in your slightly chubby cheeks in utter embarassment, as Janice pressed the Start button once more to pause the game, where she then lightly patted the side of your plump stomach and said, "*giggle* My my, it sounds like "somepony" is still a little hungry." "Like I said earlier, honey, I wouldn't be surprised if that house had something in it's food or drinks that was slowly trying to make me a little fatter." You replied, gently poking your tubby abdomen with the tip of your forehoof.

However, as your stomach continued to express it's protests with numerous growls and gurgles, Janice then spoke toward you and said, "Well, I think I know one way to make your stomach satisfied." From there, she stood up from the couch and walked toward the kitchen, where she then grabbed a bag full of freshly plucked strawberries, opened up the blender, and dumped all of the strawberries into the blender cup. Then, she closed the lid on the blender, and turned on the machine, causing the strawberries to be pulverized into a thick pink liquid. However, your girlfriend dropped in a few more strawberries for good measure, grinding them just the same, adding more strawberry liquid in the blender cup.

From looking upon Janice's handiwork, you quickly realized that she was making your most favorite drink, Strawberry Smoothie, making you lick your equine lips with newfound thirst and anticipation, desiring the tasty smoothie upon your taste buds. Finally, your girlfriend brought out an extra-large cup, cup lid, and lengthy straw, as she then poured the thick strawberry liquid into the extra-large cup, sealed the lid on top of the cup, and then inserted the elongated straw into the the cup lid hole in the center, completing the Strawberry Smoothie, ready to be consumed at your pleasure.

From there, Janice carried the Strawberry Smoothie into the Living Room, and placed the cup in front of you. "Gimme gimme!" You yelped excitedly, where you then grasped the cup full of strawberry smoothie with both forehooves, using your magic to steady and maintain your grip on the extra-large cup with relative ease, as you then clasped your equine snout around the end of the straw, and began to greedily suck on the straw, causing the thick pink juice to climb up the straw's insides and into your waiting mouth. What came next was nothing short of strawberry-filled euphoria for your taste buds, inadvertently causing you to moan happily in some form of heavenly pleasure.

Upon seeing you displaying such a euphoric expression on your equine face and snout, Janice couldn't help but display a happy smirk on her own face, as you finally swallowed a large gulp of strawberry smoothie down your throat and into your waiting stomach, where you then finally noticed you girlfriend's expression while she gazed upon you. From there, you blushed greatly once more in embarrassment, as you spoke toward Janice and said, "...What? Can't a girl at least enjoy an uber-delicious Strawberry Smoothie?" "*giggle* Sorry, (Name)! It's just that you look absolutely adorable with that look on your face when you were drinking that smoothie." Janice replied, Malone you blush some from that compliment.

"What can I say? You know I have a stupidly soft sweet spot for Strawberry Smoothies and Strawberry Ice Cream, Janice. But still, um... thank you, for the smoothie." You answered, thanking your girlfriend for giving you such a delicious treat, where she then gently scratched behind one of your equine ears and replied, "Aww! You're welcome, sweetie." Then, Janice grabbed the controller, pressing the Start button to resume playing Dishonored 2, where you keenly watched the gameplay before you while you continued to drink your Strawberry Smoothie.

Like watching a suspenseful thriller, you couldn't help but become immersed in Dishonored 2's gameplay, as Janice stealthily moved Emily Kaldwin through the almost vacant halls of the Addermire Institute, cautiously avoiding most of the guard patrols along the way toward Alexandria Hypatia's location. It was enough of a nail-biter, having some very close calls along the way. Fortunately, Janice finally arrived at Dr. Hypatia's whereabouts, as she made Emily Kaldwin jump down from the walkway above to confront the woman that was Dr. Hypatia. From there, Janice pressed the Square button to talk to Hypatia, which triggered an in-game cutscene, where you heard Emily Kaldwin's voice for the first time while the conversation between her and Hypatia began.

"So, why does she need to talk to Hypatia?" You asked, wondering what exactly the objective was from having a chat with the good doctor. In response, Janice spoke toward you and explained, "Well, Emily needs to find out where Anton Sokolov's whereabouts are, as well as finding out if the Crown Killer was a patient of Dr. Hypatia." "Oh. Well, I guess that explains it." You replied, just as you drink another sip from your Strawberry Smoothie.

Eventually, after a bit of exploring, Janice found Hypatia's assistant, Vasco. And judging from his appearance as he laid out on the bed, he looked all bloody and bruised, as if someone or something was torturing him. It was there that once Emily talked to him, Vasco confessed a shocking revelation: Dr. Hypatia was the Crown Killer! However, he also explained that Hypatia developed a serum to help the miners, but the first version of this serum caused horrible changes to her mind, creating this Crown Killer persona. Vasco then told Emily Kaldwin that the safe in Disease Treatment, she could make a counter-serum to cure Hypatia of her psychotic and sadistic Crown Killer persona for good, along with giving her the code to open the safe.

Unfortunately, shortly after Vasco told Emily what she had to do, a bookcase came flying at her, pinning her against the wall! And through the now-broken window came Dr. Hypatia, fully enveloped in her Crown Killer persona, bearing glowing yellow eyes, as she searched around for a new victim! Behind her, Vasco attempted to climb over and escape from the crazed Hypatia, just as she then turned and noticed the battered assistant trying to escape from her, where she then lunged at Vasco with a powerful jump as she hissed, "I've always wondered what your flesh tastes like, my fear assistant!"

With Hypatia preoccupied at the moment,Emily quickly got herself out from underneath the thrown bookcase, as she then heard Vasco's panicked and painful screams when the crazed Hypatia finally killed him with a brutal and fatal blow! "In all honesty, I did not see that one coming." You said, showing your surprised reaction on full display, which caused Janice to nod in agreement with a shocked expression on her face as well. However, just as your girlfriend was about to continue playing the game, you both suddenly heard...
121311121222221221121111122111212111.title: Thirsty For Strawberry Smoothies

choices: After lunch, you continued to watch Janice play Dishonored 2.
Fast forward to after dinner, where Janice's father called them on Skype.
Actually, let's skip ahead toward bedtime, shall we?
1213111212222212211211111221112121112.content:
Although the suspenseful moment unraveled before the two of you on-screen, you suddenly both heard the subtle sounds of a car slowly pulling into the driveway. "Hmm, wonder who it could be?" Janice asked herself, as she then pressed the Start button on the PlayStation 4 controller, pausing the game once more. From there, she stood up from the couch and cautiously approached the front window to investigate, taking a peek to see who arrived at her home outside, only to reveal someone she was all too familiar with. "It's Mom! She's back!" She exclaimed, turning around to face you to confirm what she said, as you then gazed toward your girlfriend and asked, "She's back already? Well, that was fast."

"Yeah, I'm guessing she found what she was looking for already." Janice replied, as she witnessed her mother exiting the car, opening the van's trunk door, revealing several large boxes as the vehicle's contents. Then, you both heard the garage door open, allowing Mrs. Connelly to transport the large boxes inside. "Hold in, I'm going to see if I can help her with those." Janice said, as she then headed toward the door leading into the garage to both greet her mother, and to aid her in transporting the large boxes as well, while you sat there on the L-Shaped couch, waiting patiently as you continued to drink your Strawberry Smoothie.

Minutes later, both Janice and her mother carried one of the large boxes inside the house and laid it down on the floor. Judging from their efforts, the contents inside these boxes seemed to be physically heavy, as your girlfriend and her mother proceeded back outside to carry in another equally large box. One by one, Mrs. Connelly and her eldest daughter brought in a total number of 4 boxes, along with a few other items from the matriarch's somewhat brief shopping spree.

From there, Mrs. Connelly eventually turned around and noticed you on the couch, where she then greeted you and said, "Oh hello, (Name). How is it going while I was away?" "...So far so good, Mrs. Connelly! Janice here made me a Strawberry Smoothie since I was still a little hungry from breakfast this morning." You answered, just as Janice's mother then took notice of your braided purple and green ponytail and asked, "Say, who made you get a braided ponytail?" "Oh, that was Katie and Elizabeth's handiwork. Apparently, they wanted to give me a "My Little Pony Makeover". And to my surprise, it's not as bad as I thought it would be, so I'm keeping my, um... mane, like this. At least, for a little while." You explained, giving Mrs. Connelly the short "get to the point" explanation.

However, you began to divert the conversation onto another topic, as you gazed toward the 4 large boxes and other items laying out in the floor, where you then spoke toward Mrs. Connelly and asked, "Say, Mrs. Connelly? What's with all that stuff you and Janice carried in?" "Oh, those things? Well, they're for you, (Name)." Mrs. Connelly answered bluntly, making you slightly confused in the process, raising an eyebrow in confusion and curiosity.

From there, as Janice then grabbed the large cup of Strawberry Smoothie to prevent you from accidentally spilling it, you climbed down from your position in the L-Shaped couch, then waddled over toward the large boxes and stack of items laid out in the floor, approaching said items to get a better look at the products. Moments later, you then spoke toward Janice's mother once more and asked, "I...I don't understand, Mrs. Connelly. Why would you say that all this stuff is for me?" "Well...do you remember when my Mom had to change your diaper last night and then I had to change your diaper this morning?" Janice said, avidly reminding you of your unwillingly newfound incontinence that came along with your transformation into a Unicorn from MLP: Friendship is Magic.

Of course, remembrance of such embarrassing events caused your slightly plump cheeks to blush a crimson hue from embarrassment, where you then hesitantly nodded yes in confirmation to both your girlfriend and her mother. In response, Mrs. Connelly knelt down on one knee and began to gently pet you a little, stroking her somewhat plump fingers through your purple and green mane out of easing you of your stress, where she then calmly spoke toward you and explained, "Not to embarrass you even further, (Name), but this is the reason for these...necessary renovations, so your stay with us can be more comfortable. I understand that such...changes, are not easy to swallow, but...if we can't find a method to cure you of your magic-induced affliction, then this is the next best thing we can offer to you, my dear."

"*defeated sigh* I...I understand, Mrs. Connelly. I mean, I know that the possibility of a cure for my condition is next to zero, but...even if we can't find a cure for me, I won't complain about having my diapers changed. I just want to say, um...thank you...for allowing me to stay here." You answered, taking into account of the extremely slim chances of finding a way to reverse your equine transformation, along with being thankful for the hospitality that Mrs. Connelly was able to provide for you. In response, Janice's mother displayed a tender motherly smile on her plump face, where she then gently scratched behind your left Unicorn eat, which made you relax a little, as she spoke toward you once more and replied, "Aww! You're very welcome, (Name). You're such a good girl, and it's a fine shame that something like this happened to you."

From there, Mrs. Connelly stood back up onto her two feet, rubbing her hands together and said, "Anyway, onto other things, what Dow you say we all have some lunch? You must be getting quite hungry from what Janice had told me." Upon hearing the word lunch from the Connelly matriarch's lips, your stomach couldn't help but gurgle once more out of mere hunger, as Mrs. Connelly walked into the kitchen and began to prepare both you and her family a proper meal for lunch.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112.title: Necessary Renovations

choices: From there, Luna the summoned the "guest" into your dreamscape.
Then, you asked who this guest might be exactly.
12131112122222122112111112211121211123.content:
Within the lengthy span of an entire day, some things have occurred, not just eating a delicious grilled cheese sandwich for lunch while consuming a Veggie Cheeseburger for dinner. Apparently, Janice and her family got a call from her father, Anthony Connelly, via Skype connection, as the ship he was assigned on, an Aircraft Carrier called the USS Nevada, was currently sailing through the Indian Ocean. And to your utter surprise, Janice and her family confessed the truth about you becoming a fat diapered Unicorn, where they then revealed you to the Connelly patriarch, who shockingly accepted such a revelation with ease, as if he had experience with such weirdness before.

Fortunately, the conversation was private, where he then confessed something that surprised both you and Janice: He was the one who helped Janice's mother, her Aunt Josephine, Emily, Alyssa, and Claudia escape from the haunted house of Mrs. Fatsworth. However, when Katie and Elizabeth both asked when their father was coming home, he said that he'll be home a few days before Thanksgiving, which made the twin siblings shout with gleeful excitement over their father's eventual return home. And with a final word, he waved his family goodbye before ending his Skype connection.

With the day winding down, you and Janice decided to take a relaxing bath together, with you using up a good amount of soap and body-wash due to being covered in fur, where you were then both dried off and you were changed into a clean diaper after messing yourself before the bath, and back to wearing the Fluttershy onesie again. From there, you both returned to Janice's bedroom, ready to go to sleep, as your girlfriend got herself dressed into her Pinkie Pie pajamas, where she then laid you out onto the futon bed, tucking you underneath the blankets and kissing you on the lips saying goodnight to you while she turned off the lights and fell asleep in her own bed.

------

Once you fell asleep, you began to dream once more, standing in the same dreamy environment from the previous night, which meant only one thing: You were going to see Princess Luna again. And speaking of the Alicorn princess, you then heard the sound of hooves clopping against the floor, prompting you to turn around and confront whoever it was. And there she was: Princess Luna, in the flesh...to an extent, of course. "Greetings, (Name). How art thou?" She asked, waving a forehoof in salutations toward you, where you then greeted her back and replied, "Oh, just fine, with all things considered. Thanks for asking though, Luna. To be honest, I've been looking forward to seeing you again, ever since we first met last night."

"Oh? And how so, My Not-So Little Pony? *giggle*" Luna asked, giggling some due to giving you such a name in a politely teasing manner. Of course, you couldn't help but blush from the supposed compliment coming from the Princess of the Night, as you then eventually spoke toward her explained, "...Well, on a lot of things, actually. I mean, my knowledge on your kingdom is...limited, at best, even though I have a girlfriend who happens to know a lot about Equestria and whatnot." "Ah yes, your marefriend Janice Connelly. Thy am quite aware of your...relationship, with her. Thou are quite fortunate to have somepony as supportive as she. Though, thy must admit, it's quite intriguing to see your friendship with her blossom into romance." Luna answered, admiring the romantic devotion between you and Janice, almost as if Equestria had never experienced something like a same-sex relationship before.

Obviously, this reassured you and boosted your confidence some, since you were basically having a friendly conversation with royalty here. "Thank you. Janice has been very supportive throughout my ordeal. She even allowed me to stay with her family until there's some way to change me back to being human." You said, just as Luna warped and distorted the dreamscape slightly, summoning the table, chairs, and tea set from the night before, where she then gestured you to sit alongside her and continue from where you left off.

Of course, you willingly complied with the gesture from the Alicorn princess, climbing up onto the ornate chair and positioning yourself comfortably in the seat of the decorative chair, despite your tubby physique and diapered rear. "She must be quite the devoted individual, (Name)." Luna remarked, as she then used her magic to levitate the tea kettle and pour into the teacups. At first, you thought your mind was playing tricks on you, where you noticed that there was a third teacup sitting on the table, as if the Alicorn princess was patiently waiting for someone of importance. So, being curious about what is going on exactly, you then spoke toward Luna once more and asked, "Say, um... Luna, what's with the third teacup? Are you, um... expecting someone?"

Obviously, in response to such a question coming from you, Luna slowly lowered the tea kettle back onto the table, then turned her equine head and snout in your direction to gaze upon you, where she then displayed a friendly and reassuring smirk on her snout, as she then spoke toward you and explained, "Thy have...invited, a good friend of thine to accompany us tonight, (Name). Thy assure thou, she is quite the talented individual in the art of magic."
12131112122222122112111112211121211123.title: Spending Time With Luna

choices: Then, Twilight asked you a question regarding your girlfriend.
Then, you asked if there was a way to prove of their existence on your world.
121311121222221221121111122111212111231.content:
"Okay, so... when will "she" arrive then, Luna? I mean, with all due respect, Your Highness, but how exactly will your friend be able to enter my dreams like you do? You asked, curious as to how Luna's accomplice would gain access into your dreams, along with showing respect towards the Alicorn princess whilst being somewhat skeptical of such a mystical feat. So, in response to such skepticism coming from you, Luna calmly dismounted herself from the chair, gazed upon you and answered, "...Allow thee to show thou what thy am capable of."

From there, Luna began to warp and distort a decent chunk of the dreamy environment before you, as if she was willingly opening some sort of portal to allow someone or something to directly enter your dreamscape. Of course, your assumption was absolutely correct, as you began to see a silhouette entering your dream. Judging from it's appearance, the silhouette was definitely equine in origin, which meant that Luna was bringing in someone from Equestria into your dreamscape. Although, you didn't have the faintest clue as to the pony's identity, but you were about to find out very soon, as the silhouette began to reveal more distinctive features.

Eventually, the silhouette had completely vanished, and in it's place was none other than one of the main characters from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, known simply as Twilight Sparkle. Out of all the members of the Mane Six, Twilight was basically Janice's most favorite character for multiple valid reasons. However, judging from her appearance and from what your girlfriend had thoroughly explained to you a while back, you were currently looking at Alicorn Twilight Sparkle, as you clearly noticed the Alicorn wings folded up against her sides. Then, Twilight approached Luna, greeting her in the process and said, "Thank you for inviting me tonight, Luna."

"Tis' thy pleasure, Twilight Sparkle. Now, allow thee to introduce thou to (Name). She is the very pony thy have told thou about. She claims that she is... was, a human." Luna explained, where the mauve Alicorn then approached you and began to gaze upon you with intrigue and curiosity, examining you from almost every angle possible. After all, from what Janice had told you about her, Twilight was known to be an avid scientist, examining things that were absolutely new to her, whether they're just objects or living creatures. In fact, you distinctly remember that in one of the episodes of MLP, Twilight went so far as to find physical evidence as to how Pinkie Pie's "Pinkie Sense" actually works, which you had to admit was a little funny from hearing about such a scene.

And yet, here she was: The famous Twilight Sparkle, actively examining you like there's no tomorrow. So, as you felt somewhat embarrassed from the unwarranted attention, you attempted to talk to Twilight, as you spoke toward her and asked, "Um, not to be rude or anything like that, but...Why are you examining me, Twilight?" Upon hearing you say her name, Twilight instantly stopped examining you, where she then rose up onto her hooves, looked toward you and said, "...Wait a minute, how exactly do you know my name, anyway? From what Luna had thoroughly explained to me, she said that our world and Equestria are fictional where you come from." Although it came as an unexpected surprise to you that she was perfectly aware that Equestria was a fictional place, you felt relieved that you didn't have to fully explain to Twilight that her world was fictional on your planet.

However, in response to what Twilight had said to you, you looked back at the mauve Alicorn, attempting to come up with a reasonable explanation as to how you know her, and explained, "Well, um... You see, I, uh...I-I have a girlfriend back on Earth named Janice Connelly. She's...She's basically, like, your number one fan. That's how I know who you are." Upon hearing such a hearty confession from you, Twilight loosened up on you, realizing that there were other sentient lifeforms besides Ponies who know about her, which seemed to make her much friendlier toward you. "Well, um...my apologies for being so suspicious earlier. I wasn't aware of such information at the time. Anyway, um... let's start from the beginning. My name is Twilight Sparkle, and I am the Princess of Friendship." Twilight apologized, where she then extended a forehoof toward you as a gesture quite similar to a handshake.

Of course, you extended your own forehoof and grasped her forehoof, where you then shook hooves with her as you replied, "Nice to meet you! Name's (Name), teenage human girl from the planet Earth...or, should I say, former human." "Former human? ...I understand. Princess Luna had also explained to me that you're currently afflicted with some type of curse. I'm terribly sorry for your...predicament, (Name)." Twilight apologized, becoming sympathetic toward your transformation into a fat diapered Unicorn, where Luna then summoned a chair for the mauve Alicorn to sit in, as Twilight then climbed up onto the chair and sat down on the seat of the furniture.

From there, shortly after levitating her teacup with her magic and taking a sip of tea from the ceramic cup, Twilight then turned her equine head and snout to gaze upon you and asked, "So, would you mind explaining exactly how you were transformed into your current state? I'd like to hear it from the beginning." Obviously, knowing that Luna possibly wanted you to tell Twilight about how you were changed into your current form, you let out a long sigh, then looked toward both Alicorns and answered, "*long sigh*...Alright, you win. I'll tell you what exactly happened to me. But, I gotta warn you, it...it gets weird. Very weird, from here on out."

------

"...And well, that's how I was transformed into a fat Unicorn in diapers, and why I'm currently staying with my girlfriend and her family in their home." You explained, finally finishing the long extensive tale of the events that transpired and to your transformation into what you've now become. Of course, Luna and Twilight both closely listened to your story with keen hearing, all sipping from their respective teacups. Once they noticed that you were finished with your story, Twilight then set her teacup down onto the table, where she then proceeded to speak with you and said, "...I see. So, you were essentially tempted to enter the house that was supposedly haunted. *giggle* Not to greatly offend you, (Name), but I find it quite funny that such a derelict estate could be capable of a physical transformation such as yours."

"Yeah, well...that's what I thought of it at first, Twilight: An awkwardly weird ghost story that the people in my neighborhood would tell to scare kids. That the ghost of Mrs. Fatsworth would invite anyone who approaches into her home, fatten them up, and make them wear diapers and turn them into big fat babies. But when I entered that old house, I... I couldn't help but feel as if someone or...something, was watching me closely from the shadows, following my every move inside that house, eventually all leading up to...well, you know." "To when you were transformed into your current form?" Twilight asked, levitating her teacup once more with her magic and taking another sip of tea, where you then nodded in confirmation towards the mauve Alicorn's assumption.
121311121222221221121111122111212111231.title: The Princess of Friendship

choices: A Guide To Beginner Spells, by Starswirl The Bearded.
Magic & You: A Guide on Using Magic, by Cobalt Flameheart
Actually, it was a completely different book instead...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
"Now, I'm not trying to offend you or anything of the sort, (Name), but...How close, is your relationship with your "girlfriend", Janice Connelly?" Twilight asked, surprising you a little, as you accidentally gagged a bit on the tea before finally swallowing the warm liquid down your throat and into your stomach. Of course, in response to such a question coming from the mauve Alicorn, you metaphorically stood your ground against Twilight, becoming a tad suspicious from such a question and said, "Why exactly would you want to know that anyway, Twilight?" Obviously seeing that you're being noticeably defensive on the subject at hoof, Twilight spoke up in a reassuring tone and replied, "I'm not trying to be antagonistic towards your relationship with her, I simply want to know how strong and true your bond with Janice is, and how long you have known her. Nothing more, nothing less. Alright?"

Eventually, you understood the motive behind her question, as you then nodded firmly in confirmation towards Twilight. From there, you exhaled a deep breath, then spoke toward the mauve Alicorn and explained, "Janice and I... have a strong bond that runs deep. In the beginning, we were BFFs since childhood. However, when we began High School together, our friendship evolved into something...more, than just simply Best Friends Forever. We became lovers, through thick and thin. When one of us was feeling down, we would always raise our spirits, whether it's me or Janice. So to answer your question: Yes, our love is strong, something you couldn't possibly understand. Even if I'm stuck as a fat diapered Unicorn for the rest of my life, Janice would still love me as if I was no different than when I was human."

Upon hearing those words coming from your equine snout, Twilight appeared satisfied to know that the feelings you have for your girlfriend and vice-versa were not false, seeing that you were legitimately devoted toward your romance with Janice. Shortly after Luna poured some more tea into her now empty teacup, Twilight gazed upon you with a reassured smile on her equine face and snout, where she then laid her left forehoof upon your right forehoof out of both self-reassurance and reassurance towards you. Then, the mauve Alicorn calmly spoke toward you and answered, "...Thank you, for being honest and truthful with your feelings. You and Janice remind me so much of my big brother, Shining Armor, and Princess Cadence. The way you spoke and how passionate you were about Janice shows me that your love is true."

"Thanks for believing me, Twilight." You replied, feeling grateful for the mauve Alicorn being able to believe your words. From there, Twilight decided to divert the conversation onto another topic of interest for her, where she then took another sip of tea, then looked toward you and asked, "...(Name), you said earlier that your girlfriend...is, on your planet, a massive fan of me, correct?" "Yeah. Back when I was still human, she would always talk about you as if she met you in-person, not that I'm saying that she's crazy or anything like that. Why?" You asked in response, curious as to why Twilight would be interested in Janice's fangirl obsession with the mauve Alicorn.

However, shortly after emitting an amused giggle from her snout, Twilight then spoke toward you and said, "*giggle* Well, what if I told you that there was a way for me to, say, "contact" your beloved Janice with magic?" "Well, for one: Janice would definitely be fainting from seeing you in the flesh. Believe me, she was very ecstatic when she saw me like this for the very first time." You replied, taking into account of what exactly Janice's reaction would be if she saw the real Twilight Sparkle in-person. That is, until you soon realized that Twilight might possibly be serious on the subject, as you sat there in some sense of disbelief on the matter at hoof, where you then spoke toward the mauve Alicorn and asked, "...Wait a minute: You're serious about this, aren't you? Look, I don't mean to burst your bubble here, Twilight, but that's impossible! I mean, I'm not even sure if your planet is even in the same galaxy as Earth."

"Actually, it's rather quite simple, (Name). After all, if Luna was able to gain access to your dreams so easily, who's to say that I can develop an advanced Teleport Spell that can transport me to a different planet?" Twilight said, showing her thirst for knowledge once more, along with potentially convincing you that it was plausible for her to teleport from her planet to Earth with just a single magical spell. Of course, the more you thought about it, the more it seemed impossible to pull off, since you were more into scientific proof than simply believing in the supernatural.

Then again, you WERE transformed into a fat diapered Unicorn from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, so the scientific part was basically tossed out the window, that's for sure. However, Twilight could easily see the skepticism on your equine face and snout, where she then used her magic to levitate your teacup in front of you, making you take a sip of the warm tea into your mouth and down your gullet.
