From there, Twilight then asked you a most peculiar question, as she spoke toward you and calmly asked, "Tell me, (Name): When you were attending school, how did you progress through subjects such as Science and Math?" Eventually, after pondering about what she asked, you then looked at Twilight and answered, "...Through, studying, and practice."

"Exactly! (Name), I did not become quite the expert on magic that I am today overnight. Like anypony, I studied long and hard, as well as practice with what I was given...special privileges, by my mentor and Princess Luna's sister, Princess Celestia, I still practiced hard and diligently with every ounce of magic within me. Starswirl The Bearded had to practice, my brother and Cadence had to practice, I had to practice. *giggle* Why, even Princess Celestia and Princess Luna had to practice using magic when they were much younger." Twilight explained, causing Luna to blush in some embarrassment from Twilight revealing such truth to you, where the Alicorn princess then spoke up toward her sister's pupil and replied, "Oh please, Twilight. Thou are embarrassing us."

"No, it's fine, Luna. It...It makes me feel better, knowing that everyone had to learn at some point in their lives." You answered, reassuring Luna that you were alright with knowing that even she had to learn how to use magic, which made you feel a little better on your current standing on using magic. However, that still left you with a sense of inexperience on using your own respective magic. Fortunately, this gave Twilight a bright idea, where she then used a spell on you, which left you dazed for a moment or two before mind regained focus. "Ow! What was that for?" You asked, rubbing the side of your equine head with a forehoof.

"I simply used a Translator Spell on you, (Name). Now, as for why I performed such a spell, well...allow me to present you with a gift." Twilight answered, where she then summoned a heavy hardcover book upon the table in front of you, which was filled to the brim with hundreds of pages. At first, upon opening the book and looking through the pages, you couldn't understand a single word on the pages. However, the Translator Spell that Twilight had casted on you began to work it's magic, easily translating the Equestrian words and symbols into Human English, where you then looked at the cover of the book, which said...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Girlfriend Questions & Magic Lessons

choices: You then told Janice that you met Twilight Sparkle in your dreams.
Before you could say anymore, you noticed that your diaper was wet again.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
"A Guide To Beginner Spells, by Starswirl The Bearded. Um, remind me why you're giving me this?" You said, reading the title of the book aloud, then proceeding to question Twilight as to why she would give you this book. Of course, being the bookworm that she was, Twilight then calmly spoke toward you and explained, "Well, I thought a book from the Canterlot Library's Starswirl Wing would be adequate enough to help you learn how to use magic. I've already casted an enchantment on a bookmark and placed it inside the book so it would be transported to your location once you've woken up. After all, Starswirl The Bearded is an accomplished expert on many forms of magic, ranging from transfiguration, dimensional calibration, and respiration. In other words, I highly recommend reading through every page of that book in order to gain a better understanding of your magical abilities."

"But, won't you get into trouble if they find out that a book is missing from your library?" You asked, wondering if Twilight Sparkle illegally took the book from Canterlot's Library , along with unintentionally misinterpreting the Canterlot Library belonging to her, since she was a princess like Luna. After all, like you said to them earlier, your knowledge on Equestria was limited at best, so you were probably wrong about Twilight having ownership of the Canterlot Library.

"Oh don't worry, (Name), I did not steal the book if that's what you're implying. And no, I don't have ownership over the Canterlot Library, but I am quite familiar with a certain Librarian who resides there." Twilight answered, just as the three of you then heard the muffled sounds of Janice's voice from outside of your dreams, leaving you no choice but to wake up in the world of the living. Upon hearing the muffled echoes, Twilight and Luna both gazed upon you, where Luna then spoke toward you and said, "And speaking of Janice, it seems that she is calling for thou, which means our time together is coming to a close for now."

"Thank you for helping me, Twilight, Luna. *sigh* I just wish that there was some way for me to pay you back in return." You confessed, feeling grateful for the assistance granted to you by both Luna and Twilight Sparkle, which surprisingly prompted the mauve Alicorn to conjure up a fair deal with you, as Twilight then spoke toward you and answered, "...Well, there is one way that you can return the favor. You see, ever since Luna had told me about your world, I've become fascinated with how different it might be from Equestria."

"You want to know more about Earth? ...Okay, I think I can do that." You replied, just as the dreamy environment began to progressively dissipate before your very eyes, while both Luna and Twilight bid you farewell, disappearing from your dreamscape and returning to Equestria, leaving you alone to your own devices, as you slowly but surely began to regain consciousness.

------

From there, upon waking up from your dream, you regained consciousness, only to gaze upon Janice sitting beside you, displaying this almost giddy expression on her face, which of course led you to turn your head toward the right and finally noticed the exact same book that Twilight had given you in your dreams, laying there on the futon bed alongside you. "*giggle* I take it that your visit with Luna went well, (Name)?" Janice asked, easily expecting an answer from you, where you then looked back at your girlfriend, displaying a smug grin on your slightly plump equine snout and replied, "Oh, you have no idea, honey."
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: A Book on Magic

choices: From there, you both heard Janice's mother downstairs, saying it's breakfast.
Skip ahead a few days later, and let's see how you're faring.
Actually, let's skip to a week later, shall we?
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Unfortunately for you, before you could say any further as to what exactly transpired in your dreams, you became aware of the moist dampness of a wet diaper, feeling your urine absorbed into the diaper's padding, making you feel embarrassed once more, still becoming accustomed to wetting yourself quite so easily. "Um, could you...could you change my diaper, Janice? I-I think it's wet...again." You asked, where Janice nodded with acceptance, as she then unfurled the blankets from your tubby equine frame and proceeded to undergo the same process from before: Unbuttoned the onesie flaps, purge you of your dirty diaper, toss it into a trash bin, then wiped your flank clean, powder you to prevent a diaper rash, and finally taped a clean new diaper around your waist and plump flank.

From there, as you felt your girlfriend strip you of the Fluttershy onesie, she began to speak toward you, while she shuffled through various garments for you to wear for the day and asked, "So, what exactly happened? The suspense is killing me here, (Name)!" "Oh, let's just say that I got to meet a certain...Pony, that you would've died to meet in-person. *giggle*" You replied,making Janice antsy to know who exactly you saw while you were dreaming last night, just as your girlfriend pulled out another MLP-themed onesie. In appearance, the onesie was made with snow white fleece, complete with silk purple frills located on the rump of the onesie, with Rarity's Cutie Mark adorned on there as well: Three pristine diamonds placed in a triangular formation. Overall, you were now looking at a Rarity-themed onesie.

At first, you didn't want to resort to bear wearing such an infantile garment once more. However, you eventually figured that such resistance was now considered futile at this point, so you reluctantly gave in and allowed Janice to dress you in the mentioned attire, where she then buttoned up the flaps of the onesie once you were wearing the infantile garment, securing you in the Rarity onesie for all to see. Once she was done changing you, Janice helped you up into a sitting position on the futon bed, feeling your overall weight and noticing you might have gained a few extra pounds, where she then spoke toward you and asked, "So, tell me: Who exactly did you see last night, (Name)?"

"Allow me to give you a hint, Janice." You answered, where you then used your magic on your girlfriend's stuffed Twilight Sparkle plushie, surrounding the stuffed you with a pink and green aura, as you levitated the plushie onto the futon bed in front of both you and Janice. However, upon connecting the dots in her mind, your girlfriend suddenly realized who exactly you were referencing to, where she then spoke toward you and excitedly exclaimed, "Shut The Front Door!! You met Twilight Sparkle!?!"

"Yep! Apparently, she was Luna's guest when we met last night in my dreams. However, when I first laid eyes on her, Twilight had these mauve wings on the sides of her body. What was she again? ...Oh yeah, she looked like an Alicorn when we first met." You explained, which made Janice all the more ecstatic from such revelations, lightly bouncing up and down on the bedroom floor with glee as she exclaimed, "You met Princess Twilight Sparkle!?! Okay , now I'm wishing I was the one who was cursed into a becoming a Pony." "Oh believe me, it's not all sunshine and rainbows when you've end up like me, Janice. Trust me, I'm speaking from experience." You answered, reassuring her that she was better off human.

From there, after calming down some, Janice turned her head, gazing upon the thick hardcover book that laid upon the futon bed, where she then looked back toward you and asked, "So... I'm guessing that the book over there was from Twilight?" Of course, you simply nodded in confirmation and answered, "...Yeah. It's called "A Guide To Beginner Spells, by Starswirl The Bearded". Twilight gave me the book as a gift." "Okay, so... How exactly did it get here anyway?" Janice asked again, questioning you as to how you received a book all the way from Equestria. Obviously, you told your girlfriend what Twilight had told you earlier, where you spoke toward Janice and explained, "...Well, from I remembered from Twilight, she said that she enchanted a bookmark and placed it inside the book, so once I woke up, it would teleport to my location on Earth. Or at least, that's what she told me, anyway."

"Oh! Well...I guess that makes a little more sense. But still why would Twilight even give you a book on magic?" Janice asked once more, still a little curious as to why would Twilight give you a book on magic in the first place, where you then spoke toward her and answered, "I'm guessing she wants me to learn how to use magic while in my current form. Plus, before I woke up, Twilight was curious to know more about our world, so I've promised to let her know more about Earth and human civilization as a whole. You know, just because our civilizations seem so different from another."

"Oh! Well, I guess that makes sense, (Name)." Janice replied, where she then giggled just a little more and said, "But still, I can't believe you've actually met Twilight Sparkle! I'm so jealous!" "Yeah, I figured you would, honey." You replied, gently planting a tender kiss upon your girlfriend's lips.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Explanations & Diaper Changes, Part Deus

choices: Spending time with Luna & Twilight in your dreams.
Spending some time with Janice & her sisters, waiting for their father.
Actually, you were doing something different instead...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
They say "a lot can happen in a single week". And for you and the current circumstances at your disposal, those words couldn't be further from the truth. After explaining what had transpired in your dreams towards Janice, Mrs. Connelly yelled from downstairs to tell you both that breakfast is ready. Of course, the two of you proceeded downstairs once your girlfriend got herself dressed for the day, where you both then proceeded downstairs toward the Dining Room, gazing upon a well-made breakfast, complete with Eggo Waffles and cups full of pulp-free Orange Juice, using your magic to levitate the fork and knife to aid you in consuming the delicious delicacy, along with cautiously levitating the cup of Orange Juice to prevent spilling it, which required a good amount of focus and concentration.

After all, you haven't learned on how to use magic as early as Twilight has, so you were forced to learn rather quickly on what you were now capable of when it came to the mystical arts. However, since you both now had sufficient evidence that Princess Luna and Equestria exists, you both showed Janice's mother and twin sisters the book that Twilight gave you in your dreams. At first, Mrs. Connelly was somewhat skeptical about what you and Janice revealed to her, Katie, and Elizabeth. However, upon opening the book and showing the pages toward the matriarch, Mrs. Connelly closely examined the text, flipping through page after page to see if the hardcover book was legit or not, despite not understanding a single word in the book.

Of course, despite her occupation as an Archeologist, Mrs. Connelly couldn't understand a single word from the book's pages, so you simply translated what it said on a few of the pages for her, where she then questioned you as to how you understood such an unknown language so easily, which you and Janice then calmly explained how Twilight Sparkle casted a Translator Spell on you, thus allowing you to understand the Equestrian words with ease.

Obviously due to their youthfulness, both Katie and Elizabeth couldn't help but become excited from such an astounding revelation, now knowing the possibility of Equestria existing being confirmed by you and the book you and Janice brought downstairs. Nonetheless, this was indeed quite a shocking revelation to most of the Connelly Family. However, over the course of seven whole days, you slowly but progressively began to master several spells at a noticeable rate, becoming more proficient at using your magical Telekinesis with improved precision.

Along with learning a few new spells from the book that Twilight gave you, you were frequently visited by both Princess Luna and Twilight Sparkle in your dreams every night, holding up your end of the bargain, as you told Twilight of what you have on Earth, whether it came to stuff like superheroes, movies, or pop culture in general. Although it was pleasant enough that you were adjusting well to your overall transformation into a fat diapered Unicorn, you couldn't help but notice that you might have unwittingly gained an extra 10 pounds over the course of seven whole days.

And yet, as if that wasn't strange or awkward enough for you, both the MLP-themed onesies and the thickly padded diapers appeared to be almost...growing, to fit comfortably around and on you slowly expanding equine physique. Of course, Mrs. Connelly bought a specialized weight scale meant for dogs and other large domesticated animals weighing under 700 pounds, which you stepped on and unfortunately, you and Janice found out that your current weight nearly exceeds 300 pounds, thus putting you straight from Tubby and into the Downright Fat range of the scale. Though, as for what you were doing right now, currently you're...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: A Week To Endure

choices: Then, Twilight asked some more info about the Joker.
Then, Luna decided to change the topic some.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Although it was a nearly eventful week, considering that Janice's Dad was given shore leave for the Thanksgiving holiday, you eventually fell asleep on the futon bed within Janice's bedroom, eagerly anticipating for your rendezvous with Princess Luna and Princess Twilight Sparkle. Of course, once you've arrived in the dreamscape, you noticed both Twilight and Luna sitting at the summoned table drinking tea, using their magic to levitate the teacups before them. From there, they eventually became very aware of your presence, where Twilight then greeted you with a waving forehoof and said, "Hi there, (Name)! Care to join us?"

Since you've now became good friends with the mauve Alicorn, you willingly decided to accept Twilight's friendly offer of tea, as you waddled toward the table and sat yourself in an empty chair, likely reserved for you, where you then gazed upon Luna, then Twilight, bearing a smirk on your somewhat plump equine snout and replied, "Nice to see you too, Twilight, Luna. So, what's been happening in Equestria lately?"

"Oh...not much as of late, aside from personally teaching Starlight Glimmer about the magic of friendship. After all, I am known as "The Princess of Friendship" throughout Equestria as a whole, (Name)." Twilight answered, going into a decent amount of detail regarding the current events in Equestria. Of course, the name Starlight Glimmer definitely rang a bell somewhat, for you fondly remember Janice talking about what exactly occurred in the 5th Season of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, where you then spoke toward Twilight and asked, "Starlight Glimmer? Wasn't she that female Unicorn who swore revenge on you after you...exposed her?"

"...Well, yes actually. Starlight Glimmer did swore her revenge upon me and my friends after we exposed her plans sometime ago, (Name). After all, when we clashed with her again, Spike and I had to chase her throughout time in order to prevent her from altering the present timeline when she used a modified version of one of Starswirl The Bearded's Time Spells, which led to, how should I put it...Oh yeah! Alternate timelines of various degrees. Why?" Twilight explained, leaving a good deal of detail as to what transpired when Twilight Sparkle and Starlight Glimmer clashed horns for a second time.

Obviously, in response to what the mauve Alicorn asked you moments ago, you looked back toward Twilight after taking a sip of tea while levitating the teacup with your magic and replied, "Okay, you know how Luna might have mentioned to you how your world is a work of fiction on Earth? Well, my girlfriend keeps her eyes on said fictional series and that's how I know of Starlight Glimmer. Plus, from what I've heard, she was able to receive redemption and you took her in as your student, just like how Celestia took you in as her student." "*giggle* You're definitely correct on that matter, (Name). And yet, it feels like it has come full circle for me. After all, it's like you said, I was a student of Princess Celestia. But now, I've grown out of that shell and became a mentor to somepony else." Twilight answered, reminiscing on her past achievements prior to becoming Starlight Glimmer's mentor.

"Yes, we were quite amused by your development, Twilight Sparkle." Luna said, drinking a sip from her teacup, finding herself contemplating a little on the past as well, from when Twilight and the other bearers of the Elements of Harmony liberated the Alicorn princess from her dark persona known as Nightmare Moon to present day. However, you figured that Twilight would still be curious about your world, seeing as how there were some noticeable similarities between human civilization and Equestria, where you then spoke once more toward the mauve Alicorn and said, "...Anyway, while I'm here, is there anything you want to ask me, Twilight?"

Upon hearing your words, Twilight calmly thought about what she wanted to ask you about, which she then summed up a question and asked, "...Well, picking up from our previous conversation from earlier, you said that there was a character that was similar the Mane-iac from the Power Ponies comic book, correct? I'm curious to know who this character is exactly, (Name)." Upon hearing Twilight's question, you knew exactly she was talking about, so you exhaled a deep breath and asked, "*sigh* ...Twilight, are you sure you want to know? I mean, you might not be able to handle it."

"*giggle* (Name), I have dealt with the likes of Discord, Queen Chrysalis, Tirek, and other entities that would threaten Equestria. So, if there's something that your planet has that is similar to Mane-iac, I'm sure that I can "handle" it well." Twilight answered, confident that she can withstand what you were about to reveal to her. Obviously seeing that there was no convincing Twilight to back down, you exhaled a defeated sigh and replied, "...Alright. But don't say I didn't warn you, Twilight Sparkle."

From there, you had Luna allow you to use your Memory Mirror in your dreams, having it face the mauve Alicorn for her to watch. Then, the mirror's reflection began to warp and distort, as if showing something within your memories, where you then revealed something...thematically dark. The first image that appeared in the mirror were dozens of people, all lying dead with their faces twisted into these nightmarish grins. From there, there was this light chuckle from someone, just as the mirror began to pan upwards while the chuckle began to increase in volume and became more of a maniacal cackle with each passing second, all leading up to the reveal of the insane Clown Prince of Crime himself: The Joker.

Upon looking toward the two Alicorns, the look on Twilight's equine face and snout was that of utter shock, the pupils in her eyes shrunk to the size of pin pricks, not expecting such a character like the Joker whatsoever. Luna on the other hand, was closing her eyes out of preventing herself from being traumatized, obviously taking your word about not handling something like this. Once she regained some of her composure, Twilight spoke back toward you and asked, "Who...W-Who in Tartarus was that?!"

"That, Twilight...was the Joker. Out of all the comic book characters I've seen, he is the most insane and unpredictable villain you'll ever witness. How unpredictable, you ask? He screws with the minds of both the sane and insane alike, manipulating them in his sick twisted games." You explained, going into detail as to how lethal and dangerous was to both Twilight and Luna, much to their surprise as to how sick and maniacal the Clown Prince of Crime was in general. After all, you learned about the Joker from your cousin Jacob, who happened to read numerous Batman comic books, always bringing an interesting point of view when it came to superhero movies, due to his extensive knowledge of the Batman mythos.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Luna & Twilight Time

choices: Then, Luna noticed you looked a little fatter than before.
However, you asked Twilight & Luna regarding your weight.
Actually, you asked something else instead....
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
However, despite just witnessing such a horrific sight from what you've shown her just recently, Twilight's curiosity got the best of her, wanting to know more about the Joker, as if desiring to desiring to understand what makes the sadistic clown tick in the first place. So, once she regained the remains of her composure, Twilight then spoke toward you and asked, "So... How exactly did the Joker become the way he is today, anyway?" "Wait a sec, you still want to know more about this guy?! Twilight, I just showed you you the worst this guy had to offer, and you want to know more?" You exclaimed, shocked at such a response from the mauve Alicorn after seeing her reaction. Then again, this WAS Twilight Sparkle you were talking about here, so you basically had no choice on such a matter at hoof.

"...I know what you're thinking: "Why would I want to understand somepony like the Joker?" Well, I was thinking that if I could understand him better, maybe he isn't as evil as you claim him to be, (Name)." Twilight answered, hoping that you could shed some light on the Joker's character. However, being aware that Twilight was quite the persistent Pony, you let out a defeated and frustrated sigh, pressing a noticeably plump forehoof against your forehead in a facepalm moment, then spoke toward the mauve Alicorn and replied, "*sigh* ...Alright alright, fine! I'll tell you more about the Joker. But I warn you, Twilight! The stuff I'm about to tell you is NOT for the faint of heart."

"Noted." Twilight said, where she then took another sip of tea before looking toward you and continued to speak as she asked, "Now then, what was he like before he became the Joker?" "That's the thing, Twilight: Nobody knows exactly who the Joker was before he became this way. A thief who accidentally got his pregnant wife killed? A mob boss who stabbed Batman's girlfriend? A petty thug in the wrong place at the wrong time? Nobody knows for sure, not even the Joker himself! After all, he said so himself in The Killing Joke: "Sometimes I remember it one way, sometimes I remember it another. If I'm going to have a past, I prefer it to be multiple choice!" What people DO know is that at some point, he fell into a vat of mysterious chemicals, and Batman was involved. How "involved" the Dark Knight was varies from story to story, but everyone can agree that, from that point on, that person's body and mind were altered forever. His skin bleached a chalk white, his hair a bright green, his lips red as a tomato with a grin big enough to rival the Grinch, and his sanity cracked in two like an egg!" You explained, leaving no trace of the Joker's backstory untouched.

Although, despite your best efforts to divert Twilight's curiosity, the mauve Alicorn couldn't help but become a little more infatuated with such a unique backstory, seeing much of the similarities between the Joker and the Mane-iac, whether it was their physical appearances, mental stability, or what caused their transformations in the first place. From there, Twilight then asked another question related to the Joker, where she spoke toward you and asked, "...Anyway, when we saw all those..."sleeping" humans, what exactly did the Joker do to them, (Name)?"

"That...was the Joker's trademark toxin, the fittingly named "Joker Venom". It's the deadliest and most haunting out of all his signature weapons. As for what it is, Joker Venom is a deadly concoction which poisons it's victims, forcing them into fits of laughter so uncontrollable that they suffocate and die, all while twisting and contorting their facial muscles into a nightmarish grin. Just one small whiff of that toxin, and you're as good as dead!" You explained, detailing the potential dangers that the Joker's trademark Joker Venom was to living creatures, whether they were human or not.

Then, shortly after regaining her composure as well, Luna then spoke toward you after Twilight and said, "Thy goodness! We did not expect such a ghastly way of death, (Name). But still, is it possible that Joker could be affected by his own concoction?" However, in response to Princess Luna's question, you simply shook your plump equine head and snout from side to side, where you then spoke toward both her and Twilight as you bluntly answered, "I'm afraid not, Luna. Or at least, not in the way that you could use his own toxin against him. You see, the Joker has manufactured so much Joker Venom over the years, that repeated exposure has given him biological immunity to his own toxin. In layman's terms, he can't be affected the same way as his victims are."

"...Well, that's...intimidating. (Name), you mentioned earlier that the Joker had other weapons, right? So, what are they, exactly?" Twilight asked, already feeling a little more intimidated by how sick, twisted, and psychotic the Joker was, enough to give Mane-iac a run for her money and more. Obviously, you inevitably gave the mauve Alicorn those answers, as you spoke toward her and explained, "The Joker has more than just his Joker Venom, Twilight. He carries a long barrel revolver with him, uses explosive toys and fuse bombs, razor sharp playing cards that can be thrown, a gag flower filled with corrosive acid, and an electric hand buzzer that is capable of electrocuting someone to death. And that's just over half of his arsenal! Plus, even if one of your friends like Rainbow Dash or Applejack were able to land some powerful physical attacks in him, the Joker has a stupidly high pain tolerance due to his own insanity. Do I even need to say anymore?"

And with that, you were finished with talking about the Joker, noticing some hesitation in both Luna and Twilight Sparkle, as the two Alicorns eventually agreed on diverting the conversation to a much less gruesome topic, where Twilight then spoke toward you, nodding in confirmation and replied, "...Yeah, let's go over something else instead." Nodding in agreement, the three of you decided to converse on a different topic of your choosing.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Clown Prince of Crime

choices: Reassured you that was most unlikely in your case.
Simply said that was your paranoia talking.
However, before she could say anything, something happened...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
However, when she was about to divert onto another topic that wasn't dark, violent, and/or gruesome, Princess Luna eventually began to notice that you were appearing a little...fatter, than you were from their previous rendezvous with you, being aware of your bloated physical stature. So, in her best attempts to avoid offending you, the Alicorn princess calmly spoke toward you and asked, "Not to be offensive toward thou, (Name), but...thou appeared to be slightly, um... fatter?" In all honesty, Twilight was a little surprised by such a bold comment from the Princess of the Night. At first, you raised an eyebrow out of suspicion, but then realized that Luna was talking about your current weight, as you unleashed a defeated sigh before gazing toward both Luna and Twilight Sparkle as you answered, "*sigh*...Your guess is right, Luna. I... I've been gaining weight recently, but...it wasn't intentional by any means."

"What exactly do you mean by "not intentional", (Name)? It's alright, you can explain it to Luna and I. We aren't going to judge you for that." Twilight said, obviously reassuring you to be open on such a...sensitive topic, like one's weight. So, as your somewhat plump cheeks blushed a deep crimson hue, you eventually spoke toward Twilight and Luna, gently poking your fat equine belly with the tip of your forehoof several times while you replied, "...Thank you, Twilight Sparkle. Luna, um... do you remember when I told you that the cause of my transformation was when I was inside the house of Mrs. Fatsworth?"

"Very much, (Name). Thy fondly remember such a tale from thou. Why?" Luna answered, curious to know as to why you would bring up such a topic you've already discussed with her, where you then calmly spoke toward both Twilight and Luna and explained, "...Well, you see...When I was inside that house, I somehow became a little hungry. At first, I thought it was because I barely ate after lunch. However, shortly after my...transformation, that hunger became unbearable, and I ended up devouring a lot of Ice Cream and Milk from the house's fridge. By the time I finished eating and was able to regain control over myself, I inadvertently gained almost 200 pounds, and it wasn't muscle either. This is how I've got such a... soft physique."

"Yes, I am quite aware of what Luna told me of how you got this way and what you've endured, (Name). But still, 200 pounds is a lot of weight to gain so quickly for anypony. Why are you telling us this, (Name)?" Twilight asked, attempting to decipher your reasons for revealing such information toward her and Luna, despite being already aware of the events that transpired to your fat diapered Unicorn stature. Of course, in response to the mauve Alicorn's question, you looked back toward Twilight and bluntly answered, "...Twilight: I just recently found out that I now weigh almost 300 pounds, maybe even a little more than I thought. That alone makes me paranoid enough to think that there was something in the food I ate in that house that's somehow converting the food I eat into body fat. And yet, for some strange reason, I...*pokes belly a few times*...I like being fat. I mean, I don't know why I like this, but...it feels almost...relaxing, in a way."

"...Well, I don't blame you for feeling like this, (Name). After all, one of my friends, Fluttershy, has a much softer and rounder physique than me and the others. In fact, Rarity often hires her as a model at times when it came to a... bulkier customer. I believe Rarity calls her new line of clothes "Plus-Size", simply because they have larger bodies than the average Pony in Equestria, whether they're from Canterlot, Ponyville, Appleloosa, or even places like Manehattan and Trottingham." Twilight said, reassuring you in a friendly manner that there was nothing wrong with what you feel about your body, which certainly helped in that regard, even though you were still blushing a little out of feeling bashful, especially since Twilight basically confirmed that you're not the only Pony who likes being fat as well.

From there, you spoke toward Twilight once more and replied, "*giggle* Thank you so much for the encouragement, Twilight! ...Though, I got a feeling that things are going to get very weird tomorrow." "Well, why is that, (Name)? Does something happen on that day?" Twilight asked, curiously wondering what could exactly happen tomorrow. So, in an attempt to clarify things with the mauve Alicorn, you calmly spoke toward Twilight and Princess Luna and explained, "...You see, there is a certain holiday back on Earth we celebrate in November, Twilight. It's called "Thanksgiving", and it's a national holiday where I come from."

"Oh, I see! Very interesting, indeed. I didn't know humans have holidays...No offense, of course." Twilight answered, clearly intrigued by such an interesting revelation from you, as you then spoke back toward the mauve Alicorn and replied, "None taken, Twilight." "But still, why are you so concerned about such an important holiday then, (Name)? Are you worried about how your girlfriend's family will react to your...current form?" Twilight asked, clearly seeing a concerned on your plump equine face and snout. In response to her question of concern, you regained some of your composure before speaking toward the two Alicorns and explained, "No, Janice's Mom, Dad, and her sisters are already well aware of my condition! It's just that...I'm more concerned about the other members of Janice's family, like her grandparents, aunts, uncles, and several of her cousins. You know, THOSE kinds of people! Plus, there's also the matter of what I can and cannot eat."

"Oh? And what dost thou mean by that?" Luna asked, unable to help but become curious herself. After all, this was brand new information for her and Twilight, as you then took another sip of tea before speaking and answered, "...Okay, remember when I said a few days ago that humans are omnivores, eating both plants and meat? Well, on Thanksgiving, it's sort of a tradition that we have a cooked Turkey and eat it." "I understand now! Since you're now a Unicorn, your body can't properly digest meat without experiencing a bad case of indigestion or feeling sick, correct?" Twilight said, clearly understanding your predicament at hoof here, now knowing that there were multiple reasons as to why the event would be quite awkward indeed.

In response to her assumption, you nodded your head in confirmation toward Twilight, boldly and bluntly answering her question, then you spoke toward the mauve Alicorn and replied, "...That's exactly the point, Twilight. I mean, sure there's other stuff I can eat instead of Turkey and meat on Thanksgiving, but I'm more concerned with how the other members of Janice's family would react to someone like me, given my transformation into what I am now. But still, I'm just praying that it doesn't end with running me out of town." Of course, in response to such an answer, Twilight...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Noticing The Pudge

choices: Mrs. Connelly, who was preparing the turkey for Thanksgiving dinner.
Janice's Dad & twin sisters, who were watching the Macy Thanksgiving Parade.
Actually, the two of you decided to check up on something else instead....
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Although your reasons for concern were fairly valid to an extent, Twilight could obviously see that the thought of Janice's family running you out of town was ludicrously ridiculous, considering the imagined scenario. "...Well, the mere shock of seeing you in your current form, that is completely understandable. But the thought of simply "running you" out of town with an angry mob however...that seems much more ridiculous than you thought." Twilight said, clearly understanding your reason for such paranoia and speculation, where you then looked toward the mauve Alicorn with a raised eyebrow in confusion and asked, "...What are you even saying?"

"What I'm saying, (Name), is that you're simply jumping to ludicrous conclusions, which might not be the case. Sure, some members of your girlfriend's family would be in complete shock when it comes to your...equine appearance, but that doesn't mean that they're going to chase you out of your hometown with an angry mob like something out of Franken-Stallion." Twilight explained, simply laying out the facts regarding your paranoia-fueled theory.

At first, you thought that Twilight was thinking you're simply creating an excuse to hide yourself. However, you eventually realized that the mauve Alicorn was right: Your speculated theory was merely fueled and driven by a mix of paranoia and fear, exhaling a deep sigh in response to her words of reassurance, where you then spoke toward Twilight Sparkle and answered, "I... I-I'm so sorry. It's just that...this will be the first time I reveal what I've become to anyone besides Janice, her parents, and her twin sisters. So yeah, I admit that I'm nervous and afraid at the same time. Nervous of showing myself like...this, and afraid of what their reactions and the outcome would be exactly."

"Then, thy suggest thou should conquer and overcome such fear and hesitation, (Name)." Luna replied, putting her words of advice front and center in your mind, just as you, Twilight, and Luna suddenly heard the muffled sounds of Janice's voice, asking you to wake up. And with that indicating that your time with Twilight and Luna was up for the time being, you said your goodbyes toward the two Alicorn princesses, where they then did the same before disappearing from your dreamscape, while the dreamy environment began to dissipate as you regain consciousness.

------

Inevitably, once you fully awoke from your slumber, Janice was sitting beside you on the futon bed, watching a bit of TV in her bedroom for entertainment, where she then noticed you regaining consciousness. "Good morning, sweetie!" She said, delivering a tender loving kiss upon your plump equine snout, lovingly embracing the romantic affections with a gleeful smirk on your snout, wishing you could stay in bed with Janice if only for a little while longer.

However, you knew that you couldn't hide yourself in your girlfriend's bedroom for long, just as Janice slowly severed the loving embrace between you and her, where she sat there looming over you and asked, "I'm guessing you want your diaper changed then?" "*sigh*...Yeah, seeing as how it was bound to happen sooner or later, anyway." You replied, where Janice unfurled the blankets from your round equine frame, giving her full access in order to properly change your diaper, unbuttoning the onesie's flap in the process. While she stripped you of the stained diaper and tossed it into the new trash bin, Janice decided to strike up a conversation with you to pass the time and asked, "So, how did it go with Princess Luna and Twilight Sparkle?"

"...Well, Twilight asked me how similar the Mane-iac it to Batman's nemesis, the Joker. Though, I think I might've mentally scarred both her and Luna when I went into a lot of detail regarding the Clown Prince of Crime. However, Luna noticed that I gained some weight recently." You answered, just as you felt your girlfriend used some baby wipes to clean your crotch and flank, then administered baby powder to greatly decrease the chances of a diaper rash. From there, as she taped you into a thick clean diaper, Janice spoke toward you and said, "Yeah, I figured that would happen. After all, you've been getting a little fatter as of late."

"And yet, the weird thing about it is that I... I, um... I actually like being fat." You replied, bearing a deep crimson blush upon your chubby cheeks on full display. Of course, this came as somewhat of a surprise to Janice, since she was well aware that you were a bit of a health-nut. And yet, here you were, proclaiming to your beloved girlfriend that you liked being fat, while Janice carefully stripped you of the Twilight Sparkle onesie you were currently wearing, exchanging it for what appeared to be an Applejack-themed onesie, where she then gently pressed her right hand against the blubber of your furry belly, then lightly patted it a few times and said, "Well, I must admit: You do look quite adorable with all that "baby fat" on you. *giggle*"

Obviously, you couldn't help but blush some more due to such a flirtatious compliment coming from your girlfriend, as she then equipped the Applejack onesie on you, buttoning up the flaps over your bulky diaper with ease. "Although I won't be complaining about you choice anytime soon, sweetie. Besides, I always did have a thing for women with some meat on their bones. Just promise me you won't get TOO fat for your own good, alright?" Janice asked, which you then nodded in confirmation toward her and answered, "Of course, Janice!"

"Uh uh uh! You didn't say those magic words, "Janice said, her voice in a sing-song tone, wanting you to say those certain words she wanted to hear out of your mouth. Of course, you knew exactly what your girlfriend wanted out of you: the notorious Pinkie Pie swear. So, as you let out a defeated sigh knowing that she wasn't going to take your promise seriously unless you said those words, you spoke toward Janice once more and replied, "...Alright, fine! *sigh* Here goes nothing. "Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye!" There, happy now?"

"Very. See, that wasn't so hard, was it?" Janice said, where she then assisted you up onto your pastel pink hooves, feeling satisfied knowing that you were able to say the Pinkie Pie swear, much to your utter reluctance, as you then looked up toward your girlfriend and answered, "Easy for you to say, Janice. You could've at least not sound like a female Dennis Nedry when you made me do that whole promise...thing."

"Anyway, now that that's out of the way, what do you say we head downstairs and see what my folks are doing for Thanksgiving?" Janice asked, where she then proceeded to open the door for you to exit out of the room and trek downstairs, as you waddled out the door and replied, "Yeah, wonder if your Dad, Katie, and Elizabeth are watching the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade." Of course, as you waddled down the stairs, with Janice not too far behind you, you and your girlfriend decided to check up on...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Twilight's Reassurance

choices: Then, they heard someone knocking on the door. Might be the rest of the family.
Mrs. Connelly received a call from her mother. They're coming over here.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Upon reaching the bottom of the flight of stairs, both you and Janice were obviously aware that your girlfriend's father and twin sisters were currently watching the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade on the large television, while Mrs. Connelly was preoccupied with last-minute preparations for Thanksgiving before the rest of Janice's family pays a visit for the holiday. Of course, seeing as how you both had nothing better to do for the time being, you decided to join Janice's father, Katie, and Elizabeth on the couch, while Janice willingly decided to give her mother some assistance.

Despite some struggling due to the extra bulk on your equine frame, you eventually got yourself up onto the L-Shaped couch, where you then turned yourself around and sat down on your padded rump to face the television screen, since you were sitting next to Janice's father. Obviously, he was already well accustomed to seeing you in your current form by now, as he offered you some pulp-free orange juice that Mrs. Connelly had made for breakfast when he said, "Want some OJ?"

Of course, you willingly accepted the patriarch's offer, as you then used your magic to levitate the cup of orange juice, slowly but cautiously drinking it to avoid spilling any drop of juice onto your infantile outfit and pastel pink fur. "So... How are you holding up, (Name)?" He asked, wondering how you were feeling in regards to your unwilling transformation into a fat diapered Unicorn. In response to such a question, you let out a sigh and answered, "...Fine, I guess. I mean, it could have been much worse than it already is, Mr. Connelly."

"How so?" Mr. Connelly asked once more, wondering how exactly your equine condition could have been much worse than it already was for the time being. So, in response, you spoke toward him and replied, "...Well, for one: My mind could have regressed to that of a two year old. And two: I could've been MUCH fatter than I currently am." "True. But still, it makes me wonder why that place changed you into a fat Unicorn in diapers, anyway." Mr. Connelly remarked, despite the fact that both Mrs. Connelly and Janice had obviously explained what had transpired when you were inside the haunted estate of Ms. Fatsworth.

"Didn't your wife and Janice already explained what happened to me when you talked to them?" You asked, gazing upon the Connelly patriarch with a raised eyebrow, just as Katie abruptly entered in on the conversation and said, "Ooh! Maybe you secretly like My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, (Name)!" Upon hearing such an unexpected accusation from one of the twin siblings, you inadvertently began to blush a deep crimson hue, as if the show itself was considered your own personal guilty pleasure.

However, upon seeing the bashful but greatly embarrassed expression on your plump equine face and snout, Katie couldn't help but display this giddy expression on her youthful face, putting a hand to her mouth in order to stifle her giggles as best as she could. Of course, you were already aware of what Katie was currently doing, letting out a frustrated but defeated sigh in the process and utterly growled, "Yes yes, we get it: I secretly like My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, Go--Gosh darn it! Jeez, you don't have to rub it in."

"There, now doesn't that feel much better, (Name)?" Elizabeth asked, obviously siding with her twin sister on the matter at hoof, making you facepalm yourself in frustration with a single forehoof. From there, you looked back toward your girlfriend's youthful twin siblings with a frustrated expression on your plump equine face and snout, where you then spoke toward both Katie and Elizabeth then growled, "...You know, you two are VERY lucky that you're actually related to my girlfriend. Otherwise, nothing would save you from MY wrath." "Oh? Is that a threat?" Katie remarked, taunting you somewhat, which pushed your buttons a little in the process.

Fortunately, Mr. Connelly decided to intervene in this potential fight, where he then spoke toward both you and his twin daughters and said, "Okay, I think that's enough you both. Katie, it's not nice to force someone's secrets out. And (Name), same goes for you, especially when you're making threats." Upon hearing such words from the Connelly patriarch, you and Katie had no alternative but to apologize toward one another.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade

choices: Eventually, the remaining members of Janice's family had arrived.
Fast forward to Thanksgiving dinner, where everyone is eating their meals.
Fast forward to after the Thanksgiving dinner, where everyone is relaxing...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
But then, just as you and Katie were about to formally apologize toward one another, you all suddenly were abruptly interrupted by the sound of someone firmly knocking on the front door. "Hm, wonder who that could be?" Mr. Connelly asked, as he then stood up from the couch and approached the front entrance to his home. Obviously not wanting yourself to be exposed in front of whoever was knocking, you quickly used your magic to grab a homemade quilt , covering yourself with the quilt with little success due to your rotund equine frame and physique. From there, Mr. Connelly turned the doorknob and opened the door, revealing it to be none other than Janice's grandmother and grandfather, Annabelle and Jonathan Connelly, along with Mrs. Connelly's sister, Josephine. Then, he greeted both his mother and father-in-law, as well as his sister-in-law, where he then spoke toward them and said, "Happy Thanksgiving, Annabelle and Jonathan!"

Of course, being the friendly sort, Janice's grandmother wrapped her son-in-law in a short but tight hug then replied, "Same here, Jack!" From there,as they entered inside, both Katie and Elizabeth swiftly got off the couch and ran over to hug their grandparents in a familial embrace. However, as much as you wanted to keep your fat diapered equine affliction hidden from prying eyes, you couldn't help but become just a little curious about your girlfriend's relatives, cautiously poking your plump equine head and snout out a sliver, only to see Janice's Aunt Josephine waddle through the door and into the house interior. "Rosanne was right. Her sister was affected by that stupid house as well." You thought to yourself, taking notice of Josephine's overall size and blubbery girth, feeling that the woman's rear was made larger thanks to a bulky diaper underneath her clothes.

Unfortunately for you, that short moment of your piqued curiosity cost you your chances of staying incognito, as Janice's grandmother then noticed you underneath the quilt, where she began to approach you and said, "Oh? And who might this be?" "Grandma, that's (Name). She's Janice's girlfriend. You know, the one that got changed into a fat Unicorn in diapers. Katie replied, informing her grandmother of your identity. However, Janice then noticed her grandmother approaching you, where she quickly turned around then confronted her and said, "Uh, Grandma...I don't think she wants you to see her right now." "Nonsense! I'm sure your girlfriend here is just simply shy, Janice." Annabelle answered, which raised a red flag in your mind as to why your girlfriend's grandmother was behaving so calm regarding your current rotund equine form. After all, she wasn't panicking upon setting her sights on you, so it raised the question on why Annabelle was so calm and friendly toward you.

Then, despite using the quilt to conceal your plump equine face and snout, Janice's grandmother slowly lifted up a corner of the quilt, directly facing you, where she then spoke to you with a calm friendly tone and said, "...It's alright, dearie. I'm not going to hurt you." Still fearful of their reaction, you attempted to avoid direct eye contact with the elderly matriarch, but to no avail, as Annabelle continued speaking with you and said, "I know you're very scared right now, but there's nothing to be afraid of. So...will you come out and say hello?"

So, in response to such a calm demeanor, you hesitantly spoke toward Janice's grandmother and asked, "But...B-But why? Why aren't you in complete shock from seeing me like this?" "I'm so sorry, (Name). It was my idea. I, um... I showed what happened to you to my grandparents and a few of my relatives." Janice answered, greatly apologizing for revealing the truth of your equine affliction to several of her family relatives. At first, you felt both angry and upset towards your girlfriend from such an unwilling revelation. However, you knew that it was somewhat inevitable that such a situation would arise eventually, as you unleashed a defeated sigh in response.

From there, you slowly but noticeably revealed yourself out from under the homemade quilt and gazed upon Annabelle with blushing crimson red cheeks on full display. Of course, in her best attempt to reassure you and raise your spirits, Janice's grandmother began to softly pet your purple and green mane, which seemed to help relieve you of the stress, as the elderly matriarch calmly spoke toward you and said, "...Well, I must say, dear: For someone who was transformed into a Unicorn, you're certainly both beautiful and adorable, (Name)."

In response to such a friendly compliment, you couldn't help but blush a bit more out of feeling bashfully embarrassed, especially since it was also gaining the attention of the rotund infantile Josephine, who proceeded to hug you like a fat stuffed animal. From there, Rosanne then approached the obese Josephine and guided her sister over into the Play-Room, in order to the fat diapered Josephine preoccupied with the numerous toys on-hand. Then, shortly after reassuring you, Annabelle then decided to assist her daughter in prepping the food for Thanksgiving.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Janice's Relatives

choices: Janice tries to have a conversation with you, hoping to put your mind at ease.
However, on of Janice's cousins approaches you.
Fast forward to after Thanksgiving dinner, where everyone is trying to relax...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Eventually, after several hours of seeing some of Janice's familial relatives entering the Connelly estate and seeing what you've become first-hand, you somewhat became the topic of many conversations from both the adult family members, and the youthful family members as well. Most of Janice's Aunts found you to be quite adorable as a fat diapered Unicorn, making it all the more tempting for them to knit up a large sweater or two for you for Christmas, while some of your girlfriend's Uncles were surprisingly sympathetic toward your rotund equine plight.

Fortunately for you, Janice was able to successfully convince her relatives to give you some personal space, especially since you intentionally didn't want to be coddling all of their somewhat undivided attention. However, by the time everyone began to gather at their respective tables to begin Thanksgiving dinner, Janice decided to consume her Thanksgiving dinner alongside you, especially since you haven't moved from your position on the L-Shaped couch whatsoever out of hesitation, as she carried her plate of food in one hand, and your plate of food in the other.

As she set your plate of food in front of you, Janice spoke toward you and said, "Here you go, (Name). I got you some Green Beans with a few big slices of Pumpkin Pie." From there, you finally showed signs of life, as you turned your plump equine head and snout to look at your beloved girlfriend and replied, "...Thank you, Janice." "Anytime, sweetie! ...Look, I'm really really sorry you had to deal with so much attention from my relatives, (Name). I didn't mean to get you so nervous." Janice apologized, confessing a formal apology toward you regarding what you had to endure in the process.

Of course, as you calmly consumed the Green Beans with a magically levitated fork to insert the Green Beans into your waiting mouth, you then spoke toward your girlfriend and answered, "...It's fine. No use hiding the fact that my Ponified affliction is now made public to your extended family." Obviously, Janice could see that you were still upset about her revealing you to her relatives while she consumed some dark Turkey meat in the process. From there, in response to your current feelings, Janice then spoke toward you and said, "Look, I know you're not exactly...happy, with what I've done. But that doesn't mean I didn't take this decision lightly either, (Name)."

However, just as you were about to take a big bite out of one of the large slices of Pumpkin Pie, you looked back at your girlfriend with a curious but perplexed look on your plump equine face and snout then asked, "...Why do you say that?" "*sigh*...It was because I didn't want to hurt you emotionally. I know that you're uncomfortable with strangers seeing you like this, but...I couldn't think of no other alternative besides simply revealing you to my relatives." Janice explained, letting you know that this decision weighed heavily on Janice's conscience.

Upon seeing that her decision weighed heavily on her conscience, you then focused back on your beloved Janice and said, "...I believe you, honey. I'm sorry about my behavior toward you, Janice. It's just that I...I feel like I'm not ready to reveal myself like...this." From there, you then munched down on a big chunk of the Pumpkin Pie slice, swallowing the delicious dessert with utter delight on your taste buds. But then, as if you felt like you haven't eaten anything for days, you began to devour more and more of the Pumpkin Pie slices with gluttonous gusto, almost as if you're enveloped in a hunger-induced trance.

Obviously, Janice couldn't help but giggle from seeing you in your current stupor, having this adorable look on your equine face and snout with plump full cheeks filled with Pumpkin Pie. However, once you were finished devouring the big slices of Pumpkin Pie on your plate, you swallowed the Pumpkin Pie remains down your gullet and into your stomach, sporting this embarrassed look on your face, complete with blushing crimson red cheeks, while bits of Pumpkin Pie were smeared against the pastel pink fur on your plump equine snout, as you then hesitantly spoke to Janice and asked, "Um...C-Could you give me some more Pumpkin Pie...p-please?"

"*giggle* I figured you would still be hungry. I'll be right back." Janice flirtatiously remarked, gently patting you on the belly once, as she then stood up, grabbed your empty plate, and walked over to the Kitchen to get more slices of Pumpkin Pie for you. Eventually, she returned to your side with a plate full of Pumpkin Pie slices, as she placed the plate in front of you on the L-Shaped couch, where you then used your magic to levitate a slice or two to your plump equine snout, and began to take some big greedy bites out of said slices of Pumpkin Pie.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Thanksgiving With The Connellys

choices: Eventually, Janice was able to enter inside the Fatsworth home.
When you woke up this morning, Janice was gone!
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
However, in her best attempt to diffuse the tension and put your mind at ease, Janice eventually decided to strike up a conversation, girlfriend to girlfriend, where she then spoke toward you while you continued to devour those large slices of Pumpkin Pie and asked, "So, um... how is the Pumpkin Pie?" "Mmmmm! Sooo gooood." You bluntly answered, speaking with a mouthful of Pumpkin Pie, obviously savoring the delectable taste upon your equine tongue.

Although her method appeared to be working with success, Janice couldn't help but have this gnawing feeling within her subconscious. In truth, she felt both somewhat jealous and sympathetic toward your rotund equine predicament. The jealousy stemmed from the fact that you were meeting both Twilight Sparkle and Princess Luna in your dreams, while the sympathy originated from the truth that you were sort of alone with this affliction, that no one else was cursed in a similar fashion as you. So, out of curiosity at the prospect, Janice then spoke toward you and said, "(Name)...can I, um...can I ask you something?"

Upon hearing what your beloved girlfriend had asked you moments ago, you swallowed the slices of Pumpkin Pie in your mouth, then looked at her with a slightly concerned look on your plump equine face and snout then asked, "Janice, are you...are you feeling alright?" "...I'm fine, sweetie. I just want you to answer a question for me, that's all." Janice answered, which somewhat reassured you, yet kept you suspicious as well. So inevitably, you reluctantly decided to play along with what your girlfriend desired, as you spoke toward her and said, "Of course, Janice. So, uh...what exactly is on your mind?"

"*long sigh*...I know that this probably might sound stupid to you, but... Say, I went inside the old haunted house of Mrs. Fatsworth, and I got myself transformed in a similar manner as you. Would you, um...would you still love me?" Janice asked, bearing this noticeable hesitation in her voice, desiring to hear your personal opinion on such a "what-if scenario". So, shortly after hearing out what Janice had confessed to you, you exhaled a deep sigh in response, where you then calmly spoke toward your girlfriend and answered, "Janice... Even if you were transformed like I was, I would still love you as if you were still human. I mean, sure I might be both angry and upset over what you did, but...I would devote myself to making sure you live a happy life. "

Of course, in response, to hearing such romantic devotion coming from you, Janice then wrapped her arms around you in a tight loving embrace. In all honesty, you somewhat weren't expecting this, but you inevitably wrapped your plump forehooves around your beloved girlfriend as best as you possibly could, despite your overall rotund equine bulk and girth. "...Thank you, (Name). Thank you." Janice said, as she continued to hug for a moment or two, where you then spoke up and asked, "Anytime, honey. But...why are you asking me about something like this?"

Shortly after hearing your question with a somewhat clear mind, Janice then severed the hug between you and her, where she looked at you as she calmly spoke toward you and confessed, "...To be honest, (Name), I... When I saw you laying there on the couch, you had this look of... loneliness in you, as if you feel like you're alone with what you've become, with no one who shares the same experience as you do. I just...I just hate seeing you in a mood like that, it makes me feel like I've hurt you or something."

From there, upon hearing those words of confession from your beloved girlfriend, you felt this wave of guilt wash over you, knowing that you didn't mean to make Janice feel so upset in the first place. So, in your best attempt to reassure your girlfriend, you gently placed a plump forehoof upon Janice's hand, letting her know that you're deeply sorry for making her worry so much, as you calmly spoke to her with watery eyes and replied, "...Sorry for making you worry so much about me, honey." Of course, in response to your heartfelt apology, Janice's lips curved into a reassured smile, where she then planted a long passionate kiss upon your plump equine snout, thus rekindling those romantic affections between you and her.

------

Eventually, Thanksgiving dinner had come and gone, as Janice's maternal relatives said their goodbyes to both you and the Connelly family, returning to their respective vehicles to head home. However, since nightfall had already arrived sooner than expected, everyone decided to call it a day and proceeded to their bedrooms to sleep for the night. But then, a few hours later, Janice woke up in the middle of the night, and quietly got up from her bed, avoiding to mistakenly waking up you and her family. Then, she looked at your slumbering form and thought, "...I'm sorry, (Name). But this is something I have to do, not because I'm jealous, but...what I'm about to do was all for you."

From there, after quietly exiting her bedroom, Janice slowly crept her way downstairs, where she then equipped herself into a winter jacket, a pair of winter boots, and grabbed a flashlight from the Utility Closet. After all, it was currently snowing heavily at the time, so she had to dress warm, despite wearing pajama shorts. However, what she was about to do would certainly warrant some ranting from both you and her mother: She was going to enter the old haunted house of Mrs. Fatsworth, possibly to transform herself in the same manner and fashion as you, as she quietly exited her home and closed the door behind her, making her way across the street through the storming winter weather.

Hooves and a pair of feathery wings. She was becoming a Pegasus.

1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
However, despite the stormy winter weather hindering her progress some, Janice was eventually able to approach the old house of Mrs. Fatsworth with little difficulty, as she slowly climbed up the stairs to the front porch. "...Well, here goes nothing." Janice said to herself, as she approached the front door. Surprisingly, just as she was about to grab the doorknob, the front door began to eerily open by itself, as if it was enticing Janice to walk inside the derelict home.

Of course, Janice voluntarily proceeded to walk through the opened door and into the interior of the Fatsworth estate, where the front door suddenly closed itself behind her. "Okay, no turning back now, Janice." She said to herself once more, as she stood there in the main lobby of the derelict yet warm home. And boy, did it look exactly the same way as she remembered previously: bright babyish colors, warm fuzzy carpeting, and an infantile appearance to the numerous articles of furniture within the haunted house. So, Janice unzipped her winter coat and hung it on a nearby coat rack, then unstrapped the winter boots from her feet, leaving her in just her pink MLP pajamas.

Now that she made herself more comfortable within the Fatsworth estate, Janice then cautiously proceeded down the nearby hallway to her right, carefully examining each room to see which one had the thick bulky diapers with the tail-holes. Eventually, she managed to find the exact same room with said diapers, her lips curving into a satisfied smirk upon seeing the room. From there, Janice slowly walked into the room began to thoroughly search through some of the numerous diapers, until she came across a thick bulky sky blue diaper with blue polka dots on it.

Then, she stripped off her pajama shorts and panties, where she then put on the padded infantile undergarment, which forcefully spread your legs apart due to it's overall bulk. Of course, Janice then grabbed her pajama shorts and put them back on, covering up her newly acquired padded diaper, which did little to no use in hiding the overall thickness of the infantile undergarment, patting the taut surface of her pajama bottoms with a mix of satisfaction and curiosity. "Now, all I gotta do is wait until I start changing." Janice said to herself, eagerly anticipating her transformation into something from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. After all, she was doing all of this for you.

However, she didn't have to wait for long, as Janice felt something on her body transform, which originated in the form of...

choices: Her growling stomach, demanding to be fed with tasty treats.
Footsteps approaching her current position. Who could it be?
Actually, it was something else entirely...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Upon looking downward toward her legs, Janice could see that her human feet were transforming into a pair of chalk white furry equine hooves. But suddenly, she felt this slightly stinging sensation coming from her forehead, where she then looked up and saw that she was growing a 3 and a half inch long Unicorn horn. "I...I-I'm becoming a Unicorn, just like (Name)!" She said, having this surge of excitement in her voice, as she then carefully touched her newfound Unicorn horn with her still-human right hand, feeling the magical appendage harden in her gentle grip.

However, just as she was preoccupied with admiring her horn, Janice then felt her spine extending, forming her new equine tail, where the hair on her tail took on a yellow and neon blue hue. And yet, just as she thought that her newfound pony tail was about to burst and tear through the seat of her pajama shorts, some sort of mystical force began to warp and alter Janice's pink pajama shorts to accommodate her still-altering physique, as her yellow and neon blue pony tail stuck out from the seat of the pajama shorts thanks to a newfound tail-hole.

From there, Janice felt her body progressing some more into her transformation, forcing her to position herself on all four limbs, just as her hands slowly changed into her new forehooves, while her skin sprouted more chalk white fur across her body. But while that happened, Janice began to notice her hair was changing as well, lengthening into a full equine yellow and neon blue mane, just as her human ears altered and migrated to the top of her head.

Finally, as ninety percent of her body had already been transformed into her newfound equine form, Janice felt her eyes beginning to change as well, changing from a set of light brown eyes, to a brand new pair of magenta eyes, while her fur-covered face began to extend into a soft feminine equine snout, thus completing Janice's transformation into a Unicorn. Once her transformation was complete, Janice then began to search around the room for a mirror, so she could see what she looks like now. Fortunately for her, she was eventually successful with that task, where she became both surprised and ecstatic over her new form.

"Oh My Gosh! I look exactly like my Ponysona, Ivory Sapphire! Janice exclaimed, quickly realizing she had transformed into her personal MLP OC (Original Character), Ivory Sapphire, as she sat there on her diapered flank with her white forehooves pressed against the tip of her snout with an expression of surprise on her equine face and snout. However, she couldn't help but unleash an outburst of sheer joy and glee as she said, "Yes! Yesyesyes Yes!! Now (Name) won't be alone as a fat diapered pony." But suddenly, Janice then heard a noise inside the house, which essentially took in the form of...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Janice The Unicorn

choices: Now back inside her own home, staring at you & her concerned mother.
Actually, she woke up somewhere else instead...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
And speaking of becoming like you, Janice suddenly heard a loud noise erupting within the infantile room. However, your transformed girlfriend soon realized that it was actually her own stomach that was emanating such a noise. "...Well, it sounds like it's definitely time to fatten myself up, then." Janice said to herself, gently patting her equine abdomen with a white forehoof, where she then waddled out of the room and into the hallway, becoming accustomed to waddling around in a thick bulky diaper.

"Now, if my memory is correct, the Kitchen should be... That way!" Janice said to herself once more, sifting through her photographic memory to remember the overall layout of the Fatsworth house, as she waddled her way down the hall, turned right, and finally made her way into the Kitchen with little to no difficulty. From there, she sniffed the air and picked up a delicious aroma coming from the refrigerator, causing her mouth to drool a little out of some sort of growing untamed hunger swelling within her.

Although the aroma itself was heavily enticing for her, Janice still concentrated on the motive for why she was here in the first place: To make sure you don't feel alone as a fat diapered pony. Then, Janice began to slowly waddle toward the fridge, approaching it with steadfast determination, as she then opened the refrigerator door with some difficulty due to not having human digits to assist her in this endeavor.

Eventually, Janice was able to pry the door open, revealing numerous amounts of delicious sweets and treats within the confines of the refrigerator, causing her stomach to growl even louder than before, demanding to be fed immediately. "*sigh*...Alright, Janice. Here goes nothing." Janice said to herself, now finding herself at the point of no return, as she began to stand up on her hindhooves, then began to take big bites out of the cake before her.

However, once she took a bite out of the delicious cake, her taste buds felt like they had gone to heaven, as she thought, "Oh my! This is really good!" From there, Janice began to take more greedy bites out of everything she could bite on within the fridge. But while she was preoccupied with greedily stuffing her face, your girlfriend's equine body slowly but noticeably began to swell with body fat, as both her thick blue diaper and pink pajamas began to magically grow in size to accommodate for her fattening physique.

Eventually, by the time she was finished with devouring as much food as possible, the damage had already been done, as Janice now laid there on her back, now with a blubbery rotund physique, while she rubbed her bloated furry belly with a pleasured look on her now plump equine face and snout. However, due to her stomach now being so full of food, Janice began to fall into a food coma, closing her eyes while she laid there on the floor. But by the time she regained consciousness, Janice was...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Fattening A Unicorn

choices: Later on, you were eating lunch with Janice on the couch.
Fast forward to a week later, and see how things are faring...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Some hours later, Janice was able to digest all of the food she viciously consumed inside her equine stomach, where she slowly but eventually regained consciousness. At first, she couldn't make out where she was now, but she could easily see that it was currently early in the morning. However, once her vision finally cleared up, Janice instantly realized that she was now back inside her own home.

"I'm home! But...how did I get back here?" Janice thought to herself, being a little confused as to how exactly she was back inside her house. After all, she remembered passing out on the Kitchen floor of the Fatsworth estate, courtesy of a self-induced food coma. Fortunately for her, your girlfriend was about to receive such answers, which originated in the form of both you and her mother staring back at her. Of course, you had this look of concern and sympathy on your plump equine face and snout, while Mrs. Connelly bore this conflicted mix between concern and being greatly upset, especially due to what Janice had done.

"Um... Hi Mom, (Name). Why are you both looking at me like that?" Janice asked, rubbing the sleep out of her magenta eyes with her plump forehooves. But then, something snapped inside Mrs. Connelly, as she slapped her open hand against your girlfriend's slightly chubby furry cheeks, reacting as if Janice had done something both reckless and dangerous, where the Connelly matriarch then spoke toward her now equine daughter and exclaimed, "JANICE SMITH CONNELLY!! Have you lost your mind?! Don't you remember how dangerous that damned house is!?! Why did you go in there!?!"

Obviously, Janice was easily intimidated by her mother's outburst, which prompted Mrs. Connelly to swiftly wrap her plump arms around her rotund equine daughter in a worried maternal embrace, letting your girlfriend know that she didn't mean to snap at her. "Just why...why did you go into that God forsaken house, Janice?" Mrs. Connelly asked, desiring to know why her eldest daughter went inside the Fatsworth house, despite the reasonable warnings from the matriarch herself.

In response to her mother's question, Janice wrapped her plump forehooves around her mother as best as her rotund equine frame would allow her. From there, Janice then proceeded to speak toward her mother and answered, "...I'm so sorry for making you worried, Mom. But...I did this to myself...for (Name)." "For...F-For me?" You asked, becoming slightly confused over what she said. However, what Janice said earlier during Thanksgiving suddenly made all the more sense now, as you then spoke toward your beloved girlfriend and said, "This...This is about what you said to me during Thanksgiving, isn't it?"

Of course, in response to your question, Janice firmly nodded her plump equine head and snout in confirmation toward both you and Mrs. Connelly then replied, "...Yes, it's about what I asked you earlier, sweetie. You know very well that I would do anything to make you happy again, even if it meant having myself succumb to the same affliction as you. Ever since we allowed you to stay with me and my family, you had this depressed look on your face and snout. So, I decided to make sure you're not alone as a fat diapered pony, (Name), whether you like my decision or not."

Upon hearing such a confession from her, you couldn't help but feel guilty from such results. After all, you unwittingly led Janice down that path to transforming herself into a fat diapered Unicorn from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, as you then climbed up onto the couch, then wrapped your plump pastel pink forehooves around Janice in a loving but sympathetic embrace, while Mrs. Connelly severed her own hug and decided to give you and your now equine girlfriend some space as she said, "I'll, um... give you two some space."

Shortly after Mrs. Connelly left and walked into the Kitchen to make breakfast, you began to hug Janice just a little tighter than before, shedding a few tears in the process, causing you to press your fat equine belly against Janice's own tubby abdomen, where you then spoke toward your beloved girlfriend and said, "Janice, I...*sob*...I'm so so sorry. I...I didn't truly mean to make you so worried about me. It's...*sob*...It's my fault that you're now stuck like this!!"

And in one fell swoop, you couldn't hold back the waterworks anymore, as you began to cry, whimper, and sob like a little girl, feeling like you're somewhat the blame for Janice's actions and transformation into a fat diapered pony. However, in her best attempts to calm you down, Janice proceeded to wrap her plump forehooves around you in a compassionate loving embrace and answered, "(Name)...sweetie. It's not your fault, I chose to become like this...willingly. I did this for you, and you alone. Now please, would you...would you please open your eyes and look at me?"

From there, you did what Janice asked of you, as you slowly opened your watery eyes and gazed upon your equine girlfriend, who was shedding a few tears of her own while she said, "Please, (Name)...no more crying. It's going to be alright, sweetie." "*sob*...*sob*...Janice, I said that I would promise to devote my time to making you the happiest girl in the world, and...*sob*...That's what I intend to do." You replied, your voice cracking a little from being greatly saddened by Janice's willing transformation, as you hugged her a little more tighter while promising to devoting your time and effort to make sure that your girlfriend was happy.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Back Home & A Concerned Mother
