1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: A Specific Timeframe

choices: Playing a game with Janice on her PlayStation 4.
Conversing with Twilight Sparkle & Princess Luna within your dreams.
Actually, you were doing something else instead...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
A wise man once said the "Time sure does fly", and those few words couldn't be further from the truth. Although your beloved girlfriend had willingly transformed herself into a fat diapered pony for you, things slowly but eventually returned to some sense of normalcy within the Connelly household. Of course, Janice's youthful twin sisters, Katie and Elizabeth, weren't exactly complaining about their older sister's new rotund equine form, loving every second of her being an adorably fat diapered pony.

However, despite all that's happened recently, you noticed that Janice was always in this chipper happy mood, loving every moment as a fat diapered Unicorn mare, often displaying her fat diapered flank while she waddled around her house with an adorable, cute, and somewhat infantile manner. Though, a few days later after Thanksgiving Day, Jack Connelly, Janice's father, returned to the Navy vessel he was assigned on, resuming his active duty within the U.S Navy

But like you said to her previously, you promised to devote your time, love, and effort to making Janice happy, which obviously meant watching entire episodes of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic with her. At first, you simply attempted to ignore watching your girlfriend's favorite cartoon series. However, over the course of a few days, you slowly but noticeably became quite fond of the equine franchise, always binge watching several episodes within a few measly hours.

Although, due to now being a fat diapered pony, Janice couldn't be allowed to go to school anymore, since there was the potential of panic and disbelief from the public masses as a whole, thus allowing you to spend more quality time with your beloved girlfriend. However, the time you spent with Janice wasn't just simply limited to watching My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. Apparently, Mrs. Connelly decided to channel her inner seamstress, designing and creating fashionable but adorable sets of clothing for you and Janice to wear.

What exactly do you want to know about Zombies?"

"...Actually, I am curiously interested on what your interpretation of a Zombie would be like, (Name). After all, I'm certain that there is a specific work of fiction from your world that has Zombies that you like the most." Twilight replied, curious and intrigued to know what your favorite form of Zombie was in popular culture. Of course, you had assorted a top 5 favorite forms of Zombies in your mind, but your most favorite of them all were none other than...

1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Intent on answering Twilight Sparkle's question about your favorite kind of Zombie, you thoroughly searched through your mind over what exactly your favorite Zombie was from pop culture as a whole. However, one specific kind of undead monstrosity kept pooping up in your mind over and over repeatedly: The Clickers, the fungi-based Zombies from the critically acclaimed video game, The Last of Us.

After all, out of all the usual mediocre origins of a Zombie plague, the Clickers from The Last of Us had a... unique origin, as well as an interesting concept. To elaborate, instead of a man-made genetically engineered virus being the cause of the outbreak, the cause of humans transforming into Clickers comes from a mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus, which is known to infect insects with it's spores and uses the insect's body as an unwilling host to spread it's spores, transforming said insect's body and exoskeleton in the process. But it wasn't just their unique concept that made the Clickers interesting, it was also how they were portrayed as well.

So, shortly after some careful thought and consideration, you then looked back at both Twilight and Luna, where you then spoke toward the two Alicorns and said, "...Well, to answer your question, Twilight. I actually do have a favorite kind of Zombie. In fact, you might find my choice to be very...intriguing. *giggle*" "Oh really? ...Well, don't just keep us in suspense here, (Name). Tell us!" Twilight replied, becoming somewhat more curious on what you had in mind.

From there, as you then levitated your own respective teacup and took a sip of the warm tea, you then spoke toward the mauve Alicorn and answered, "Clickers." "...Clickers? And what exactly are these..."Clickers" then, (Name)?" Twilight asked, raising a confused yet greatly curious eyebrow in response to your singular answer. Fortunately for her, you were more than willing to provide the mauve Alicorn with such answers, where you then turned your plump equine head and snout toward Princess Luna and said, "Luna, could you please bring up that Memory Mirror of mine?"

"Of course, (Name)." Luna replied, as her horn glowed with a cobalt blue hue, causing your Memory Mirror to resurface before you and the two Alicorns. From there, you began to search through your memories to find that specific scene from The Last of Us. Eventually, you were able to find said scene, as you then showed it to Twilight while the scene played out in the mirror's reflection.

The scene began, where it showed 3 of the characters, Joel, Ellie, and Tess, taking cover behind a long desk within the derelict skyscraper, staying as quiet as humanly possible, just as Twilight had witnessed the most grotesque creature appearing before the hiding trio of humans, where it shambled into the room, making these guttural clicking noises in the process. Shortly after presenting such a suspenseful scene before the mauve Alicorn, Twilight then looked at you with a set of eyes set to shock and awe, where she spoke toward you and asked, "What...in Tartarus was that?!"

"That thing, Twilight Sparkle...was a Clicker. It's from a video game called "The Last of Us". As for what it is, it's basically a human that became a Zombie from a mutated version of certain fungus that infects insects." You explained, letting Twilight know that the grotesque creature she saw in your Memory Mirror was indeed a Clicker. However, upon hearing you say that such a transformation was caused by a certain fungus, Twilight eventually realized which fungus you were referencing to and said, "Fungus? Wait, you mean the Ophiocordyceps Unilateralis fungus?"

In response, you firmly nodded your plump equine head and snout in confirmation toward the mauve Alicorn, confusing Luna some over what Twilight was talking about and asked, "...Excuse thee?" "*sigh*...It's called the Ophiocordyceps Unilateralis, Luna. It's basically a kind of fungus that infects insects with it's spores, transforming them into a Zombie-like state, using the insect as an unwilling host to spread it's spores." Twilight explained, unintentionally confusing Luna a little more. After all, even though she was one of the two rulers of Equestria, Luna wasn't as fluent in the field of Science as Twilight was.

So, in an attempt to de-confuse the Alicorn princess, you then began to speak toward Princess Luna and bluntly answered, "...In layman's terms, Luna: That fungus acts like a vicious parasite, using one's body to spread like a plague." Fortunately, your simple explanation was considered a success, as Luna was able to comprehend both your words and Twilight's words, where she then spoke up and said, "...So, let thee understand clearly: This..."fungus", infects creatures with it's spores, converting them into Zombies. Correct?"

"Yep. That's pretty much what Twilight was saying, Luna. However, the Clickers from The Last of Us are the result of a mutated version of that fungus, where instead of infecting bugs and insects, it's now clearly capable of infecting humans as well, transforming them via bite." You explained, going into further detail as to what the Clickers are like, prompting Twilight to ask you another question and asked, "...Alright, so... are these Clickers still capable of sight underneath all of that fungus growth?"

"...Fortunately and unfortunately, nope. You see, on one hand, Clickers are as blind as bats with all of that fungus growth covering their faces. But on the other hand, their hearing has become much more sensitive, hence why they make those clicking noises. They use echolocation to locate new victims to spread their infectious spores." You answered, giving both Twilight Sparkle and Princess Luna more intriguing information regarding the Clickers from The Last of Us.

So instead, she eventually decided to divert the conversation onto another subject instead, where she then spoke toward you and asked, "So, um...how exactly is your marefriend Janice holding up, (Name)?" "*sigh*...To be honest, Twilight: I think she likes being a fat diapered Unicorn much more than being human." You replied, obviously unsure if you should be relieved or frustrated.

Either way, you continued speaking toward the mauve Alicorn and said, "I mean, sure I should be feeling relieved that she isn't freaking out over becoming a fat diapered Unicorn permanently, but...Should I really be worried about what Janice thinks?" Obviously wanting to help you with such a personal conundrum, Twilight Sparkle eventually spoke toward you and answered, "...Well, in all honesty, (Name), as much as I personally want to help you, I'm...I'm afraid I don't have prior experience on such romantic affections like the one you share with Janice. I'm terribly sorry."

At first, you felt somewhat frustrated at this revelation. However, you soon came to understand. After all, even though Twilight Sparkle was the self-proclaimed Princess of Friendship, she wasn't what you would call a "Princess of Romance", especially since she hasn't yet experienced true love like you and Janice, or even her older brother, Shining Armor, and Princess Cadence. Overall, Twilight had no previous experience or personal knowledge in the terms of romance.

So, after letting out a deep defeated sigh, you eventually took another sip from your teacup, where you then gazed upon the mauve Alicorn that was Twilight Sparkle and said, "...Well, isn't there anything you CAN do to help both me and Janice?" Upon some careful thought and consideration on your question, Twilight also took a sip from her respective teacup as well before speaking, where she then proceeded to speak to you and replied, "...(Name), do you remember when I told you that I was working on an Advanced Teleportation Spell?"

"...Yeah, I remember. You said it could allow you to transport yourself to a different planet. Why?" You asked, becoming curious as to exactly why Twilight would bring up something as a Teleportation Spell. However, in response to such a question coming from you, Twilight's lips curved into a grin upon her equine snout, as she spoke toward you and answered, "...Well, I actually managed to finish creating the spell, (Name). However, all I need now are accurate coordinates for precision, thus allowing me to teleport myself and/or anypony or anything I want to bring along to where you and Janice are located."

"So...in other words, all you need now to complete your Teleportation Spell is our location? ...That's great news, Twilight!" You said, congratulating the mauve Alicorn on such a tremendous mystical feat, clapping your plump pink forehooves for a few seconds in applause. However, despite your positive response, Princess Luna could feel a sense of hesitation and concern within you, where she then calmly spoke toward you and asked, "Tell us, (Name): What troubles thou?"

Of course, you stopped clapping upon hearing what Princess Luna had said, a little surprised that she could sense your inner emotions. Then again, you figured that this must have been one of the numerous perks of being able to traverse into other peoples' dreams at will, especially since Luna was essentially Equestria's equivalent to a Goddess of Dreams. So, knowing that you had some doubt in your subconscious, you then let out a deep sigh and replied, "*sigh*...You're right, Luna. I'm sort of hesitant on having Twilight come to Earth."

"But...why is that, (Name)? I mean, from what you've told us about your beloved Janice, she would be ecstatic to see her favorite Alicorn in the flesh." Twilight asked, obviously referencing to Janice being a huge fan of Twilight Sparkle, as the mauve Alicorn looked at you with a confused look on her face and snout. In response to what she asked, you then gazed upon both Twilight and Luna as you answered, "It's not about me or Janice, Twilight. I've already accepted the fact that both you, Luna, Equestria, and everything else from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic exists. I'm just worried about how my girlfriend's mother, Mrs. Connelly, is going to react if she sees YOU, Twilight Sparkle. I mean, she's mostly adjusted to already seeing her eldest daughter as a fat diapered Unicorn by now, and I'm not sure how she's going to react if you teleported into her home and said: "Hi, my name is Twilight Sparkle, and I've come to see your daughter." Believe me,she'll most likely freak out or faint."

Although she could tell that you were somewhat exaggerating, Twilight could see that you raised a valid point on the matter at hoof. After all, the mauve Alicorn couldn't simply just teleport into the Connelly household without some sort of fuss. So after some careful thought and consideration, Twilight eventually spoke toward you and said, "...You raise a good point there, (Name). However, that doesn't mean that I'm going to be discouraged from using that Teleportation Spell."

"I know, Twilight. I know. Just...be careful when you're about to drop in for a visit. Okay?" You replied, just as Twilight nodded in agreement, as the dreamscape began to dissolve and dissipate, which meant that you were going to awake soon. Eventually, after a few moments had passed, you slowly opened your eyes, where you were currently looking at...

From there, Janice slowly got herself off of you, as you slowly rose up from the bed and sat upon your fat diapered flank. Then, you looked back toward Janice, who was gently stroking her blubbery belly with a plump white forehoof with a gleeful expression on her plump equine face and snout, where you then spoke toward your equine girlfriend and asked, "So, um...how are you feeling, Janice? I mean, it's already been a few weeks since you've been transformed into a fat diapered Pony."

"Are you kidding, (Name)? I love being like this!! *giggle* I mean, sure there might certainly be a few problems that would arise with my new body, but...I'm sure we'll overcome them together, sweetie." Janice answered, loving and admiring every second she was a fat diapered Unicorn that looks exactly like her original character, her "Ponysona", as she prefers to call it. From there, Janice placed a plump white forehoof against your plump pink forehoof, reassuring you that she willingly accepted her newly acquired equine form, and that she wasn't regretting her decision whatsoever.

Although you felt like it was somewhat your fault that she became a fat diapered Unicorn, Janice was able to reassure you that it wasn't the case, as she calmly spoke toward you and said, "I know you're probably blaming yourself for me transforming myself into...this. But just so you know: It's not your fault, (Name). I chose to do this to myself, so you're not alone like this, sweetie." Fortunately, Janice's kind romantic words were enough to persuade you, causing your somewhat chubby cheeks to blush a deep crimson hue out of feeling bashful.

However, shortly after hearing Janice's words of kindness, you suddenly then delivered a plump passionate kiss upon her lips, which lasted for half a minute, then reeling back to wrap your plump pink forehooves around your beloved girlfriend in a loving embrace and replied, "Thank you, Janice. Thank you. *sob* I'm so sorry for making you worry about me, honey." "(Name), it's not your fault for behaving in such a manner. After all, even though we're now fat diapered Unicorns from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, we're still human on the inside,sweetie." Janice answered, who returned the hug with her own loving embrace.

However, just as things between you and Janice were about to get more romantic, you both heard some knocking on the bedroom door, which then resulted in a female voice that said, "(Name), Janice! Are you awake yet?" Of course, you both realized that it was none other than Janice's Mom, Mrs. Connelly, instantly recognizing the Connelly matriarch's voice behind the door, prompting your girlfriend to speak toward her mother and answered, "Yes, Mom! We're definitely awake!"

From there, upon hearing that you and her equine daughter were now wide awake, Mrs. Connelly turned the doorknob and opened the door, allowing herself access into Janice's bedroom, where she then greeted both you and Janice as she said, "Good morning, girls!" "Good morning!" You and Janice replied in unison, looking at Mrs. Connelly, who was currently carrying a large package of diapers from downstairs, which were obviously the same kind from the haunted Fatsworth estate.

"I suppose you two want your diapers changed, then?" Mrs. Connelly asked, which resulted in both you and Janice blushing a great deal out of embarrassment. In turn, this was an obvious yes for the Connelly matriarch, where she then proceeded to first change Janice's diaper, taking off your girlfriend's pink pajama bottom to gain access to her wet diaper. From there, Mrs. Connelly stripped the wet diaper off of Janice, and then cleaned her flank with a few baby wipes. Then, she began administer some baby powder upon Janice's fat furry flank, before proceeding to tape a clean new diaper upon Janice, making sure her equine tail was neatly through the diaper's tailhole.

Shortly after that, Mrs. Connelly then shifted her attention over to you, proceeding to change your diaper as well, going over the same process she had performed on your girlfriend: Unbutton the front of the onesie, strip you of your wet diaper, clean you off with baby wipes, powder your fat flank with baby powder, and finally putting you in a clean diaper, then buttoning up the front of the Twilight Sparkle onesie.

Of course, Twilight couldn't help but join in on the giggling as well, where she spoke toward Janice and replied, "*giggle* Well, I certainly wouldn't mind seeing something like that bear fruition."

Once you and Janice finally made it downstairs, the two of you rendezvoused with Twilight in the center of the Living Room, you and Janice waved Mrs. Connelly goodbye, as Twilight charged up the required magical energy in her mauve Alicorn horn to perform the spell to return to Equestria. 1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: A Vacation In Equestria

choices: "No, not really. However, I plan on introducing you & Janice to the others."
"Actually, I just told my friends and Starlight Glimmer about you & Janice."
Actually, her response was entirely different...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
Meanwhile, only mere moments later, you, Janice, and Twilight had finally arrived in Equestria. Though, as for your current location, all three of you were currently standing in the distinguishable interior of Twilight Sparkle's Crystal Palace, better known as "The Palace of Friendship", due to Twilight's symbolic yet royal status as the newly proclaimed "Princess of Friendship".

Despite your vague familiarity with My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, you couldn't help but become legitimately in awe at the elegant architecture of Twilight's own crystalline palace. Though Janice on the other hand, it was essentially an actual dream come true for her, so much so that you had to steady her when she felt like she was going to faint out of sheer awe.

"(Name), Janice. Welcome to Equestria." Twilight stated, thus confirming that the three of you were, without a shred of doubt, in the land of Equestria.

From there, Twilight turned around to face both you and Janice, bearing a friendly benevolent smile as she quipped, "Come along now, I already have properly prepared a room for the two of you during your stay here."

"Oh! Um...Thank you." Janice retorted, regaining her composure in the process, where she and you promptly followed behind the mauve Alicorn, who seemingly had a cheerful spring in her trot, whilst you both did your best to keep pace with her, despite the burgeoning girth and bulky padded diapers around your fattened flanks.

Eventually, after a few seemingly brief minutes of waddling behind Twilight, you and Janice had finally reached the guest quarters Twilight Sparkle had provided you with. Suffice to say, it was certainly a spacious sight to behold, complete with crystalline architecture, lavishly comfy furniture, as well as a pair of expansive cushiony beds, covered in purple silk bedsheets and extremely fluffy crimson bed pillows for relaxation.

Overall, this was certainly a bountiful boon in living arrangements, as Janice instinctively yet hastily waddled up onto one of the large beds, landing on top of it with an audibly muffled *THUD* in response from the bed. "It's perfect!" Janice exclaimed, bearing a giddy grin upon her chubby equine snout, barely hiding her excited behavior.

"*giggle* Well, I am certainly glad to see your enthusiasm with your living quarters, Janice." Twilight replied, stifling a giggle with a forehoof upon seeing Janice's almost child-like behavior at the moment. From there, you turned your plump head to look at the mauve Alicorn and queried, "So, um...Does anyone- Er, I mean, anypony know that Janice and I aren't from Equestria besides you and Princess Luna?"

And yet, as if she was expecting such an answer from you, Twilight casually cleared her throat then calmly answered...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: The Palace of Friendship

choices: Reassurance. It seems Twilight also informed them of your infantile attire.
Surprise. Obviously, Rainbow Dash couldn't keep her laughter in.
Actually, their responses were entirely different...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
And yet, as if she was expecting such an answer from you, Twilight casually cleared her throat then calmly answered, "*nervous chuckle* Actually, (Name)... Prior to arriving on your world, I did confess of what I knew of you and Janice to both my friends, Spike, and Starlight Glimmer. In fact, I asked them to wait in the Main Hall whilst I teleported to Earth. Will that be a problem?"

Despite Twilight's honest confession, you had this look of shock and downright embarrassment upon you chubby equine snout, as you felt speechless as to how to respond. However, your equally rotund equine girlfriend seemed to be the calm one at the moment, as she spoke for you and replied, "...No, not at all, Twilight. Sorry, it's just that (Name) has been rather precarious as of late when it comes to others seeing her in her current form."

"I understand, Janice. But don't worry, my friends aren't the types to humiliate somepony based on their appearances. Or, at least I hope they will behave." Twilight explained, bearing a reassuring tone to both you and Janice, which seemed to be somewhat effective. You gently rubbed the bridge of your snout with a forehoof, in an attempt to calm your nerves, where you soon retorted, "...Alright, alright, fine. Let's just...get this over with."

"Of course, (Name). Right this way, please." Twilight chirped, gesturing you and Janice to follow her, where the three of you son exited the Guest Bedroom and proceeded down a series of hallways leading to where the others were currently located.

=====

Meanwhile, back in the Cutie Mark Map room, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Spike, and Starlight Glimmer all sat around the Cutie Mark Map, sitting in these crystalline chairs, as they waited for the Princess of Friendship and their best friend, Twilight Sparkle. Some preoccupied themselves to pass the time, whilst a few of them appeared bored and impatient, especially the rainbow-haired Pegasus known as Rainbow Dash, who spoke first out of mild annoyance and quipped, "...Jeez, where the hay is Twilight? She was supposed to be back her minutes ago!"

"Rainbow darling, maybe you are being rather impatient. After all, Twilight might be transporting this "Janice" & "(Name)" over to Equestria as we speak. Who knows how long it will take?" Rarity replied, using her Unicorn magic to levitate a nail filer in order to file her forehooves.

But then, they soon heard a pair of doors open up, which revealed the aforementioned mauve Alicorn. In turn, this gave the others great relief, as they simultaneously said, "Twilight!!" From there, they quickly dismounted from the chairs and rushed over to greet their friend, as Twilight then spoke to them and answered, "It's good to see you again girls. Sorry if I took a bit longer than expected."

"Ah, its okay, Twi. So, ah reckon ye' brought those two here, then?" Applejack retorted, speaking with that trademark Southern drawl of hers. In response, Twilight, gave a confirming nod to Applejack and the others and explained, "I sure did. Now, I must warn you, girls; They've had a few...tumultuous events occur to them before I brought them to Equestria. So please, be gentle with them. Their attire can be a little..."childish", to say the least."

Obviously, Twilight gave a brief glare at Rainbow Dash to remind her not to be brash at who she and the others will be introduced to, as she and the others nodded in agreement with the mauve Alicorn. From there, Twilight turned back toward the double doors, where you and Janice hid behind for the moment, as Twilight soon communicated with the two of you and exclaimed, "It's okay! You two can come out now."

And with that, much to your reluctance and hesitation, Janice gave you a firm bump and push against your thickly diapered behind, as if forcibly motivating you to come into the light, with your equally rotund and equine girlfriend waddling beside you. Once you and Janice were now fully exposed before the Mane Six, Spike, and Starlight Glimmer, their reactions (minus Twilight's) were that of...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: The Mane Six's Awareness

choices: The next morning, you & Janice woke up to the smell of breakfast.
The next morning, you & Janice woke up in wet diapers.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
To say that the Main Seven were surprised certainly qualified as an understatement, with each of them having varying degrees of reacting to such an obesely infantile debacle you and Janice found yourselves in.

Rarity curiously examined every seam of the attire you and your equine girlfriend wore. Fluttershy had a wide-eyed yet bashful expression on her soft Pegasus snout. Starlight Glimmer and Applejack had looks of utter confusion. Pinkie Pie was...well, being Pinkie Pie as always. And Spike wasn't paying too much attention.

Now, Rainbow Dash on the other hoof... Well, at first, she attempted to keep a straight muzzle, but that facade soon cracked and faltered, snickering at first, but then bursting out in uncontrollable laughter, as she hovered above with her cyan Pegasus wings.

Of course, her hysterics laughter gave her a stern look from Twilight, as the mauve Alicorn exclaimed, "Rainbow Dash! Knock it off!!"

"*laugh* Or what? They'll wet themselves? Ppfffttahhahahahaha!!!" Dash chuckled, obviously having quite the riot at the expense of making you and Janice feel rather embarrassed.

However, as Rainbow continued her hysteric laughing, you, Janice, Twilight, and the others soon noticed something...off about Rainbow Dash.

It appeared as if she was...glowing?

"Uh, (Name)? What's happening to Rainbow Dash?" Twilight confusingly asked, feeling rather bewildered at what was transporting before them. Obviously, you were as puzzled as she was, as you quickly replied, "Don't look at me! I'm as confused as you are!"

However, confused bewilderment soon gave way to shocking realization, as you and the others witnessed Rainbow Dash beginning to increase in girth, her toned lithe features being rapidly buried under magic-induced Baby Fat, just as what appeared to be a thick bulky diaper began to materialize upon the cyan pegasus' lower half.

Upon realizing what was happening, all of you attempted to warn Dash what was happening to her, but with little success. That is, until Applejack bluntly yelled, "Dash, knock off da laughing!! Look what's happenin' t'ya!"

Rainbow Dash's chuckles soon stopped, looking at her friends in a confusing manner, eyebrow raised as she asked, "What are you all looking at me for?"

But then, it slowly dawned on her when she slowly looked down at herself that she realized what has happened, as she soon then let out a shocked scream. In turn, this sent her plummeting back down onto the crystalline floor with an audible *Pomf!* from her absurdly bulky diaper.

And unfortunately, the damage was done, as Rainbow Dash felt rather mortified at what had happened to her, as she screamed at the top of her lungs and shrieked, "WHAT HAPPENED TO MY BODY!?!"

"Calm down, darling-" Rarity quipped, only to be promptly interrupted by a baffled yet undoubtedly angry Rainbow Dash, who clumsily stumbled about due to her increased body mass and greatly altered center of gravity, as she rudely interjected, "Calm down?! CALM DOWN!?! Does THIS look like I should be calm about, Rarity?!"

"--Well you certainly look cute in that diaper, Dashie!" Pinkie randomly interjected, which caused Dash's cyan complexion to pale greatly in this shocking revelation, causing her to become frozen in complete shock.

"Easy, Pinkie. I think you might've broken her." Twilight stated, which prompted her to carefully examine the mortified Pegasus from a distance, circling around her fellow Element bearer as she questioned aloud, "...But still, this is rather shocking, considering the situation. How could such a rapid state of polymorph and slight reality-warping occurred?"

"Maybe it's because Janice and I have been cursed." You interjected, almost as if you understood Twilight's colorful vocabulary. Of course, some of the Mane Seven gasped in realization that you and Janice were cursed from prior events, with Rarity being an exception, as she calmly stated, "(Name) darling, there are no such things as curses. It's merely superstition."

"Oh yeah? Then how would you explain why Rainbow Dash suddenly gained a few hundred pounds and a diaper suddenly appeared on her?" You retorted, which soon reached the ears of the traumatized Pegasus, causing her to instinctively shriek, "FEW HUNDRED POUNDS!?!?!"

From there, she soon slumped down in abysmal defeat, as if her world just ended, where she covered her eyes with her forehooves and spoke with an upset tone whilst she muttered, "...It's over. My dream of becoming a true Wonderbolt is over. I've become a laughing stock."

Tears began to swell up in her eyes some, as she began to feel the full gravity of her unintentional predicament. In response, her friends soon notice this, and began to comfort the now rotund cyan pegasus, as if it was another episode from the show.

"I promise you, Dash. We'll try to find a way to return you back to normal." Twilight spoke softly, as Rainbow Dash began to calm down, with her friends comforting her for what seemed like an hour or two.

Suffice to say, things got a little more complicated from here on out.

===========

Sometime later, after some recapping about how you and Janice ended up like this and what was the source for this magical affliction, Twilight personally escorted you and Janice toward one of the Palace's luxurious guestrooms.

"Look, we're terribly sorry about what had happened to Rainbow Dash, Twilight. I mean, we didn't know that this would happen, to be honest." You apologized, as if felt like you had to do so almost a hundred times for forgiveness. Of course, Twilight was a reasonable pony, as she replied, "*sigh* I know, (Name)... It's my fault, I should've stopped her before those magical energies altered her."

"So, what happens to her now? I mean, she's now probably too heavy to lift off." Janice interjected, feeling rather concerned for the now fat diapered Rainbow Dash.

"Fluttershy's allowing her to stay at her cottage. And here I thought some of Discord's chaos was the oddest thing to happen to us." Twilight retorted, where she then opened both doors with her Alicorn magic to allow you and Janice to proceed inside the guest room.

From there, she said goodnight to the two of you, then calmly closed the doors behind her while she trotted out. Left to your own devices, you and Janice figured that now was a good time for some shut-eye. Overall, it's been a rather hectic first day in Equestria.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Rainbow's Padded Backlash

choices: You both ran into Spike, who was busy sweeping the floor at the moment.
You both came across Starlight Glimmer, carrying some tomes for reading.
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.content:
The sun rose began to ascend over the horizon, as it stirred you from a plentiful slumber. At first, it was a mere annoyance as to how bright it became, as you rubbed the sleep from your eyes with a pair of plump forehooves. Initially, you thought you were still dreaming, until you sluggishly conked into the adjacent nightstand by accident.

"Wow...So, I wasn't dreaming all of that, huh?" You noted, instinctively rubbing your bumped elbow with a chubby forehoof, as the minor bout of pain swiftly subsided. After all, it wouldn't be a dream if you feel pain.

Instinctively, you then waddled over to Janice's bed, only to see that she had just stirred from her slumber as well, turning her rotund self around to look at you, bearing an affectionate smile upon her tubby snout, her diaper clearly seen even from your current view, as your equine girlfriend then began to promptly tackle you in a big hug, kissing you as well as she chirped, "Good morning, sweetie~!"

"Oh, um...M-Morning to you too, Janice!" You stammered, still a little unused to Janice's newly invigorated child-like enthusiasm. Honestly, you weren't sure if it was from seeing that Equestria was an actual place, the fact that she got to meet her favorite character from the show, or a combination of the aforementioned theories.

Either way, if she was happy, you were as well.

However, you both soon blushed upon experiencing a rather embarrassing predicament; Your diapers were wet once more, most likely whilst the two of you slept. You both looked at one another with a pair of blushing cheeks on each of your plump equine faces, to which Janice was the first to speak as she quipped, "*giggle* Well, it seems we're both in need of a diaper change, huh?"

"...I suppose so. Best we get to it, then." You agreed, as Janice calmly dismounted from you, waddling over to the luggage to gather up the necessary changing supplies for you and herself, commencing what had become an accustomed routine at this point...

== Six & A Half Minutes Later... ==

And with that, you had finished up in changing Janice into a fresh, clean diaper, buttoning up the diaper flap on her onesie afterwards. Overall, you had become accustomed to changing your girlfriend's diaper with limbs not known for dexterity. From there, Janice quickly got back up onto all four hooves, wiggling her diapered behind in inspection to see if it was properly taped around her lower half.

"I must admit, sweetie; You're certainly getting the hang of this!" She chirped, where she patted you on the head for a good job, making you blush some for the compliment, to which you retorted, "*giggle* Well, it isn't exactly to do so without fingers or thumbs, but I'll manage."

"-- And manage you did. With flying colors, no less!" She exuberantly proclaimed, giving your diapered but a few audible pats with her technicolor equine tail, enticing a rather embarrassed blush from you. From there, as if almost on cue, Janice then happily toddled over to the elegant doors leading out of the bedroom, looking back at you with quite a profound grin and chirped, "...Well then, shall we get ourselves some breakfast, cutie?"

"With you? I wouldn't miss it for the world!" You affectionately responded, showing your love for Janice like a badge of honor, as the two of you trotted side by side with one another. Yet, despite only being here for almost an entire day, you were still not fully acquainted with how vast and lengthy the crystalline castle was, almost comparing it to an indoor labyrinth.

However, as you were about to consult with Janice as to where you should head to...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: Soggy Diapers In Equestria

choices: Hooves, Feathery Wings, & a Horn. She was becoming an Alicorn!
Feathers, a Lion's hindlegs, & a beak. She was becoming a Griffin!
Actually, she was not changing into any of those whatsoever...

However, unfortunately for your beloved girlfriend, that wasn't exactly the case, as Janice eventually realized that she was sprouting...
1213111212222212211211111221112121112311.title: A Different Creature From Equestria

choices: It made them and everyone save you think they were always like this.
12131112122222122112111113.content: Mrs. Connelly's own stomach growling as the coffee cup in her hand changed into a large baby bottle as the horn on your face started to glow despite you not doing anything to activate it and slowly the house around you started to change with all the furniture becoming brightly colored and heavely reinforced. As the magic continued it's work your girlfriend and her two little sisters started to change to the little ones you felt playing with you where now slightly chubby and were dressed in pullups and onsies and giggling as they continued to play with you Kate and Elizabeth both smiled at you as the magic continued. Your girlfriend was next affected by the magic as you watched her began to swell up with fat and and as her pants began splitting from all the excess plush her panties began to sweel and change into a diaper that was purple and had the Element of magic on the back of it as her t-shirt began to shrink you could see her belly bellowing outward like a balloon of fat. Her body began taking a similar shape to her mother's current body the shirt stopped right above her navel and was also purple and had the element of magic on it your girlfriend stopped at what you assumed was three hundred pounds and looked very cute with the extra plush you thought as the magic began working on one of the older curse bearers in the house your girlfriend's mother while Janice looked to be three hundred pounds you thought at a glance her mother as you looked to her as she began to chug the large bottle of milk her coffee turned into she began to blow up like a balloon her pants began to tear until they couldn't take the pressure of her expanding everything and gave up leaving her diaper on full display as it began to thicken up her belly slowly began to cover her diaper. You could hear her making small grunting noises as she continued to drink from the bottle like a content suckling piglet just as you thought that her diaper went from white to pig pink her shirt also changed into a pig pink half t-shirt that had white lettering on the chest that read Mama's little piglet on it. She looked to be around six hundred pounds and was surprisingly cute looking with her new look. Mrs.Connelly had gone from a plump but cursed house wife to a full blown sow in a diaper her arms were now plumper than a holiday ham her thighs wouldn't fit normal door ways now the one's around the house were now ridiculously wide thanks to magic. Once she emptied the bottle she let out a loud belch and the magic stopped.
12131112122222122112111113.title: The curse follows you home

choices: Sorry, but I'll stick with real life animals.

12131112122223.title: Something Out Of Mythology

choices: Both hands and feet become scaly.
121311122.content:
The tail you were looking at is now being covered by scales. It starts at the base of your tail and slowly goes up to the tip. It also seems to be getting thicker and pushing on the diaper’s tail hole a bit.

“So… I’m becoming a lizard or something,” you ask. You can’t seem to think of anything to do during this time except walk around the nursery. Eventually you think about finding a dress that could cover yourself. It doesn’t solve the problem, but it’s better than nothing.

You walk to the closet and spot some infantile dresses but before you select one…
121311122.title: Scaly Tail

choices: Scales covering the rest of your body, just as you start to get a little fatter.
A small pair of wings grew out of your back. Are you becoming a dragon?
Actually, something else changed on your body instead....
1213111222.content:
Suddenly, you felt both your hands and get cramp up slightly and then become numb. You couldn't help but notice this, as you said, "What now?" From there, as you pulled your arms up to see what was happening to your hands, shocked at the sight before you: your hands were covered in scales just like your tail, as you felt your fingernails Renafatmon into these stubby reptilian claws. Not sharp enough to physically harm someone, but enough to show you that you no longer have human fingernails, as they became a dark gray hue.

"Okay, this is getting a little weird here." You said to yourself, as you then shifted your focus toward your feet, as the 5 toes on each foot fused into 3 thick reptilian clawed toes on each foot, just as your feet grew somewhat wider in circumference, becoming slightly thicker as well. "Okay, maybe it's a dream, and I'll just wake up." You thought to yourself, as you then pinched your arm a little with your left reptilian hand.

Unfortunately, the pinching hurt a little, as you came to a realization and hesitantly said, "O-Okay, so maybe I'm not dreaming after all. But how is this happening, and why me?" But then, just as you were going to look for a dress within the closet's confines, you then felt another change occurring to your body, which came in the form of....
1213111222.title: Both hands and feet become scaly.

choices: Your stomach began to growl loudly, demanding for food.
You felt scales covering up the rest of your body in the process.
12131112222.content:
To your surprise, you felt something growing on you back, where you then turned her head to look at your back, and saw that you were growing a pair of dragon wings. Or to be more specific, a small set of baby dragon wings for someone of your size. "Okay, um....so I'm becoming a dragon. That's not weird, not weird at all." You said sarcastically, obviously very confused as to why this was happening, just as your small dragon wings finished growing.

On the other hand, you couldn't help but feel that the transformation wasn't finished yet, as......
12131112222.title: Wings of a Dragon

choices: No, you need to look for a way out.
Yes, nothing THAT bad can come of it, right?  ...Right?
121312.content:
As you pick up the diaper, you realize just how gigantic it is, It looks for someone who has to be a few hundred pounds bigger than the average person. You are amazed at just how BIG it is, then, at same time, you're kinda creeped out. Who would wear these? Who would make these?! You eye the diaper carefully, you have a strange urge to try it on, but you couldn't, you wouldn't! Besides, you're a small girl, 20 years old, but only 4'11" and 91 pounds of weak. These things would never fit you.

You look around the nursery, the room looks to be for a little girl, but the furniture is SO much larger! The chairs could probably fit 4 of you, but are pink and plastic, like that for a little girls tea set. the table for the tea set is also that color. There is warm tea in two cups, even though you KNOW that one one's been in here in like 10 years! There is also a larger doll house, with a normal dad, but the mother doll is morbidly obese, and the baby is an adult girl, looking to be around 600 pounds, and at least 20 years old, it's scary detailed.

Officially creeped out, you take one look at the tea. It's thick. it smells nice, you pick up the cup and sniff, you really want to take a sip.

Do you?
121312.title: something else

choices: Fall backwards, bounce a little, and wet.
Fall forwards, poop, and start sobbing.
1213121.content:
You look around the nursery for an alternative exit. You see a window and try to get it open, but it’s an old house with old windows that didn’t open. You go to try the door again, but it’s just as fruitless as before.

“Great, just great,” you say. Afterward you start feeling the need for a bathroom. With no plumbing in here your only option is the giant diaper. “I guess I won’t have a choice soon,” you say. You take off your pants and panties and tape on the diaper as snug as possible. When it’s on it covers half of tour stomach and back, but the thickness forces your legs apart. You try waddling and you…
1213121.title: It Would be Needed in a Nursery

choices: You want to poop in it.

It all happened so fast. First you wrestled with the knob on the door. Then because of the waddle inducing diaper you fell on your butt. Upon impact the massive padding of the diaper actually made you bounce a couple of times. During your first bounce was when you started peeing into the diaper. You stopped wetting a few seconds later.

“Huff. Hah. That was… was…,” is all you could speak. You look down at your crotch and see a wet diaper. The sight and feel of it made you feel like…
12131211.title: Bouncy Wetness

choices: There is a very fat woman walking into the room.
Nothing, it's just your imagination, time to get out and go.
1213122.content:
Deciding that a taste couldn't hurt, you take a small sip. It's amazing! You slurp the rest of the tea, you just can't help it! Afterwords, you set the cup back down of the table. You let out a quiet "burp", then blush. You begin to feel slightly tired. You yawn.

"Ohhhhhkaay, time to gooo~."

You try to open the door, but it's locked!

You should be much more surprised, but that tea just put you at ease. Nothing could make you angry now! Your suddenly all out of gas. Your eyes droop almost-shut. Your focus then heads over to the crib, a short rest, then out of here, yes.

You mosey on over to the crib and crawl in, it's nice.~ You pass out the moment you lay down.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------



You wake up, but you know it's a dream. That always happens when you know when you feel asleep. You look around, then sit up, but it was much harder than it SHOULD have been... It felt like you had a 50 pound weight on your chest. You then yawn as you look down, and see two large mounds of flesh, and a large belly. It separates your legs, which of course are round and fat. You have to weigh at least 400 pounds! All you have on is a large diaper, which covers up half of your belly. When you look down, you can focus on your second chin and puffy cheeks. You aren't too surprised, you've had strange dreams before, but this one is so....REAL...you look around, the world is nothing but a light blue void. You see a figure-your mother!- walking towards you, but as she does, her walk slowly turns into a waddle, as you realise that she's getting fatter too...

When she gets to you, she picks you up, with almost no effort at all.

"Well well well... mommys little girl is getting big..."

"Mommy! look what I did!" another voice interrupted excitedly.

You recognise it. It's your sister! She's three years older than you, and moved out last year. But right now, she isn't the tall beauty you've been jealous of your whole life! She has a little girls dress on, and she has a macaroni art if her hands, showing it to mommy. She still has the best body in town.

"Oh sweetie, thats great! Now eat your cupcake." Your mother says to her

Then she takes out a pink cupcake and eats it in one bite. Suddenly, you hear a gurgling noise, then you see your sister bloat with fat. Her hair forming into pigtails.

Your mothers focus then goes to you.she takes out a bottle and brings it to your mouth, you reach out for it and grab it with your fatty arms against your will. and begin sucking, as you do, you taste the tea you had before, and your body surges out with fat.

"You're going to be the biggest baby that ever lived!" You mother raves.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------
And with that, you're awake. You sit up quickly, thankful that you're back to your old weight., but something is strange.
1213122.title: Yes, nothing THAT bad can come of it, right?  ....

choices: Eat a slice, begin to gain tiny amounts of weight unknowingly.
Eat the whole thing, gain large amounts of weight unknowingly.
12131222.content:
You shake your head.

"Urg, what a weird dream....." You mutter to yourself.

You then stand up and crawl out of the large crib. You walk over to the large mirror in the room, you see yourself. You're still short and thin. Moderate-length blond hair and blue eyes. You've never had any defining body features. One time, you thought gaining weight would help you look a little more well rounded. But most of it went to your tummy.

You're never doing that again.

Or maybe you will, you don't really care about your weight, but you were pressured by your sister to drop it, putting it back on might show her. It's kinda funny, how you end up in a nursery for and adult. Your mother kept you in diapers halfway through first grade, which caused you to have a few accidents. And during most of elementary school, you were clinically overweight. It wasn't until sixth grade when you "blossomed" so to speak.

You walk back over to the drawers. Who keeps diapers in drawers anyway? You get these things out of bags, right?
You quit thinking such things, complain about diapers when you're in a nursery for an adult? You saw this once on TV, all of your friends thought it was gross, you were strangely turned on by it. But you pretended to hate it. You never really thought about it after that.

Just then, you get the urge again, you want to put the diaper on. You look around, make sure no one is near.

123311.title: New Arrangements

1233111.content:
It was four months since the fateful day you got into this whole "not growing up" fad. None of your family got very much into it however, but they seemed to enjoy treating you in such an infant-like way, it actually gave you less freedom and "choosing" in your lifestyle, but you were just fine with that.

So now that it was well into the summer, your ability to "hold it" was long gone (you could barely even remember how to use the toilet at this point,) your old intake of hamburgers and soda had completely vanished, your wardrobe was %99 percent infantile, your desire for pacifiers had skyrocketed, your speech had become loose and filled with errors, and most amazingly: you had gained one-hundred and fifty pounds.

Everyone you talked to said the extra fat looked absolutely adorable on you, it was a fact that many people who went with the "not growing up" fad suffered from weight that was uneven and unpleasant to see. Most of those people went back to their mature selves, so you felt very special to be "just perfect for it."

You were laid onto a big changing table and had your dress flipped up and your diaper untaped. You were totally over any tension of everyone seeing your unmentionables at this point. You were at school, a special private program intended for anyone who wears diapers. This included from people who had to wear diapers for medical reasons, people who wore them for convenience, some people who wore for phycological reasons, and even a few who were "diaper lovers" who wore them for sexual purposes. However, you were the biggest demographic in the school (no pun intended,) the people who wore diapers for the "easy, long life fad" or "infants" made up %40 of the students.

After nearly a minute, the teacher finished wiping you (hey, you had made a big mess, and your tooshie was huge, it often took a while,) then she powdered you and put you in a fresh diaper. She put you down on the floor and you crawled over to your classmates.

The room you were in was basically a large gym, as this was where most of your schooling took place. The infants and the diaper lovers were in this room, and everyone else was in the auditorium. It sounds like a clunky method, but it worked perfectly believe it or not.

You crawled around the heavily-padded floor and made small talk with your classmates, most of the infants were about as chubby as you, some chubbier, but a few were almost as skinny as they would be otherwise, the poor saps were either not able to gain the weight or still working on it.
"So..." You said happily to a semi-friend of yours who's name you can't quite remember, "what do you think of getting boyfriends and stuff as an infant?"

"Well," She replied, "I think it's totally okay to get into a relationship. No matter how hard we try, we'll never become totally like babies, I can totally imagine me getting married. *giggle* Maybe even one that's not an infant."

"I dunno." You said, turning around and looking at the other demographic in the room. "Those diaper lovers kinda creep me out sometimes."

"Aw, give them a break." She said cheerfully. "We chose to do this, but they became who they are by things that happened to them when they were nine or eight, they're like that whether they like it or not."

You chuckled.
"How do ya know that?"

"It's what everyone's told me." She shrugged.

"Well I'd still like another infant better." You said, turning your head all around until your eyes halted with glee. It was a new boy, about your age and waistline, he came to the school about a week ago, but now you were seeing him play with blocks for the first time. It was just one of those moments where a crush just popped out of nowhere.

You turned back to your friend,
"*giggle* Like that boy, over there." You pointed your thumb back to him.

“Sounds like somebody’s hungry.” You look up to see your father enter the room, followed by your older brother. If you thought your brother was huge, your dad makes him look small in comparison.

He had to be seven or eight hundred pounds, of both fat and muscle. He towers over the both of you at almost 8ft. His belly jiggles as he walks over to your crib. “Shit, sorry dad, I thought he’d be okay with just one.” Your brother apologizes, as your humongous father hoists you out of your crib as if you weigh nothing. “You should know how hungry he gets, he is a growing boy after all.”

He cradles you against his massive belly, and carries you with him out of your nursery and into the downstairs kitchen. There’s a large, brightly colored highchair set off to the side, big enough just for you, which your father plants you down in, before he heads over to your oversized and well-stocked refrigerator.

You actually have your own fridge because you eat so much, and your daddy loves coddling you. Your brother, following close behind, walks over to you and ties a baby blue bib that says “Daddy’s Little Food Hog”, with a cute picture of a pig embroidered on it, around your fat neck. “There we go, don’t want you to get messy, do we little bro?” He smiles and tickles your chin, making you giggle. ”Hey, Jake” Your father says, opening up the fridge, “You said you only left one bottle in the crib in case he woke up hungry, right?” Jake tenses up, “Yeah, why?” Your dad turns to him and grins knowingly, “So then why are there four missing?”

Jake looks down, blushing, and scratches the back of his head. “Heh, looks like your brother wasn’t the only hungry boy in the house.” Your brother sighs. “Sorry dad, b-but it just tastes so good… A-and I left him with three bottles, but moving him up to his room was a lot of work, and I just started getting hungry, so…”

Your dad laughs heartily. “No need to apologize, son. Just next time you want to try some of baby’s food, just make sure you go back and replace it. He’s a growing boy after all, and Daddy can always get more.” He moves out of the way, letting you see that the XL fridge door is packed to near bursting with baby bottles. The sight is just making you hungrier and you start to salivate.

Your dad walks over to your brother and kisses his forehead affectionately, despite only embarrassing him further, and goes back to the fridge. “Alright lil’ stinker, what do you want for breakfast? We got all kinds here.” He says to you. While the door is full of bottles, you can see the interior is full of mashed baby food of all different varieties.

It’s a lot to take in so fast. Okay, you were a 400lb guy in diapers now, and your room had an eerie resemblance to a nursery. What could’ve happened? This was definitely not how you went to bed from that house…

Suddenly you realize, it must’ve been that house. It must’ve cursed you somehow. Although you weren’t sure how, that’s the only thing you could think of.

You awake on your own accord, smacking your dried lips together in attempt to moisten them; your eyes feel particularly heavy this morning, refusing to budge open even the tiniest sliver. Attempting to swing yourself off the bed results in equally as frustrating results, with one forlornly launching itself off the edge, impacting itself on something solid, and rather hard.

“What the heck?” You think to yourself, the shock of the blow forcing your eyes to open now ever so much, daylight blinding you for a moment as assessments are done on what lies ahead. In front of you, your vision retarded by a colonnade of rigid, parallel bars; pale-white in coloration, eerily similar to something from a time long past. Focusing your attention past the barricade, blurring out the lines permits you to gaze to your surroundings further out. Though feeling rather scatterbrained, you can expend enough to make out the sky-blue walls encapsulating you, pocked with splatters of bright color; strange, boxy objects are present, varying in size, not capable of the concentration to see what they truly are.

“This…this isn’t right.” You think to yourself, remembering the room you had fallen asleep looking much more akin to something messier, and far more filled with refuse; this . . . place, reminded you of a nursery, not a teenager’s living quarters. A cold sweat was appearing on your forehead now, fear making its way down your spine in bone-chilling waves. Moving your arms forward, thinking that you could somehow manipulate the bars to opening, another sobering punch to the gut is gotten; your arms shakily outstretch before you, anemic in movement as if you had fallen asleep on them. Grasping your confines loosely, finger possessing tensile strength of tissue paper, nothing becoming of your effort.

“Gah, move already, get me out of here!” You wished to yell, stopping your frantic gyrations when all you are greeted with is a series of slurred syllables strung together in a whining squeal. Releasing your grip on the rods, you strain to move now unto your back, body feeling like a thousand pounds with each contortion of your spine; you can hear a crinkling beneath you, and with an inquisitive apprehension choose to tilt your head forwards. Such determination is rewarded with the sight of your waist wrapped in a puffy, disposable diaper; you think to scream, but decide against hearing the parody of your vocal ejaculations once more.

“Why…why am I dressed like this, what the hell is going!?” After a few more attempts to garner the strength needed to loosen the wooden fortification (which you now postulated to be the gate for an oversized crib), you flop down wearily, fury biding inside as wrinkled facets of vitreous anger melt into softened features of utter defeat; within a few minutes of diminishing resistance, tears flow freely down your reddened face in wet streaks, moans of despair rocking your body into spastic twinges of sorrow.

As your cries reach their peak, you can hear feet rushing their closer to you. Opening your eyes in alarm, you look up to find. . .

"I wanted to see you but you weren't answering your phone, so I came over and your mom told me everything."

"No, not really. I mean, I can but I'm not controlling it. That's kinda weird." You looked at Tiffany, then both looked at your mom. She was beaming.

"Aw, my baby girl is diaper trained!" She pinched your cheek and gave you a kiss. You felt proud, while Tiffany looked perplexed... And a little jealous.

"You mean you can really be diaper trained?" She looked at momma. "And you're diaper training me?" Your momma nodded while you bounced with excitement. "...I went without realizing it too, you know. And I've only been in diapers for less than a day." She folded her arms.

"It's not a contest, Hun."

"Now, now, you two. Let's get you changed."

"Hello? Tiffany's phone."

"Hi, this is the manager of the diner..."

a month later

Both you and Tiffany suckled your mother's milk. The past month had been pure bliss. Both you and Tiffany were fully diaper trained, and your mother had begun nursing. The food had also had its effect on both of you.

You now had an exaggerated hourglass figure, with round boobs, wide hips, big rear made bigger due to your diaper, and thick thighs. Tiffany said you looked so much like a girl that she couldn't remember that you were a guy a lot of the time. It's quite true; outside of your diaper's contents everything about you screamed "girl" and "feminine"

Tiffany meanwhile had inflated like a balloon. Her boobs had grown into D cups, her legs and arms quite plump, lovely hips and a rear, but most of all a big, round, smooth belly. It was a source of pride for her, and your mother had nicknamed her piglet, much to Tiff's delight. She even designed custom diaper covers for Tiffany with curly tails and a big bow on her head, which looked like pig ears. Without those, she looked like a particularly plump infant.

"Now let's get you to the van, sweetheart." She opened the door to the bathroom and gestured you outside. With a sense of unmitigated dread you waddle to the door and toward the exit. Looking around nervously, it seems it's between showing of movies and no one is around. The only person who sees you is the woman behind the counter, who smirks and waves cutely to you. You feel your face turn beat red and hurry out.

The van waits by the curb and no one seems to notice as you hurry yourself into it. It seems you lucked out and only one person saw you. You're relieved, but you have a bit of an adrenaline rush at the same time. You go to park your diapered butt on the seat only to find a giant baby car seat waiting.

"...Seriously, mom? Why am I not surprised." You simply sigh and plop into it begrudgingly, too tired to be fussy about it.

"Of course." She straps you in then pinches your cheek "Good girl." She drives you both home. As you pull into the drive way, you see quite a few boxes next to the garbage bin with your adult clothes in there.

"Mom!" You try to look closer but are strapped into the seat tightly. "That's my stuff!"

"Was, sweetheart. You're a baby now."

"Mom, I'm a grown boy! You just can't take over my life for your magazine!" This is getting bizarre and surreal.

"Yes I can, sweetheart." She said it with parental authority. "Now let's get you inside." She undoes the car seat...

The second your mother undoes the baby seat, you rush out the door as fast as you can waddle. This is all too much, you need to get out as fast as possible.

"Young lady, get back here!" Your mother stamps her foot but doesn't run after you. You ignore her and keep going as fast as you can. The bulky diaper between your legs makes it hard, forcing you to hold your arms out at your side to keep balance. You're sure it looks excessively girly, but you don't care. You have to get away.

Once you regain yourself, you straighten out your dress and try to think of your next move. The likelihood you could sneak back to the box near your house and get some street clothes is low. You've got zero money and there's no way you can go to a friend for help and let them see you like this...

1533321221121211122112.content:
You decide to try and get to your girlfriend's house, though you definitely can't go like this. You take a look at the neighboring back yards and find one with a bunch of clothes strung up. You inspect them and fine they're women's clothes. There's no guarantee that you'll find some male clothes if you keep looking, and the longer you're out here the more likely you're going to be discovered.

You quickly strip out of the baby clothes when you're sure you're not being watched. You hesitate at the diaper a moment. Part of you feels anxious taking it off, while another recognizes that you had used it without thinking earlier. Both logic and intuition is fighting you here. You decide to take it off as the clothes won't fit otherwise.

You pop on some women's underwear and bra, then a pair of jeans and a purple blouse. You're surprised it all fits so well, much less feels really natural and comfortable. You look in the house window nearby to see your reflection. It's pretty shocking how you look 100% like a young woman, especially with the make up your mother had applied to you.

You check the back door quickly and find it unlocked. You feel awful, but you swipe a matching pair of shoes laying on the inside of the house that seem to fit then undo the pig tails on your head and swap it for a ponytail.

"Damn....Why does this look so right? I make a better looking woman than a man..." You toss all your baby clothes in the trash and hop the fence onto the street, acting natural and begin toward your girlfriend's house. You begin wondering what you're going to tell her when you get there...

15333212211212111221121.content:
"AHEM!"

You stop in your tracks and wince, looking over your shoulder and past your black ponytail. At the front door of the house you just stole from is a woman, tapping her foot and looking perturbed. She had long red hair, freckles, and emerald green eyes. She had an almost identical figure to you, hence why the clothes fit so well. The only exception was a very large bust. You ignore the odds of that happening for the moment. She points to the sidewalk right in front of you, ordering you to come over.

"Er..." You resist the urge to run as you don't want the police called and walk over with your head hung low. "I can explain!"

"I saw you the whole time, young man. Saw what you were in before. Think you can just take my clothes without payment?"

"P-payment? Uhm..." She interrupts you by grabbing your ear and drags you through her home. If it didn't hurt so much, you'd notice how well off she seemed from the state of her home. You get dragged to the backyard and she looks int he trash bin and finds your baby clothes.

"So explain this..."

"I-I...My mother was blackmailing me into dressing like a baby. She was going to make me wear it twenty four seven, and I had to get away."

"Twenty four seven? Poor thing." Her tone shifted from perturbed to sympathetic. "Still, they're cute clothes. Always wanted a baby, myself."

"...Wait...Please don't..." You can sense where this is going.

"I won't call the police if you come here once a week and be my personal baby. They suit you too well..."

"What is this, a conspiracy to keep me in diapers? ....Nnnngh, fine!" You're almost ready to cry, but once a week is better than all day everyday. Your new "mother" giggles a bit.

"Great, you can call me Momma Verra, then. Every saturday, you come here. I've got you on security camera, so you better show up. Installed it to catch the teenage neighbor stealing my undies, but this is a much better catch."

"Yes, Momma Verra." You grumble a bit, realizing she's got you caught. You give her your name. "Uhm, can I get taxi fare to go to my girlfriend's? Please?"

"Sure thing, angel," she pinches you cheek. "But first let's get you a little more presentable." She whisks you to her vanity mirror and redoes your make up to make you look a little more womanly, as well as gives you some jewelry.

"Uhm, you don't have any boy clothes by chance?"

"Of course not. Now I can't have my daughter going out half dolled up." Out of the fire and into the frying pan. You sigh and...

153332122112121112211212.content:
"Actually... Can I stay the night here? I can't go home and I'm to nervous to go to my girlfriend's."

Verra paused, looking like she was contemplating it. "Well... I wasn't expecting company tonight, but I suppose it'll help to get to know my new daughter. Alright, you can stay in my guest room." She beckons you to follow and you obediently do. You find a lovely and feminine guest room.

"It's.... Wow, it's nice..."

"Thanks, I've got a lot of money so I like to live comfortably. Hmm..." She walks to another guest room next door to her master bedroom "yes, this'll do."

"Hm? You walk over, hips swaying a bit. "ANother one?"

"No, I'll be converting this into a nursery just for you."

"Oh. Good." You say without any enthusiasm. Verra can hear and see it in your voice.

"It'll be fun. Tell you what, you've got nowhere to stay now, right?" You nod and pause.

"I don't want to be a baby all day, everyday." You get the sense that's what she's suggesting, but she shakes her head no.

"Of course, I understand that. But why don't you stay here as my daughter. You just need to be a baby on saturdays, and the rest of the time you can be my 'daughter' Jessie."

"I'm not a girl, though..." You think for a bit, realizing you are quite comfortable in these clothes. And you have nowhere to really stay anymore. "Well...I guess it wouldn't be so bad. As long as you promise I'm only a baby once a week."

"Once a week with your permission."

"Yeah, that's fine. Alright, i'll stay here then..."

"Great! Let's have a girls night. How about a movie and some ice cream, angel?"

What follows was a fun night, you had to admit. Your new "mother" painted your nails and you both snacked heavily on shockingly good and rich ice cream while watching chick flicks. Being a girl was shockingly comfortable, and after the chaos of the past few days this felt nice. Verra seemed to eat as much as you did, hence both of your ample figures. You had a great time, and found yourself giggling quite a bit before bed time. Verra provided you with a cute night gown and you slipped into your new bed. Tomorrow Verra was going to take you clothing shopping. The bed was like a marshmallow and you fell asleep.

1533321221121211122112121.content:
You find yourself stirred by a warm and wet sensation in the morning. You stretch and yawn for a moment then quickly panic when you realize it's your sheets. Lifting them up you realize you wet the bed.

"No no no. Crap!" You're in panic mode, which goes into overdrive when Verra walks in.

"Morning, angel. I made you breakfast in bed... What's going on?" She puts the tray down and checks. "Oh, those were nice sheets, too. So you don't have bladder control?" *She crosses her arms and gives you a concerned look.

"N-no, I do! I swear..." Your face is beat red with humiliation. "Just...happens..."

"Well, it's not going to happen in my house. I think you should wear diapers when you're sleeping to prevent this sort of thing from happening.

"B-but... ALright... But I'm only a baby on Saturdays, right?"

"Right. But can't have you ruining sheets everyni- Jessie, are you going now?"

"I-I..." You start to break down and cry when you realize you are.

"Shh, shh, it's okay." She calms you down. "I'll run out really quick and gets some diapers. Wait here." She hurries off. You sit on the potty until she comes back in case you wet yourself again. Soon, Verra comes in with some adult diapers your size, some with baby prints. What, is there a store at the flipping mall selling those? "Found some diapers your size. Come along." She diapers you and you admit, you feel better now.

"I don't know what happened, I... I'm sorry..." You feel humiliated.

"It's okay. We'll just keep you in these until you get control," she coos, trying to comfort you.

"And if the opposite happens? I become diaper trained like my birth mom intended?" You can't help but feel that's a legitimate result at this point.

"Well, I can live with that as well. Don't worry. Let's just... Take you clothes shopping like I said I would."

You spend the day at the mall buying a new female wardrobe. Were it not for the diapers you'd be having a great time, but you're actually paranoid you're going to lose control. When you get home you go online and Verra buys you a bunch of baby clothes as well. You keep quiet when you realize it's on your birth mother's website. The whole day feels like a bit of a waste because you spent it miserable, but Verra does her best to cheer you up with another evening of pounding down ice cream.

-------

Five days later, you wake up in your new room with a wet diaper. Your heart sinks a little as that's five days in a row. Today is Saturday, so you're going to spend it a baby in Momma Verra's care. Everything arrived quickly and your nursery is all set up for your big day.

1533321221121211122112121221.content:
You turned and were greeted by the face of your girlfriend. You jumped a bit with surprise, then quickly hold your skirt down remembering your sense of place.

“Whoops, sorry to startle you,” she apologized. “Uhm, I was wondering if I could ask you something?” She apparently didn’t recognize you. You honestly weren’t too surprised. You were very different from the young boy you were before.

“Oh?” your feminine voice asked. “What’s that?”

“Well, I don’t mean to embarrass you…But I noticed that diaper you’re wearing…”

“Eep!” You recoil in surprise and press down your skirt as if she could see it then and there. “I-I can explain tha-“

“It’s adorable!”

“Huh?” You look at her dumbfounded.

“So cute! I love the princess pattern on them! Where did you get disposables like that? They’re so authentic…” She smiles, sincerely asking questions.

“O-oh…Well, I have to have them special ordered since I’m kind of a big girl. You place hands flat on your hips to accentuate that fact.

“Well, I’m really jealous! Not only are you diapers super adorable, but you’re brave enough to wear them out in public too.” She giggled. “I just can afford some cheap depends and only wear mine in private. Been doing it more since my boyfriend vanished on me.”

“Well, I don’t really have much of a choice…”

“Wait, you need them?” She blinked, then smiled. “Are you diaper training?”

“Diaper…Huh?”

“You know,” she winked at you knowingly. “The opposite of potty training?”

“Oh….” You’re honestly taken aback. You girlfriend has been in to this the whole time? “I…”

“Wow, going whole hog, huh? That’s so cool! Must be a pain to change those, though….”

“Well, momma usually…”

“You’ve got a mommy, too? You’re so freaking cool! I’m super, super jealous now!”

“I…Uh…”

“Whelp, it was great meeting you! I gotta head home!” She waved. “I’m totally going to ramp up my own adult baby time cause of you!” She hurried out of sight. You stand there, completely at a loss for words. This had been going on under your nose for how long? And to think, you were scared of what she would think if she caught you in diapers. You walk home absent mindedly, so deep in thought that you’re oblivious to any idle breeze displaying your padded rear. You finally arrive home and get stirred by Momma Verra’s cooking.

“Welcome home, sweetheart. Got a nice, big meal for my lovely daughter. Hope you’re hungry… Hm? What’s wrong? You wet yourself in public again?”

“Huh? Oh, no. I’m dry…”

“That’s good.”

“…Is it?” You find yourself in a certain mindset, suddenly.

“Hm? Thought it was. Why?” Verra stopped and looked at you with her hands on her hips.

“Well… “ You look behind you and place a hand on your padded rear. “I was thinking…. Instead of…You know…. Re-potty training…” Verra cocked an eyebrow at you and let a warm smile cross her face. “Maaaybe… I should go the other way…”

“Other way?” She asked, though from the tone of her voice she knew what you meant.

“Yeah… I want to diaper train!” you find yourself shouting giddily. “Thought about it the whole way home! You wouldn’t mind changing me full time, would you momma?”

“:Course not, sweetheart. Kinda got used to it the past three weeks…”

“Me too! Honestly, I hated being a baby when it was forced on me. But given the choice and having it sorta on my terms I kinda like it.” As you continue to talk with Verra, you let go and fill your diaper.

“Being a baby? Does that mean you want to be a baby full time as well?” She pinched your cheek.

“Not sure quite yet. Good chance of that, though.” You were feeling all fluttery chested and excited. This was a big decision, but you felt happy doing it.
“Well, you just let momma Verra know when you need a change.”

“Uh uh, shouldn’t you instead be checking my diaper to make sure I’m clean. You’re the momma and I’m the baby, after all.” Verra giggled along with you.
“I see your point…” She sniffed the air, then put her hands back on her hips. “Why, you little scamp. You filled that up while we were talking, didn’t you?” She reached around and checked your diaper.

“Yup!” You gave her a knowing wink. “No point in holding it in.”

“Well, come along then,” she said, taking your hand and leading you to the changing table. “I’m thinking…”

Large belly?

You open your eyes to discover you're in your crib, despite it being only thursday. To top it off, you're in a new onesie that not inly screams "I'm a baby" but also says "I'm a baby princess." The sleeves are bloused and poofy, there are satin frills around every arm, leg, and neck hole, and a cute short skirt attached that does nothing to hide your oadded rear.

Your arms were like plump sausages as they peaked out from your puffed sleeves. And your chest; nay, your boobs had grown to the size of melons. Even your cheese and lips had plumped up.

"I asked if you wanted a baby day and you said yes." As she explains, she puts a hand on your backside to check if you're dry. You tilt a bit instinctively to let her. "In fact, you told me to toss out your old clothes when you started plumping up from the food. Said they wouldn't fit and you'd buy new ones later, if at all."

Honestly, over the past three weeks you have become more comfortable in the baby role. You had even lost bladder control and wanted fully to be diaper trained. Still, this seems like a big step and you don't remember making it...
