"You already look like a woman, babe. You've got bigger boobs than me." Amy teased. You spent the rest of the night at the party before Amy drove you both to her place and you slept over. Without even thinking, the both of you remained diapered while you slept in Amy's bed, having become comfortable enough to forget the padding between both of your legs. When you awoke the next morning...
15333212211221212.title: Respectable effort...

153332122112212121.content:
As light poured onto your face, you gave a big stretch and a yawn. Your chest jiggled from the movement, followed by the rest of your body. You opened your eyes and slid out of bed, waddling over to the mirror groggily. Between the last few weeks and the party last night, you were greeted by a very plump woman with long hair and a thick diaper taped around your waist. You weren't shocked by the image; you've essentially grown into it.

"Morning, beautiful," you told your reflection with a wink, hands on your shapely and plump hips. It surprises you a bit that instead of your soft male voice, a full blown girl voice passed your lips. You covered your mouth with both hands. "What? Oh my." Looking yourself up and down, you're pretty much a plump girl at this point. You go to tug on your diaper waistband to see if you still have your equipment, but decide against it opting for breakfast instead. You look for something to wear and opt for one of Amy's nighties. It's snug but looks good on you.

Heading downstairs, you were greeted by Amy only in a blue diaper in the kitchen. Something appeared off, though. She looked a bit more plump from behind than last night. Her figure was a bit more boyish, and when she spun on her heels you noticed her bust size was significantly reduced. "Uhm, morning babe." Her voice was a bit more husky than before.

"Amy? Wow, you look different."

"You sound different. So yeah, something's up, huh?

"I suppose so. So does this mean I'm the girlfriend and you're the boyfriend now?" You ask. Oddly, neither of you seem to be bothered too much. You both recognize something is up, but you're pretty comfortable in reversed roles almost immediately.

"Suppose so. I bet it was Heather. Here, sit down muffin and I'll make you breakfast." Amy pivoted and went back to cooking, wiggling her diapered rear. You also find it odd neither of you seemed to want to take off your diaper.

"So... Are we just keeping the diapers on?" You put a hand on your rump and listened to the plastic crinkle. You felt like you shouldn't take it off.

"Yeah. Plus we'll have to find some more diapers," she said, finishing cooking scrambled eggs.

"Right. Plus someone to change us when we go potty," you think out loud. You should find yourself saying that odd, but it seems natural. "Who would be willing to change two big babies like us?"
153332122112212121.title: Switch...

choices: One or both of you ends up using your diaper.
1533321221122121212.content:
"Hmm..." You cross your arms under your enlarged bust, thinking about people who might be willing to help you as opposed to considering you insane or not speaking to you again.

Suddenly, a thought pops into your head.

"Heather!" Amy looks at you in curiosity as she sets down two plates with large amounts of food on them, wondering why you're suggesting the popular girl from last night. "Remember? She said that if we needed a sitter, we could give her a call."

"Oh, that's right..." Amy digs into her breakfast, while you already began to voraciously consume the food in front of you. She looks pensive for a few seconds, before coming to a conclusion you had already reached: There's really no one else who'd do it and actually be okay with helping you too, as far as either of you can think. "Mmph... Call her after breakfast."

After a second, and then a third course of breakfast, the both of you are stuffed. Amy looks over at you as you grab your phone. You daintily tap away at the screen, noticing your hands are softer and more feminine, entering Heather's number in with your plump fingers and calling her.

"How'd you get her number?" Amy asks, looking at you very surprised and a bit suspicious.

"Well..." You want to speak, but suddenly there is a response from the other end.

"Rrgh... Hello? Who is this and what do you want? It's..." She yawns before speaking again. "... Oh... Ten-thirty... Anyway, who is this?"

"I... It's me..." You say meekly.

"Ooohhh... Hey, baby girl! You sure sound different." You blush, just a little embarrassed. "What can I do for you? Did you need me to change you or something?" She asks, unaware that's actually the exact reason you're calling. Slightly surprised and unsure whether she really knew or was just being playful, you respond.

"A-actually, yes. Amy and I were wondering if you'd be willing to come over and change us when we... When we uh..."

"Go? I think I understand. I'm not doing anything today, so I'll be right over! Just let me get dressed and pick up some things." You let out a mental sigh of relief. She wasn't joking.

"Okay uh... Thanks." You hang up. Amy had moved over to the other side of your phone to listen, and she now backs off, smiling as she hugs you.

"Woo! We're on our way to being big babies for real!" She pumps a fist in the air.

Now you just have to wait for her to arrive...
1533321221122121212.title: An Obvious Decision: Heather.

1533321221122122.content:
“Hey baby girl. What’s shakin’ in that diaper of yours?” You almost turn around to see who it was, but immediately freeze up when you feel a hand patting and rubbing your butt. You can’t move anything until a few seconds later when they stop. You turn and it’s Jacob, the poster boy for male egos around the world. He was wearing one of those inflatable wizard costumes tonight.

You give him a disgusted look. “That was horrendously perverted and offensive man. Get lost.”

“Whatever you fat pansy. It suits your new weight anyway.” He wanders off into the crowd most likely to cop more feels from actual girls, but you don’t care right now.

“You alright man,” asks your best bud Thomas.

“Yeah I’m just weirded out by that guy.”

“Same here, but you might want to stop that now.”

“Stop what?”

“Rubbing your diaper butt.”

You notice your hands are massaging the back of your diaper and quickly stop. “Sorry, it just feels weird right now.”

Thomas looks confused. “Wearing a pink diaper and baby girl clothes wasn’t weird until you got felt up?”

“Yes, well no. I mean it is, but it feels weirder.” You move your legs around to make the feeling go away.” It’s like it’s getting…”
1533321221122122.title: Weirdo and a Weird Feeling

choices: "Of course not.  Little girls like me are supposed to wear big, poofy diapers."
15333212211221222.content:
"It feels like my diapers getting thicker... And puffier... Weird," you say, lifting your skirt up to take a look. It does indeed look like your pink disposable is puffing up under your rhumba cover. You're also finding it harder to close your legs.

Thomas tilted his head. "It is. That's freaky."

"No kidding," you say, looking over at your shoulder at your big, poofy rear. "Not sure my diaper cover can contain it if it keeps poofing up."

"Your in a dress with a steadily inflating diaper, and you're concerned about a diaper cover?"

"Well, yeah. Wouldn't you be?" You ask him as you wiggled your rear a bit then waddle to steady yourself.

"No, I don't wear diapers, much less diaper covers," your friend proclaimed, cocking his eyebrow at your suddenly strange behavior.

"Oh, wait. Look. By diaper covers accommodating it. A new ruffle just sprouted as the fabric spread. That's kinda cool," you say, looking back at Thomas while holding your hands at your side daintily for feminine balance. It feels as natural as breathing to you.

"Dude, you're not freaking out?"

"Nah. As long as my diapie doesn't tear my outfit, it's cool."

"Diapie? Outfit and not costume? Did someone slip you some drugs or something?" His expression was pretty freaked out.

You gave it a thought. Your diaper certainly had poofed up to new proportions after Jacob rubbed your butt, causing you to waddle, and your skirt and diaper cover magically accommodated it. That was strange, but at the same time you suddenly felt like you're supposed to not only be wearing the diaper, but little girl clothes in general. You don't remember feeling that way when you walked in.
15333212211221222.title: “Thicker and puffier.”

choices: A buffet of candy and cookies.
Jacob… uh oh, he’s touching Tiffany!
153332122112212221.content:
“Are you going to be okay,” asked Thomas

“Yeah, I’m fine for now. I think we need to find Jacob. He might know what’s going on.” You look around the room , but don’t see him anywhere.

“Let’s look around together in the other rooms he could be in.”

“No, it’s better to split up to save time. It can’t be that hard to spot an inflatable wizard costume.”

“You sure you’ll be okay man? You were acting pretty weird a few seconds ago.”

“I’ll worry about myself later. He could be the whole cause of this thing here,” you say as you push in on the front of your newly expanded diaper.

“Okay, just be careful.” Thomas then heads off toward some of the smaller rooms in the house while you head for the living room. Waddling in the big pink diaper was many things: difficult, weird, and for some reason ticklish. You reach the living room and find…
153332122112212221.title: Regaining your Thoughts

1533321221122122212.content: You see the inflated wizard Jacob talking to your girlfriend. You try to warn her, but he had already put his hand on…
1533321221122122212.title: Correction; it was Amy

15333212212.content:
“What,” is all she could say.

“Um, yeah. I had been thinking it over and the whole baby girl thing isn’t quite good enough so I decided on something else.” You put up a worried smile afterward, hoping she wouldn’t be too angry.

No such luck.

“Baby I spent a lot of time on these dresses and I am very much annoyed you didn’t say something earlier.” Your mom looks incredibly angry and you’re feeling really frightened right now.
15333212212.title: Not Enough Notice

choices: “When at home, you’re a baby girl!”
153332122121.content:
During your fright stare with your angry mom you notice a wetness in the front of your pants. You look down in shock and try to stop, but the pee just keeps on coming. It keeps going until it flows all the way down to your shoes.

“Oh my…” went your mom. You try to say something, but your face muscles just tighten up, preventing you from saying anything. “That does it. Into the bathroom, Now!”

You slowly walk to your bathroom in your pee-stained clothes as ordered. When your mom enters she looks more calm, but you see she is holding a really thick and pink diaper and baby powder. “Strip,” she commands. You quickly take off your shoes, socks, pants, and underwear and throw them in the tub. Your mom starts wiping you down with a washcloth then tells you to lay down. When you’re in position she powders then diapers you. “This is an alternative to a thorough spanking. Also as punishment for your late notification, until I say otherwise…”
153332122121.title: Padded Punishment Time

choices: Wear a skirt to cover up.
1533321221211.content:
"Mom. You're not serious are you," you ask while getting up from the bathroom floor.

"Mega serious," she all out proclaims. "Especially after that little accident you had in front of me. I'll also be informing your school of your punishment."

You froze up. You already guessed that meant they will be checking up on you during school and around friends. "Well my life is over now."

"It's your fault for not being a responsible big boy." You both exit the bathroom and you go in your bedroom, but your mom points to her workshop area. "Since I know none of your pants are going to fit over that diaper I'll give you a choice. You can either wear a skirt to cover up or go without and just have your diaper and shirt. Which one?"

Neither option was in your favor, but since they are the only ones...
1533321221211.title: “You’re in diapers 24/7, including school!”

choices: ...gown that looks like Princess Peach's outfit.
...gown that looks like Princess Zelda's outfit.
153332122122.content:
You swallow a bit when you see the fire in your mom's eyes. Though you're older now, you still dread making her angry, recalling the spankings she used to hand out when you were young and a trouble maker. You needed to think of something, and quick.

"It's just... Well I... Uhhh... Oh, they decided on a theme last minute that I wasn't aware of!" you fib through your teeth to your mother. You're begging anyone or anything that can hear your lame attempts to save your rear to help out.

Your mom folds her arms under her bust. Her expression said she wasn't buying it yet. "Last minute, huh?"

"Y-yeah, last minute. Uhm... The hostess is a fan... Of... Video games! Yeah, she's a fan of video games and wants everyone to have video game themed clothes."

"A young lady who's a fan of video games." Your mom started tapping her foot impatiently.

"Yeah? I know, right?" You're dying slowly. "And, uhm, I would totally need a video game costume..."

"So I made these all for nothing? I just scrap all this material and the accessories I purchased for you?"

"Er, uhm... No? Like, uhm... There! That one!" You point at the nearby...
153332122122.title: Thrash to not drown...

choices: Just quit while you're still alive and help her make the Baby Peach costume...
Keep trying to dig your way out...
1533321221221.content:
Without even thinking, you point at the first outfit you think looks like something you'd recognize from a game. "There, that one... Right there..." You wince, realizing while you may have weaselled out of dressing like an infant, you're still dressing like a girl.

"What about that one?"

"Uhm... It looks like a game character." You kick a little bit and mumble. "She's called Princess Peach."

"You really expect me to believe that?" Oh, come on! That's not a lie.

"No, really. Here, look!" You pull out your phone and google a picture, showing her.

"Huh." You mom's tone changes a bit, you may be out of the boiling water. "So it is, I see the resemblence."

"Y-yeah, right?" You exhale with relief. Your mom continues to look through character photos while glancing at the gown, obviously figuring out ways to change it. Suddenly her eyes light up.

"Oh, look at that. Baby Peach? THat's adorable, too!" ...Seriously?! You're floored. "I think I can do a combination between grown up PEach and Baby Peach for you. Shorter dress to show some diaper, some stockings and cute booties. Mmhmm..."

"Hyeeeeah, that's great mom..."
1533321221221.title: Peachy with Pink

choices: Just throw your hands up and give up.
15333212212211.content:
You were flabbergasted. In your attempt to climb out of this crib you fibbed your way into you fell into a playpen. You should have gone for the Zelda like dress, at least there wasn't a "Baby Zelda" your mom could have stumbled onto in three seconds!

"Yes, I think I can work with this sweetheart," your mother continued, "but this time you're going to assist me properly."

"H-huh?" you stuttered. You didn't like the sound of that.

"Well, for one your measurements have changed a lot recently. You've been making a pig of yourself. Plus you're not changing the costume on me again. If they change the theme you're just going to have to deal with it." Your mother was serious. Crap. "So you're going to stay here until we get the costume perfect."

"Right. Of course we are." There goes any plans you had this week.

"Good. Now, first thing is first. We're going to get your measurements. Strip."

"Hrm, yes ma'am." You grumble and take off your shirt and pants.

"All the way down."

"But... Y-yessum." You strip all the way down to your birthday suit as your mom comes over with the measuring tape and gets to work, measuring your butt, hips, and legs first.

"There we are, know what size that is now. And now your waist and breasts." She slips the tape around your chest.

"Breasts?"

"Looks like a B cup," she states, ignoring your comment. She walks over and pulls out a pink bra and slips it on. It fits comfortably snug and pushes up your chest, making your top half look like a woman's. Next she comes over with the biggest disposable diaper you've ever seen.

"I-is that real?" you ask. The plastic on it crinkled like the real deal, it had a patterned waistband like a real diaper, and even had tapes.

"Of course. Lay down," she instructs, and you obey. She goes the whole nine yards, adding diaper cream and baby powder, before slipping the diaper under you and taping it on nice and snug. It's very thick, making it hard to close your legs when you stand. "Perfect!" She exclaims before remeasuring your hips and butt now that it's padded. "Good, now I got all the measurements I need. Stick close, sweetie."

"ALright. I'll just get out of this diaper and-"

"No, you stay in that until instructed otherwise." she orders.

"What? But why?" You really wanted to get this big, thick disposable off. It was mortifying being in it in front of your mom.

"Because those are authentic, and as such they cost money. I couldn't order them individually, so you're going to have to wear them until they are gone." She was serious?

"But what if I have to go?" you ask. She gives a look as if she's wondering if you're serious.

"Then use them. They're authentic, remember? Just let momma know when you need a diaper change." she says, arms folded. Ordered diapers or not, this might be too much for you.

"Well, how many did you order?" Maybe you could put up with it if she only ordered a couple.

"Well, the smallest order they had was fifty diapers."

"Fifty?! Oh, come on mom! That's too much!" you whine. Fifty diapers? That would take weeks to go through...
15333212212211.title: Just quit while you're still alive and help...

choices: Respect the outfit and try to take care of it
153332122122112.content:
"Hrm, yes ma'am," you resign. Your mom went and spent a lot of money on making these costumes for your little lie and you felt bad. If you refused, she might also make you pay for them yourself and they could not have been cheap. "I guess I'll keep them on."

"That's my trooper," your mother beamed. You felt a fall chill run by your bare legs and stomach, and that made you shiver.

"Can I at least go put something on, though? It's fall and too chilly to be shirtless-" you look down at the pink bra, "Er, in my bra and diaper."

"That's fair, though I don't think any of your pants will fit with that diaper on. Hmmm," she walks over to one of the other outfits she's already made. "This one should fit." She pulls a particularly frilly dress off the stand and a white pair of stockings, "And these should keep your legs warm."

"Mom, really? You've already got me in diapers, you're going to dress me like an infant while at home too?"

"Yes, really. None of your pants will fit while you're diapered and neither will any of mine. So it's either one of these dresses or you can deal with being chilly!" She says, immediately pulling it over your head, slipping your arms through the puffy sleeves. She straightens the blouse under your bust and makes sure it was on straight. She then slipped on the stockings for you and fetched a frilly rhumba diaper cover. She held the leg opening out for you. "Here, sweetie. Step in," she instructed. You stepped in one leg at a time and she pulled it up and over your padded rear. Across the room, you saw yourself. With the exception of your hair and complexion, the illusion that you were a girl was pretty complete. "There, warm now?" If your feet are cold, I can get you some nice little booties."

"No, I'm warm now," you say, shoulders slumped and arms flat against your side. "But it's kinda humiliating. Big difference between dressing as a girl for a costume party and having to dress as one around the house, in diapers no less."

"You'll live, sweetheart. I'm the only one who knows and I promise it'll just be between us, okay? Er, here," she interrupted herself, lifting your arms slightly and positioning them in a more dainty pose. "Try to hold your arms like this so you don't flatten out your skirt. Much better. I must say, you certainly look the part. Are you at least comfortable?"

"Well, yeah..." You wiggle your hips a bit. Humiliating or not, it was certainly comfortable. Had trouble closing your legs because of the bulk between them, other than that. "Kinda hard to walk, but otherwise it's fine. Is the diaper cover necessary? Not like my butt is going to be cold."

"It's to help protect against leaks, and since these are costumes I don't exactly have a plain one for you. Now, what's say we go and have some dinner? I'm making spaghetti." she said, pinching your cheek. "I promise not to baby you TOO much."

"Yeah, yeah," you resign, starting to walk but it's hard to keep your balance. "W-woah!"

"Hold your arms out for balance, sweetheart. Like I showed you." You do as instructed, walking like a girl but it's still a little difficult. Noticing, your mother takes your hand. "Here, I'll help."

"Thanks. How the heck do babies learn how to walk wearing these things?" you wonder out loud as your mother leads you to the kitchen. Once there, you plop your diapered butt into a chair and wait patiently for dinner, sulking a bit. You're not mad at her since this is a hole you dug for yourself. Your mother went out of the way for you on all these outfits, and all because you lied.
153332122122112.title: The rabbit hole continues...

1533321221221122.content:
As you wait patiently for dinner you surfed your iPad for a bit before laying your chin in your hands, kicking your feet a bit. Before long you started inspecting your outfit and asking your mother the names of the various things you're wearing.

"Well, the frills under your skirt are called a petticoat."

"Why is there so much of it?"

"Well, I wanted the material to hold up the skirt so it would show off the diaper. Then the skirt is attached to the bodice," she continued.

"What's it called when you make the sleeves poofed like this?" you asked, holding up your arms.

"Blousing," she said warmly, happy that you finally were taking an interest in what she does for a living. "Dinner is ready!" she exclaimed, bringing over a heaping plate of pasta and marinara sauce. You licked your lips in anticipation, but stopped, looking down at the pink outfit you were wearing.

"Uhm, maybe I should take this off. Spaghetti can be messy, even when you're careful. I don't want to ruin it," you said.

"Your food will get cold, dear. Hm... Wait here," she instructed, hurrying off. She came back with a baby girl bib your size. "This is from one of the other costumes. It will work as an actual bib since I used the material I do for little ones." She explained, slipping it around your neck and tying it on.

You let out a sigh of both defeat and relief. "More baby stuff for me to wear? Great. What about drips on the skirt?" you say.

"Alright then, we'll do it this way," your mother said, amused. She fetched a TV tray and put it in close to your waist. Placing your plate in front of you, she pulled up a chair and started gently twirling some spaghetti before raising to you mouth. "Say ah."

"Seriously? Oh, what the heck. Ah!" you say, having given up any hope of dignity. Your mom feeds you the spaghetti. "Mmm. Make shift high chair. What's next? You've got a bottle in the cupboard?" You say embarrassed yet slightly amused, taking another offered bite.

"You hush now. You're the one who apparently is worried about being a messy eater," she said playfully, continuing to feed you. "Keep up that attitude and I'm sure I can find you a bottle downstairs in my shop," she mock threatened. After a bit, your plate was clear, you were full, and your mother wiped any sauce from your lips. "There. My baby girl all full?" she asked playfully.

"Very funny," you said. "Yes, I'm full."

"Sure you don't want a bottle?" she teased, pinching your cheek as she pulled the makeshift high chair away. It made you blush with embarrassment, but your mom seemed to be having way more fun than she has in a long time. You could tell she was feeling nostalgic.

"KNow what? Yes. I want a bottle," you said defiantly, folding your arms under your bust with a playful smile.

"Seriously?" she asked, cocking an eyebrow.

"You brought it back up, so obviously you want to make me one. SO go make me a bah bah!" you said playfully. "Of course, you fill me with milk and I'll need a diaper change eventually," you blustered, hoping she was intimidated by that prospect a little.

She instead smirked, leaned down slightly to your ear and whispered, "I've changed your diapers before, remember? And let's not forget, you weren't potty trained for longer than most" she reminded you. Your shoulders sank in defeat a bit while she stood and smirked victoriously, having won your playful little power struggle. "I'll go get my baby girl her bottle." she said, kissing you on the cheek and swaggering off.

"You win this round!" you shook your fist. You admitted, it was nice being able to joke around with your mom again. She soon came back with a bottle, testing it on her wrist. "You heated it up?"

"Of course," she said, popping it in your mouth. "Drink the whole thing, now. We don't waste things in this house. With that you sat down and watched your mother clean the table. You suckled on the nipple and actually enjoyed the warm bottle of milk, kicking your feet slightly.

"You're in a good mood. Just a couple hours ago you were pretty mad," you observed, speaking out the side of your mouth while you drank from the bottle, holding it with both hands.

"Well, I'm feeling a little nostalgic from when you were a baby, plus you've finally taken a bit of interest in what I do. It's nice having my son home and talking with me for once. Or rather, my daughter," she teased.

"Even if it means you're going to be changing a fully grown person's diapers?" you inquired.

"Thinking I'll back down there? Not a chance, mister. You're going to use those diapers, both number one and two. Besides, if you're trapped in diapers out of my rules about not wasting things I might as well do it for you."

"So if I ahve to dress like a baby, you're going to treat me as one? you asked.

"So to speak. You're still going to do your own chores, though. Not getting out of those," she said.

"But I don't know how to wash clothes like these. You'll have to do my laundry," you pointed out, starting to sense an opportunity to be lazy.

"Hm... Touche," your mother spun around at the sink, placing her hands on her hips and looking at you. "Trying to get out of chores?"

"A little. I honestly don't know how to wash this outfit, though," you said, spreading your arms out and looking at your dress. Instead of a stern look, your mother instead smiled.

"Tell you what, 'missy.' You can skip your chores, but only if you think you're too much of a baby to do them," she stated. "You'll dress in whatever I dress you in, be fed whatever I choose to feed you, and take naps whenever I say you take a nap. Basically, if you want zero responsibility you'll be your mother's little baby girl." You knew what she was doing, trying to do the same type of bluff you did with the diapers.

On one hand, dressing like a girl and being treated like a baby would be somewhat humiliating while you're home. On the other hand, you were a profoundly lazy person who hated doing chores with a passion. Plus you had to admit, this afternoon has been nice.
1533321221221122.title: Respect the Uniform

15333212212211221.content:
You put a lot of thought into it , but the idea of being constantly reliant on your mom for everything seems too limited of a lifestyle. “No, I think I’ll keep being a big boy. I like a little independence,” you tell your mom.

“I suppose some privileges are just too valuable,” your mom says with a hint of disappointment in her voice. “However you ‘are’ going to continue to wear and use diapers until they’re all gone and I’ll handle any diaper changes needed.”

“What for? I am perfectly capable of changing my own diapers.” After saying that you feel a bit embarrassed talking about diaper changes.

“Not while your modeling dresses for me baby. I imagine it would be very difficult to change in a dress like that one. Also, it would take a long time to get undressed, changed, and redressed.”

You realize she is right and just sigh in defeat “Fine.”

“All right dear, now that dinner is done let‘s get you ready for…”
15333212212211221.title: A Dignified Sissy Baby

choices: Not your responsibility to check your own diaper
15333212212211222.content:
"Alright, fine! I'll be a baby girl!" you said, halfheartedly hoping she was bluffing. Your mom folded her arms and cocked an eyebrow at you.

"Well, certainly didn't see that coming," she said.

"No more laundry, no more cleaning my room, no more mowing the lawn. If the cost for all that is wearing comfy clothes and getting waited on hand and foot, then sign me up. Or were you just bluffing?" you said slyly.

"No, I wasn't bluffing," your mom said, putting both her hands behind her back and strutting over. "Of course, part of no responsibility means no freedom, either You suuuure?" she asked, smirking at you. Your mom always towered over you, being over six feet tall while you only stood at a mere five and a half feet. Right now, she seemed like she was over 10 feet tall to you, though. You were slightly intimidated.

"Yeah, I'm sure!" you said.

"Very well. You're a baby starting now, missy." With that she pulled out a pink pacifier from behind her back and popped it in your mouth. "Think I'll rename you Peach. Seems appropriate." She laughed a bit to herself. "Oh, still have to do your school work, though."

"Hrmph," you groan. Dang it.

"We'll do this until you at least go through the diapers I ordered. Then you can cry uncle if you want. If not, I'll just order more diapers," she said, smirking.

"That's fine, I could do this indefinitely if I wanted to," you say defiantly. "Gonna need some PJs, though. Dresses are hardly good for sleeping in, especially ones this fancy."

"Oh, you let me worry about all the necessities. You let me worry about everything, Lil' Peachy." She laughed to herself, before running her hand through your hair. "Going to have to do something about this. Come along." She grabbed your hand and led you to her shop, taking the dress off you and leading you into the bathroom. "We're going to dye this golden blond."

"Huh? But..."

"Promise, sweetheart. I'll hide it and password protect it multiple times," she said playfully. Then she noticed you were actually scared. "Hey, I promise, sweetheart. Just for me, I'd never let something like that get out and humiliate you," she explained warmly.

The aforementioned shock turns into disgust and disappointment as you stand up and waddle (due to the diaper) over to your dresser, opening the top drawer to find more diapers.

You sigh. You really don't want to mention this to anyone, and the fact that it's happened once means there's a good chance it'll happen again. You undo the straps on the diaper you're wearing, slipping it off and throwing it into the garbage. You then take and use some wipes on yourself, put baby powder into a fresh diaper (even though you haven't changed a diaper in your life before this), and slip it on. A quiet coo escapes your lips, before you decide to get some clothes to put on.

Going into lower drawers of your dresser, you pull out a purple T-shirt that had an appealing flower pattern on it, and a pair of pants that were much softer than the jeans or khakis you normally wore. They also seemed to be rather form-fitting, and had elastic around the ankles, almost like something you'd see on a baby girl. You shrug and decide that your comfort is more important than how you look. You pull the pants up, noting how stretchy and... Quite baggy they are. Your diaper seems to be the only thing keeping them up, and even then, it seems like they're two sizes too big.

You roll with it and put on the shirt, but you feel... Weird. You go into another drawer for a tank-top to put underneath and instead find bras, both padded and not.

"No one will notice..." You think as you take one out and slip off your shirt, putting a padded bra on your chest and hooking it in the back. You then put on the shirt, feeling much more comfortable. A laugh, more of a giggle really, escapes your lips as you look at yourself in the mirror. Today might've started out off, but you feel so much happier and content now.

Except... Something begins to feel off...

You go look for answers…

The whole thing seems a bit far-fetched to you, but you can't say you're not interested in finding out if it works.

Do you...

notice people looking at you strangely

You quickly leave the house not wanting to be in the vicinity of the book. As you walk you....

You are dumbfounded by what you see in the photos. They all had a bunch of fat boys dressed up like baby girls. Some are wearing really long and wide dresses, others are dressed in footed onesies and baby clothes, and some have on just diapers and shirts; and possibly bras for their fat sissy boobies.
The photos vary in fashions and poses like one with all of their big diapered butts showing off to the camera. A few more show the shy girl pose and some acting kind of flirty.
“What in the world is this? Some kind of big sissy society?” As you asked, you saw a photo with a banner with that exact same phrase, Big Sissy Society.
After absorbing all this into your mind you decide to…

You enter and find about 10 cute, obese, femme boys, all dressed in different, but simialr, outfits. All consisted of either onsies, short skirts, or just bras. And all wore diapers. Some sucked on pacifiers, others sucked bottles, others had rattles. You stand there, dumbfounded. What happens next?
15531.title: Explore the house out of curiosity.

choices: You gain weight and your clothes change.
Your room changes, but you are left unaffected.
15532.content:
You dump the album into your bag, strangely interested in the boys in the pictures. You wonder if you'd be able to find them online, if you looked hard enough.

When you go home, you hide the album in your sock drawer, and decide that you've had enough of consciousness for today. You strip down to your briefs and get into bed, falling asleep to the thought of those chubby boys in the photos.

As you sleep, however...
15532.title: Head home, but take the photos with you.

choices: The picture makes people treat you like a sissy baby
The picture slowly makes your clothes girly and your underwear into a diaper
155322.content:
As you sleep, the photo album in your sock drawer begins to hum and glow. The drawer it's stuffed in turns from a deep brown to a bright white, a fresh coat of paint spreading over the dresser. The entire dresser become white and feminine in design, with pink kittens and balloons popping on it in random locations. The conversation doesn't stop there, but rather spreads. Starting from the dresser's legs on the floor, the carpet begins to turn pink and fluffy, spreading across the room. The whole bedroom begins to smell of talcum powder and flowers as the changes spread. Your desk becomes white and the top begins to puff up, turning into a very large diaper changing table. Action figures and statues become stuffed animals and girlish baby toys. The walls go from white to sky blue with pink clouds painted on.

The conversation spreads across the floor, beginning to reach your bed when you suddenly stir from your sleep. It stops dead in its tracks as you swing your feet off the bed, drowsy from your rest. Stepping down and past the cut in the fabric, you walk down the hall to use the rest room and brush your teeth without even noticing the changes that happened. Returning, your now wakeful eyes are assault by the powder pinks, sky blues, and warm whites that is your bedroom.

"Wh- What ha... Huh?!" You yell, seeing your bedroom converted into a baby girl nursery. Even the bed you had just gotten out of was now a giant blue crib, with high bars, baby blankets, and a mobile with kittens and balloons dangling over the suddenly super plush pillow.

"Hun, was that you yelling?" you mother yelled from downstairs, sounding perturbed from the shouting.

"Uh, I stubbed my toe on the door!" you say before closing the door and pressing your back to it as if you expected her to run up and barge in. While some things were in similar position, absolutely nothing about your room seemed the same. You rushed to your dresser and opened the top drawer, only to find it filled with baby girl clothes that were your exact size. "Crap, crap, crap!" You open your underwear drawer and are met with a pile of pink tinted disposable diapers; complete with kittens printed on them and big enough for yourself.

"It's gotta be that photo album," you tell yourself, fishing it out of your sock draw. Frilly socks fall on the ground as you flip through the pages, looking at all the sissy boys held within. You grabbed it with the intent of throwing it out, but now that it's in your hands you don't feel like disposing of it. One picture in particular jumps out at you of a particularly girlish boy, complete with wide hips, generous boobs, blond hair, and a very pink princess like dress with frills and bloused sleeves.

"Okay, just... Calm down, man. There's a reasonable explanation... Just... I'll just go out for a walk and think about what to do next," you say, calming yourself down. You open your closet and find that it wasn't touched by whatever changed your room. You reason that it was because the door was close.d Fishing through your hamper, you find some reasonably clean clothes, getting out of your sleepwear into a t-shirt, jeans, and pair of underwear and socks. Making sure to close your closet door, you turn and look at the album sitting on what was your desk and now your diaper changing table. You head over and open it back to the page you were staring at. Looking at the photo, you fish that particular one out and put it in your back pocket before closing the book. You put it away and exit your room, closing the door.

As you walk down the stairs to the living room, the photo in your back pocket begins to glow a soft pink. You don't notice because it's behind you, but whatever magic was in the photo album was also in the photos. You feel a warm sensation as the spell starts to affect you...

You’re just full of thoughts during the walk. Soon you cross paths with a group of…

When you reach your front door for your shoes you put them on, but as you lace them up they look a little different. “Huh, I don’t remember these looking so girly,” you say, but you continue out the door anyway. After a few minutes of walking you feel a little better, but you also feel your underwear getting thicker.

“Oh no,” you say as you stop to look into your pants. You can see your underwear getting thicker, pinker, and changing material into a girly disposable diaper. After wards you notice your shirt turning purple and becoming silkier. You turn back towards your house as your pants start getting shorter and opening up to become a skirt . If no one looked closely at you your appearance would be that of a teenage girl, but one gust of wind would reveal your diaper.

You’re just a few yards away from home when…
1553222.title: Baby Girl Clothes

choices: You snap out of it and rush/waddle inside
The neighbor girl spots you while collecting her dog
15532221.content:
You continue to rush home, hampered slightly by tugging down on the front and back of your new skirt. "Photo! That's photo! I gotta..." You start, reaching for your back pocket only to find it completely gone. Your hand finds only a smooth silk skirt and the plush crinkle of your disposable diaper underneath. Whatever shift your clothes have taken has made the photo disappear with it. But at the same time your pants have begun spinning together with you shirt.

Not your shirt, but rather your blouse.

"Crap, crap, crap! What's happeni-"

"BARK!"

"Eek" You cry out, nearly tripping over the neighbor's dog. You hadn't noticed it between running to the house and patting your diapered butt looking for your former pocket. You stumble a bit, feet spread to keep yourself from faceplanting into the grass. You breath a sigh of relief; you didn't want your new pretty dress covered in stains.

"Wait, did I think that just now? Why did- Uhh," you stop, noticing a warm and wet sensation in the front of your diaper. "D-did... Oh gawd." YOu realize you've wet your diaper, modestly pressing your hands against the front to feel. You stand in your front yard trying to process all this as your clothes continue to get more and more babyish and girly with bits of lace appearing and your sleeves puffing out.
15532221.title: Dog teaches new trick
